Gold Medal Challenge'92 est une compilation de sport sur Nintendo NES. Les jeux olympiques 1992 sont ouverts, et vous allez avoir le plaisir de retrouvez pas moins de 17 épreuves olympiques dans cette cartouche. 100 mètres, nage libre, saut en hauteur, lancer de poids, cheval d'arçon, on s'y croirait presque. À la seule différence que les ampoules, c'est aux doigts que vous les aurez puisque pour faire avancer votre personnage, vous devez appuyer successivement sur les deux touches de votre manette pour le faire avancer plus ou moins vite. En ce qui concerne les sauts ou les trajectoires pour les épreuves spéciales, la flèche du pad vous permettra d'orienter vos mouvements.

locale.title: Captain America and the Avengers
locale.synopsis:
The Mandarin has knocked out Iron Man and the Vision. This time it is personal.
You play as Captain America or Hawkeye. In the one player mode, you must fight your way through various thugs to rescue Iron Man and the Vision. This game is a side scroller, somewhat reminiscent of Bionic Commando in which you fight through a level then move to an overhead map to decide where to go next. In between levels, Wasp gives you hints.
Captain America's attacks are: when he is standing, shield throw; when he is crouching, punch and when he is jumping, kick. Also, if you push twice in a direction, Cap can do a powerful forward charge with his shield for a short distance.
Hawkeye's attacks are all arrow shots. He can shoot left, right, up, upper-left or upper-right.
If you complete an area with one character then complete it with the other character right away, you can press start to switch between Cap or Hawkeye. This has the advantage that Cap's forward charge is powerful and by grabbing poles, he can then jump to areas Hawkeye cannot.
Hawkeye can shoot enemies or targets too high for Cap to jump up and kick.
In the battle mode, this is a two player, one-on-one battle. Player one chooses from Captain America or Hawkeye (the good guys) and player two chooses from Wizard, Ultron or Crossbones (the bad guys).
You fight each other until one player has won three rounds.

El Mandarín ha eliminado a Iron Man y a Vision. Esta vez es personal.
Juegas como el Capitán América o Hawkeye. En el modo de un jugador, debes luchar a través de varios niveles para rescatar a Iron Man y a Vision. Este juego es un scroller lateral, un poco reminiscente de Bionic Commando en el que luchas a través de un nivel y luego pasas a un mapa para decidir a dónde ir a continuación. Entre los niveles, Wasp te da pistas.
Los ataques del capitán América son: cuando él está parado, el lanzamiento del escudo; Cuando está agachado, golpe y cuando está saltando, patada. Además, si presionas dos veces en una dirección, Cap puede hacer una poderosa carga hacia adelante con su escudo a corta distancia.
Los ataques de Hawkeye son todos disparos con flechas. Puede disparar a la izquierda, derecha, arriba, arriba a la izquierda o arriba derecha.
Si completas un área con un carácter y luego completas con el otro carácter inmediatamente, puedes presionar el botón de inicio para cambiar entre Cap o Hawkeye. Esto tiene la ventaja de que la carga delantera de Cap es potente y puede saltar a áreas que Hawkeye no puede.
Hawkeye puede disparar a enemigos u objetivos demasiado altos para que Cap salte y patee.
En el modo de batalla, se trata de una batalla de dos jugadores, uno a uno. El jugador uno elige al Capitán América o Hawkeye (los buenos) y el jugador dos elige a Ultron o Crossbones (los chicos malos).
Luchan entre sí hasta que un jugador ha ganado tres rondas.

Captain America and the Avengers sur NES est la conversion du jeu d'action sorti en arcade. Incarnez les héros Marvel tels qu'Iron Man, Hawkeye et Vision. Vous pouvez choisir de jouer seul ou à deux simultanément, pour éliminer tout opposant qui osera se mettre en travers de votre super-chemin.

locale.title: Captain Comic - The Adventure
locale.synopsis:
"You are Captain Comic, galactic hero. Your mission is to recover three treasures from the planet Omsoc, which have been stolen away and hidden on the remote planet of Tambi."
Captain Comic is a platformer featuring a huge nonlinear playfield divided into several different terrains. As Comic, you must search throughout Tambi for power ups and items that will aid you in your quest to recover the three treasures. The Captain's main weapon is 'Blastola Cola', a can of drink that allows him to hurl fireballs at his foes. For each can that he finds, an additional fireball can be thrown.
There are many different paths that are available from the start, but without the right item or weapon, it can be impossible to progress through certain paths, or even to commit suicide. It's up to the player to decide the correct route to take, and which places to return to at a later time.

Eres el Capitán Comic, héroe galáctico. Tu misión es recuperar tres tesoros del planeta Omsoc, que han sido robados y escondidos en el remoto planeta de Tambi.
Captain Comic es un juego de plataformas con un enorme campo de juego no lineal dividido en varios terrenos diferentes. Como Comic, debes buscar en todo Tambi power-ups y artículos que te ayudarán en tu búsqueda para recuperar los tres tesoros. El arma principal del Capitán es la 'Blastola Cola', una lata de bebida que le permite lanzar bolas de fuego a sus enemigos. Para cada uno que él encuentre, una bola de fuego adicional puede ser lanzada.
Hay muchos caminos diferentes que están disponibles desde el principio, pero sin el artículo o arma adecuada, puede ser imposible progresar a través de ciertos caminos. Depende del jugador decidir la ruta correcta a tomar, y a qué lugares volver en un momento posterior.

The Adventures of Captain Comic est un jeu d'action sur Nes dans lequel vous incarnez Captain Comic, un super-héros dont la mission est de retrouver 3 trésors cachés sur la planète Tambi. Votre objectif est de les rapporter sur la planète Omsoc. Mais votre tâche n'est pas si simple et de nombreux ennemis vous mettront des bâtons dans les roues. Heureusement, Captain Comic n'est pas dépourvu de ressources. Ainsi en buvant une canette de soda, il pourra leur lancer des boules de feu.

locale.title: Captain Ed
locale.synopsis: Captain ED is a vertically scrolling shoot-em-up. Players pilot a ship through seven different levels of outer space in order to rescue their friends from captivity and to defeat Doguma. Players must shoot down enemy ships to earn money. This money can th

Captain Ed est un shoot'em up en scrolling vertical sorti au Japon sur la Nes. Le décor du jeu est fait de case de couleurs différentes qui ont des effets direct sur votre véhicule : panne d'essence, ralentissement et perte d'énergie.

locale.title: Captain Planet and the Planeteers
locale.synopsis:
Based on the cartoon series of the same name, Captain Planet and the Planeteers are environmental protectors. Each Planeteer is endowed with a special elemental power which is used to combat pollution, preserve the enviroment and keep everything ship-shape. When the Planeteers powers combine they summon Captain Planet, a superhero Captain Planet, guardian of the Earth, is summoned. The powers of Gaia keep watch over the world, and assign the Planeteers to where they are needed.
Captain Planet and the Planeteers is an action sidescroller game divided into two sections: Inside levels and outside levels. Outside levels usually put the Planeteers in some kind of vehicle which can move in any of eight directions on the screen. The planeteers can use any of their elemental powers, drained from an energy bar: Fire shoots a fireball directly ahead, Water shoots out a water wave, Wind lets loose a defensive air currents, Earth tosses stones out to the earth and Heart calms animal creatures. Touching an enemy or projectile results in instant death.
Inside levels summon Captain Planet himself, who can punch or turn himself into a swirling version of any of the five elements. Captain Planet can also move/fly in any of eight directions and also can only take one hit before dying. Power-ups can also be found on these levels.

Basado en la serie de dibujos animados del mismo nombre, Captain Planet and the Planeteers son protectores ambientales. Cada Planeteer está dotado de un poder elemental especial que se utiliza para combatir la contaminación, preservar el medio ambiente y mantener todo de forma correcta. Cuando los Planeteers combinan poderes un superhéroe Captain Planet, guardián de la Tierra, es convocado. Los poderes de Gaia vigilan el mundo, y asignan a los Planeteers a donde ellos son necesarios.
Captain Planet and the Planeteers es un juego de sidescroller de acción dividido en dos secciones: niveles interiores y esteriores. Fuera los niveles suelen poner a los Planeteers en algún tipo de vehículo que se puede mover en cualquiera de las ocho direcciones en la pantalla. Los planeteers pueden usar cualquiera de sus poderes elementales, drenados de una barra de energía: el fuego dispara una bola de fuego directamente adelante, el agua dispara una onda de agua, el viento suelta una corriente de aire defensiva, la tierra lanza piedras a la tierra y el corazón calma a las criaturas animales. Tocar a un enemigo o proyectil resulta en muerte instantánea.
Los niveles interiores convocan al Captain Planet mismo, quien puede golpear o convertirse en una versión de cualquiera de los cinco elementos. Captain Planet también puede moverse y volar en cualquiera de las ocho direcciones y también sólo puede tomar un golpe antes de morir. Los power-ups también se pueden encontrar en estos niveles.

Captain Planet and the Planeteers est un jeu d'action/plates-formes sur NES. Tiré du dessin animé "Captain Planet", ce titre vous propose 5 missions différentes réparties dans 5 niveaux pour préserver l'environnement et sauver la planète. Des bonus peuvent être ramassés en route pour tenir tête au boss de fin de niveau.

locale.title: Captain Silver
locale.synopsis:
In Captain Silver, you play the role of Jim, a brave young lad with a taste of adventure. You embark on a journey to find Captain Silver's secret treasure hoard, which is rumored to be hidden on an island in the Eastern Seas.
There are six scenes in the game. During his travels, Jim will explore villages, fight his way on board ships, venture through caves, and wander around tropical islands. In each of these six scenes, Jim must use his sword to kill cats, rats, bats, witches, skeletons, and other creatures that are waiting for him. When Jim touches, or is shot at, by a creature, he loses one of his lives, but when he kills a creature, he can collect some gold that they leave behind, which can be used to buy items from shops. However, rather than getting gold, enemies leave behind some gold containing one of the letters that spell the word "CAPTAIN SILVER". If Jim manages to get all of these letters, he will be awarded an extra life.
Jim may only use his sword to start off with, but once he collects a fairy that floats toward him in every scene, Jim will be able to shoot stars at enemies, making his kills more efficient. The maximum number of stars that he can have is six. There are other power-ups that Jim can collect in the game. These include the "clock" power-up, which gives Jim extra time; the "boot" power-up which allows Jim to jump higher; and the "coffee?" power-up, which enables Jim to shield himself from creatures until he is hit by one.
There is a boss in each scene, which he must defeat in order to proceed to the next round. There is also a certain time limit, which Jim must complete the scene before it expires. If he does not, then he will lose a life.

Dans Captain Silver sur NES, incarnez Jim, un jeune homme ayant le goût de l'aventure qui embarque dans une expédition à la recherche d'un trésor secret. Durant son voyage, traversez villages, jungles et bateaux pour atteindre les mers de l'est dans un jeu de plates-formes où le fait de collecter toutes les lettres de Captain Silver donne une vie supplémentaire. En avant, moussaillon !

locale.title: Captain Skyhawk
locale.synopsis: The Earth has been invaded by aliens and it is up to you to stop them. Piloting a plane through several levels, you must blow up enemy artillery and planes before taking on one of four large bases. The action is from a top down perspective, but the landscape is 3D rather than flat as in similar games. Your plane can be upgraded at space stations between levels, and you even have to accurately pilot your plane into the space station. After successfully completing all the levels you have to destroy the final alien boss.

Los alienígenas están drenando la energía de la Tierra y planean destruirla totalmente. Sólo el capitán Skyhawk y su avión de combate F-14VTS pueden deshacerse de estos invasores alienígenas.
El juego cuenta con ocho misiones que se dividen en diferentes fases. Una fase es un movimiento vertical de desplazamiento vertical que tiene la acción vista desde una perspectiva de arriba abajo con un paisaje 3D. Los jugadores pueden destruir instalaciones y bases enemigas durante esta fase. Otra fase tiene una jugabilidad similar a After Burner donde el jugador tiene que derribar un avión enemigo. En otra fase tiene el jugador tiene que hacer cuidadosamente el acoplamiento de sus aviones en una estación espacial. El armamento de los aviones se puede actualizar o rellenar en estas estaciones espaciales mediante el gasto de los créditos que el jugador se ha ganado al derrotar a los aviones enemigos. Después de completar con éxito todas las misiones el jugador tiene que destruir la estación espacial extraterrestre final.

Captain Skyhawk est un jeu de tir sur Nes. Vous incarnez un pilote de chasse dont le but est de libérer la Terre d'une invasion alien. Vous devez détruire les bases aliens avant que celles-ci ne drainent toutes les forces vives de la planète. Aux commandes de votre F-14, vous êtes muni de quatre types d'armes différents, dont vous devez faire bon usage au cours des 9 missions composant le jeu.

locale.title: Captain Tsubasa Vol. 2 - Super Striker
locale.synopsis: Captain Tsubasa Vol. II: Super Striker is the second game in the Captain Tsubasa series, role-playing soccer games based off the anime of the same name. Super Striker was released on July 20, 1990 in Japan for the Famicom, published and developed by Tecmo. The game allows players to make choices, and then watch how they play out in the field.

Captain Tsubasa Volume II: Super Striker es un videojuego de fútbol perteneciente a la serie de juegos para Nintendo Entertainment System sobre el anime Captain Tsubasa. Es la continuación del juego Captain Tsubasa. Lanzado en 1990 por Tecmo este juego es limpiamente similar a su precursor, pero con algunas mejoras leves gráficas. también es el último juego de Tsubasa para la NES la continuación del videojuego fue lanzada para la consola de Super Nintendo; es considerado por amplio número de fans como el mejor videojuego de la serie.
Al igual que todos los videojuegos de Captain Tsubasa nos ofrece una realidad alterna o una continuidad con los hechos relacionados la serie, en esta versión del aparecen todos los personajes del anime comenzamos con Tsubasa haciendo parte del equipo juvenil de Sao Paulo disputando la Copa Rio Juvenil y siendo retado antes de cada partido por Carlos Santana capitán del Flamengo; en el torneo hay que jugar 6 partidos contra los grandes clubes de brasil, a partir del segundo juego se incrementa la dificultad de los rivales ya que algunos poseen técnicas muy buenas.

Captain Tsubasa II et le deuxième volet de la série sur la NES inspiré du dessin animé Olive et Tom. Cette suite présente de nombreuses améliorations en terme de graphisme et de gameplay. Un jeu bien pensé avec des animations plus cinématographiques que jamais.

locale.title: Captain Tsubasa Vol. II : Super Striker
Casino Derby
locale.synopsis: Casino Derby is a game, developed by Outback and published by Party Room 21, which was released in Japan in 1993 for the Nintendo Famicom.

locale.title: Casino Kid
locale.synopsis: You are Casino Kid, a nameless youth who has 500$ in his pocket and is ready to face the best poker and blackjack players in the casino to increase this amount significantly. You move around a large casino room and talk to people. Some people will just chat with you, while others will challenge you to a game: either blackjack or poker. In the beginning, most people won't agree to play with you. You'll have to defeat the opponents in a particular order in order to be able to win all blackjack and poker games and to face the Final Opponent.

Eres Casino Kid, un joven sin nombre que tiene 500 $ en su bolsillo y está listo para enfrentarse a los mejores jugadores de poker y blackjack en el casino para aumentar esta cantidad significativamente. Te mueves por una gran sala de casino y hablas con la gente. Algunas personas sólo charlarán contigo, mientras que otros te desafiarán a un juego: blackjack o poker. Al principio, la mayoría de la gente no aceptará jugar contigo. Tendrás que derrotar a los oponentes en un orden particular para poder ganar todos los juegos de blackjack y póquer y enfrentarte al oponente final.
Casino Kid sur Nes nous met dans la peau de The Kid, un enfant qui doit vaincre le meilleur joueur de Black Jack des Etats-Unis et remporter la somme astronomique de 10.000.000 de dollars.

locale.title: 100 Man Dollar Kid : Maboroshi no Teiou Hen
Casino Kid II
locale.synopsis:
In the first game, the Kid defeated the best blackjack and poker players in US, including the great Casino Boss, winning 1,000,000 dollars. Now, gamblers all over the world have organized a championship where only national winners can participate. So you, the new US champion, must now prove you are the best gambler in the whole world.
Unlike the first game, you can tackle your opponents in any order (except the toughest ones, which require you defeating somebody else). You travel all over the world, facing the great gamblers. In addition to blackjack and poker, you can also play roulette in this game.

En el primer juego, Kid venció a los mejores jugadores de blackjack y póquer en los Estados Unidos, incluyendo al gran Boss del casino, ganando 1.000.000 dólares. Ahora, los jugadores de todo el mundo han organizado un campeonato en el que sólo los ganadores nacionales pueden participar. Así tú, el nuevo campeón de EE.UU., ahora debes demostrar que eres el mejor jugador en el mundo entero.
A diferencia del primer juego, puedes enfrentarte a tus oponentes en cualquier orden (excepto los más difíciles, que requieren derrotar a alguien más). Viajas por todo el mundo, enfrentandote a los grandes jugadores. Además de blackjack y poker, también puedes jugar a la ruleta en este juego.

Casino Kid 2 sur Nes nous refait vivre une aventure de The Kid. Déjà le plus grand joueur des Etats-Unis, vous devez maintenant devenir le Champion du Monde ! Parcourez le Monde et jouez au poker et au black jack mais aussi à la roulette.

locale.title: Castelian
locale.synopsis: Julius is his name. Demolition is his game. Eight colossal towers that almost crack the sky! You and Julius - the Anurian Hybrid - are charged with the task of collapsing the alien towers. As Julius climbs and leaps across the face of each tower, he is confronted by potent and very deadly adversaries. Roving Hexalons, scanning I-Balls, orbiting Spheroids and dissolving pathways threaten you at every turn. Their mere touch will cost you your life! Yet, somehow, you must reach the tower's top in order to detonate your powerful D-bombs! Your courage, skill and determination will guide you to the summit of Castelian. Fire your Carbonobombs, catch the high-speed elevator, and escape into the doorways of the unknown. The island's future depends upon you and Julius. Watch him, learn his secrets and demolition will become your game!

En el planeta Nebulus, pasan cosas raras. Alguien o algo ha comenzado a construir enormes torres en el fondo del mar, sin tener licencia de obras. En las oficinas de Destructo, Inc., te despiertas de tu siesta debido al horrible ruido del teléfono. Tu jefe te está gritando algo de un trabajito que tiene para ti, pero como estás dormido te dan ganas de tirar el teléfono por la ventana. Pero de repente te das cuenta que dice que puedes usar el nuevo submarino Mk.7, y algo de una subidita de sueldo. Sueltas el teléfono, y sales zumbando antes de oír a tu jefe decir que claro, es un trabajo muy peligroso... Llegas a la parte inferior de cada torre en tu submarino. Tienes que subir a la cima dentro del tiempo permitido. Las torres están cubiertas de varias plataformas, túneles, y ascensores. Puedes descubrir, asimismo, plataformas que se disuelven cuando las pisas, y plataformas resbaladizas que te hacen ir a un lado u otro. Bloques destellantes y pelotas que rebotan se pueden destruir disparándolas, pero las pelotas rodantes plateadas sólo se pueden detener durante unos segundos. Todas las demás criaturas son indestructibles. Si te alcanza una criatura te caerás de la plataforma, y aterrizarás varios niveles más abajo. Si te caes al mar, morirás. Entrando por la puerta final en la parte superior de la torre inicia la secuencia de destrucción. Tendrás puntos extra por el tiempo que te sobre, y por cómo lo has hecho de bien. A continuación, la torre se desintegrará. Una vez destruida la torre, vuelve a tu submarino y viaja por debajo del agua hasta la próxima torre. En la versión para Commodore podrás obtener bonificaciones durante estos viajes, pescando. Dispara burbujas de aire para capturar los peces, que puedes recoger a continuación.

Castelian sur Nintendo NES est un jeu d'action/plate-forme où vous contrôlez une petite grenouille verte (croisé avec un cochon semble-t-il) dans le but de la hisser au sommet de 8 tours qui empoissonnent l'eau dans laquelle vous et vos congénères habité. La cartouche fait preuve d'ingéniosité techniquement parlant, en recréant un effet de 3D qui donne l'impression de tourner autour des tours. Votre ascension sera parsemée d'ennemis en tous genres et vos seules armes sont des boules à lancer sur l'adversaire. Vous avez la possibilité d'effectuer un saut en appuyant sur A et en maintenant la direction vers laquelle vous voulez sauter. L'ascension sera particulièrement compliquée en additionnant la mauvaise réaction des touches, les ennemis qui suivent le mouvement de la tour et le temps imparti.

locale.title: Castle Of Deceit
locale.synopsis:
Your world is facing peril. The mystic Runes of Guarding have been stolen. You must recover them and reset the protective wards to fend off the doom that threatens your world.
This is a side scrolling platform game. You must fight through enemies and jump onto ledges to grab keys to unlock doors. After you unlock the last door in your area, you must defeat the castle's Head Master, boss, in other words, and grab the Rune of Guarding that they had. After you have gotten all the Runes, your world will be safe.

Tu mundo se está enfrentando el peligro. Las místicas Runas de Guarding han sido robadas. Tú debes recuperarlas y reiniciar las salas de protección para defenderte de la condena que amenaza a tu mundo.
Este es un juego de plataformas de desplazamiento lateral. Debes luchar con enemigos y saltar a las repisas para tomar las llaves para abrir puertas. Después de desbloquear la última puerta en el área, debes derrotar al jefe del castillo, jefe, en otras palabras, y coger la Runa de la Guardia que tenían. Después de haber obtenido todas las runas, su mundo estará a salvo.
Castle of Deceit sur la première console Nintendo est un jeu de plates-formes ou vous incarnez un mage.

locale.title: Castle of Dragon
locale.synopsis:
Darklarza, the Dragon Master, has been terrorizing the kingdom for many years. The king has retreated into exile with his bravest knight, Geraden, to hold his fort. Darklarza stages an attack on the king's exile fortress and manages to abduct the princess. It is up to Geraden to journey through the kingdom, rescue the princess, and put an end to Darklarza's reign once and for all.
Castle of Dragon is a side-scrolling action adventure in which Geraden must hack and slash his way through the kingdom and destroy legions on Darklarza's forces. Initially equipped with a sword and a shield, plus the armor on his back, Geraden can upgrade to more powerful offensive and defensive options, as well as obtain various powerful magic spells.

Darklarza, el Maestro Dragón, ha estado aterrorizando el reino durante muchos años. El rey se ha retirado al exilio con su valiente caballero, Geraden, para mantener su fortín. Darklarza escenifica un ataque a la fortaleza del exilio del rey, y se las arregla para secuestrar a la princesa. Corresponde a Geraden viajar por el reino, rescatar a la princesa, y poner fin al reinado de Darklarza de una vez por todas.
Castle of Dragon es una aventura de acción de desplazamiento lateral en el que Geraden debe avanzar a través del reino y destruir las legiones de las fuerzas de Darklarza. Inicialmente equipado con una espada y un escudo, además de la armadura en la espalda, Geraden puede actualizar a más potentes opciones ofensivas y defensivas, así como obtener varios poderosos hechizos mágicos.

Darklarza, le Maître des Dragons, terrorise le royaume depuis de nombreuses années. Le roi s'est retiré en exil avec son plus brave chevalier, Geraden, pour tenir son fort. Darklarza met en scène une attaque contre la forteresse de l'exil du roi et parvient à enlever la princesse. C'est à Geraden de parcourir le royaume, de sauver la princesse et de mettre définitivement fin au règne de Darklarza. Castle of Dragon est un jeu d'action a défilement latéral dans laquelle Geraden doit se frayé un chemin à travers le royaume et détruire les armées de Darklarza. Initialement équipé d'une épée et d'un bouclier, plus une armure sur son dos, Geraden peut passer à des options offensive et défensive plus puissantes, ainsi qu' obtenir différents sorts magiques puissants.

locale.title: Castle Quest (Japan)
locale.synopsis:
Castle Quest is a strategy game loosely based on chess by Hudson Soft. It is an interesting mix of heroic fantasy and classical chess - the player must use his pieces, a move at the time, to capture the opponent's king while protecting his own. However, Castle Quest features a lot more pieces than traditional chess such as Wizards, Ninjas, Orcs, Mummies and even Dragons.
Each piece comes with a set of attributes such as Health, Magic, Defense and Attack and these lie at the center of the gameplay - unlike chess, when one piece attempts to take another they have to fight to determine who takes the square. Each fight is round based and driven by the roll of a dice (symbolized by playing cards going from 1 to 10). Some pieces can also use magic spells or special attacks - some pieces use healing powers whereas others throw fireballs or even resurrect lost pieces.

Juego de puzzle y plataformas secuela de The Castle. Controlas un príncipe que tiene que salvar a la princesa otra vez.
Para encontrar a tu princesa tienes que explorar el castillo, que cuenta con 100 habitaciones diferentes. Cada habitación es un rompecabezas por sí mismo donde tienes que evitar a los caballeros enemigos, objetos peligrosos y tienes que utilizar objetos para llegar a la siguiente puerta. En cada habitación hay que recoger las llaves y objetos como anillos y barras de oro. Las llaves pueden tener diferentes colores y sólo abren puertas del color correspondiente.
La principal diferencia con el juego original The Castle es que las habitaciones del castillo están totalmente rediseñadas y contienen muchos nuevos desafíos. El juego no ha cambiado.
Castle Quest sur console Nintendo NES est un jeu de stratégie qui s'inspire des échecs. À l'aide de carte à jouer, vous combattez au tour par tour contre votre ennemi.

locale.title: Castlequest
locale.synopsis: The puzzle and platform game Castle Excellent is a sequel to The Castle. In Castle Excellent you control a prince that has to save the princess again. To find your princess you have to explore the castle, which has 100 different rooms. Each room is a puzz

Dans un monde imaginaire, la jeune princesse Margarita a été kidnappée par Mad Mizer, le Seigneur Noir du château de Groken (Groken Castle), situé dans les Montagnes interdites. Le Prince Rafael part à sa rescousse. Le jeu se déroule entièrement dans le château. Pour progresser Rafael doit collecter des clés dans les dédales du château de Groken qui contient 100 pièces arrangées selon carré 10x10 de côté.

locale.title: Castlevania
locale.synopsis:
Every hundred years, the dark vampire known as Dracula resurrects and terrorizes the land. A vampire hunter named Simon Belmont bravely ventures into the Count's mansion in order to defeat him. Along the way he'll have to defeat skeletons, bats, fishmen, medusa heads and other evil creatures.
Castlevania is a side-scrolling platform action game. The player taking the role of Simon Belmont is able to jump and crack his whip directly in front of him. Power-ups can be obtained by defeating enemies or by whipping candles that appear in the castle. One such power-up increases the power and length of Simon's whip. Different weapons can be gathered which consume hearts when used, these hearts can also be collected from monsters and candles. Additionally, some walls will hide secrets such as the health-restorative turkey or the Double and Triple shot abilities for the weapons Simon has collected. At the end of each section of the castle is a boss, which must be defeated. Progression through the castle eventually leads to a confrontation with Count Dracula himself.

El juego está compuesto por seis niveles que son jugados a través de una estricta progresión lineal. El jugador toma el control de Simon Belmont cuyo modo primario de ataque es el uso de su látigo, el cual puede ser mejorado obteniendo artículos especiales a través del juego que pueden extender su longitud. Además, pueden obtenerse varias sub-armas que proveen diferentes formas de ataque. Rompiendo candelabros y otros objetos Simon puede coleccionar corazones que pueden ser usados para activar cualquier sub-arma que posea en tal punto. Simon no puede poseer más de una sub-arma a la vez. Cada uno de los niveles del juego concluye con una pelea con un jefe generalmente inspirado en la literatura de horror y leyendas, como por ejemplo un murciélago vampiro, una medusa, momias, el monstruo de Frankenstein, Igor, la muerte y finalmente Drácula.

Le jeu d'action Castlevania sur Nes vous emmène tout droit dans le château de Dracula. Préparez-vous à vivre la nuit la plus éprouvante de votre vie. Spectres, gobelins, démons, loups-garous et chauves-souris... ces créatures sont tapies dans chaque coin sombre. Plus vous vous enfoncez dans les ténèbres, plus elles sont dangereuses et terrifiantes. Explorez les cavernes pour trouver des armes, vous en aurez besoin car le maître des lieux a soif de sang et il ne vous fera pas de cadeau.

locale.title: Castlevania - Blood Moon
locale.synopsis: This is an overhaul of the original Castlevania. Several features were used in Blood Moon that were prominent in the original Castlevania, but not utilized. For example; the waters splash effect, having to break a path through the wall to proceed, and bit-blades unique tile solidity glitch, and a few booby traps along the way which all make for substantially more interesting gameplay. This is a very difficult game, for master vampire killers only. If you happened upon it by mistake, then run! far far away! wuahaha!

locale.title: Castlevania - Chorus Of Mysteries
locale.synopsis: This is a hack of the original Castlevania for NES 1476, Romania. A terrifying castle rises up from the mist. Along with the castle rose a dark powerful being named Count Dracula Vlad Tepes. A man named Trevor Belmont was fated to defeat the powerful vampire, aided by a witch named Sypha, Dracula's own son Alucard, and a pirate named Grant DeNasty. Together the team traversed the dark halls of Castlevania, defeating the count and his countless minions. In 1777 a young child was born, and abandoned on a merchant ship with nothing but a headband with a mysterious crest, and the name Armund. The sailors raised the child on the high seas, and taught him the ways of being a sailor. Armund grew to be one of the greatest men that the merchant ship ever saw. Late 1797, word started to spread of the legends of Count Dracula, and his tyranny in the land of Romania. It was about that time, that Armund ran into an old Romanian man in Serbia. The old man knew a lot about the history of Count Dracula, and his reign of terror in Romania. The old man recognized the crest on Armund's bandanna, and told him that it belonged to the DeNasty clan, and that his ancestor helped defeat Dracula. Armund decided to leave his life on the high seas to seek out more answers about his ancestry. Romania, 1800. It's been 3 years since Alucard defeated his father in battle and has gone into eternal slumber. Armund's search has taken him to the mountains of Romania, not far from the town of Jova. A mysterious letter hinted that he might be able to find answers in the castle of Count Olrox, a servant of Count Dracula's. Armund set out of Olrox's castle, armed only with an enchanted barbed rope from Serbia. This will truly be the greatest and most arduous adventure of Armund DeNasty's life.

Castlevania Chorus of Mysteries est un hack de Castlevania. Souvent considéré comme l'un des meilleurs hack de la série, il bénéficie d'un level design radicalement différent de l'original et très réussi. Les musiques sont nouvelles également, même s'il s'agit parfois de reprises.

locale.title: Castlevania - Overflow Darkness
locale.synopsis: A fan-made "sequel" to Castlevania I created by Dr. Mario. A hack of the European version of the original NES Castlevania game. Features a Castlevania Chronicles like sprite for Simon

locale.title: Castlevania II : Simon's Quest
locale.synopsis:
Castlevania II: Simon's Quest is the second one of three Castlevania games released on the NES. After the vampire killer Simon Belmont destroyed Count Dracula in the original Castlevania (1987), an evil curse possessed him. The only way Simon can break the count's curse is to find five of Dracula's body parts (which are mysteriously strewn throughout Transylvania) and burn them.
Unlike most of the other Castlevania games, Simon's Quest does not feature the traditional stages but allows you to freely roam the land of Transylvania in the style of Nintendo's Metroid. In several towns Simon can talk with NPC's and buy items in shops, adding a touch of role-playing.

El protagonista del juego es el cazador de vampiros Simón Belmont, que después de derrotar al conde Drácula queda con heridas que le provocan una maldición. Para liberarse de la maldición, deberá recolectar cinco partes de Drácula (uña, hueso, corazón, anillo y ojo) y quemarlas. Estas partes se encuentran en las cinco mansiones de Drácula que aparecen en el juego y que para ser obtenidas deberá lanzarse una estaca sobre ellas. Cada una de estas partes de Drácula le brinda a Simon Belmont una habilidad especial. Al llegar a Castlevania, Simon deberá quemar las cinco partes de Drácula y deberá enfrentarse al enemigo final del juego: el propio Conde. Este juego cuenta con tres finales, que dependerán del tiempo que Simon tarde en pelear con el Conde.

Dans Castlevania II: Simon's Quest sur Nes, le célèbre chasseur de vampires Simon Belmont doit retrouver et détruire les restes de Dracula afin de lever la terrible malédiction qui pèse sur lui. Castlevania II reprend les éléments qui ont fait le succès de son prédécesseur, en y ajoutant un aspect aventure et une alternance entre le jour et la nuit. Méfiez-vous, les ennemis deviennent plus dangereux lorsque le soleil se couche !

locale.title: Castlevania III : Dracula's Curse
locale.synopsis: Taking place 100 years before the events of Castlevania 1 and Castlevania 2, Dracula the Vampire has risen up to threaten the small village of Warakiya. Citizens who had banished the Belmont family now beg for Trevor Belmont's help in slaying Dracula. In

La historia tiene lugar 100 años antes de los acontecimientos de Castlevania 1 y 2, Drácula el vampiro se ha elevado hasta amenazar a la pequeña aldea de Warakiya. Los ciudadanos que habían desterrado a la familia Belmont ahora piden la ayuda de Trevor Belmont para acabar con Dracula. En su extraño castillo, Drácula ha ido reuniendo un gran ejército de muertos vivientes para barrer la tierra de vida y traer la oscuridad eterna. Trevor se compromete a ayudar y se equipa con el látigo hereditario de su familia, el "Vampire Slayer", con el fin de destruir a Drácula.nnnnCastlevania III: La maldición de Drácula es un juego de plataformas de desplazamiento lateral. El modo de juego es casi idéntico al del primer juego Castlevania. El jugador toma el papel de Trevor Belmont que es capaz de moverse a la izquierda y derecha, saltar, atacar con su látigo hacia adelante y utilizar un arma especial. Estas armas especiales consumen corazones, que se pueden encontrar al derrotar a los monstruos o con la destrucción de las velas. Los Power-ups incluyen: una daga de lanzar, un hacha de lanzar, un cronómetro de parar el tiempo, un boomerang en forma de cruz y un frasco de agua bendita. Además, hay un doble disparo (II) y tiro triple (III) lo que aumenta el número de armas especiales que se pueden utilizar al mismo tiempo. Trevor es derrotado si su medidor de vida se acaba, y se puede encontrar un pavo asado power-up para reponerla. Trevor progresa a través de cada nivel tras derrotar a los monstruos y, finalmente, encontrarse con un enemigo final. En diferentes puntos de la partida, el jugador podrá elegir entre diferentes caminos, lo que determinará que niveles se juegan.nnnnAl final de ciertos niveles, el jugador puede encontrar a un compañero que puede ser contratado. Sólo un acompañante puede acompañar a Trevor en cualquier momento, aceptar un nuevo compañero significa rechazar al existente. Una vez reclutados, Trevor puede cambiar entre su propia forma y el del acompañante. Cada compañía tiene un medidor de vida independiente y tiene habilidades únicas, como poderosa magia, la capacidad de escalar las paredes o de vuelo. Estas habilidades también pueden afectar a los tipos de power-ups que aparecen en las velas y la función exacta de armas especiales.nn

Castlevania III : Dracula's Curse est un jeu d'action/plates-formes sur Nes divisé en plusieurs niveaux avec ennemis et pièges à volonté. Vous contrôlez Trevor Belmont, légendaire chasseur de vampires, armé du célèbre fouet Vampire Killer et de diverses attaques secondaires. Le jeu comporte 15 niveaux pour autant de boss.

locale.title: Caveman Games
locale.synopsis:
Olympic Games set in the stone age. Events include clubbing, dino-racing, fire-making, mate-tossing, saber racing and the dino vault.
Supporting up to six players, you must select your caveman from a total of six different characters with different backgrounds, all with different skills and drawbacks.

Juegos Olímpicos establecidos en la edad de piedra. Los eventos incluyen clubbing, dinoracing, hacer fuego, matetossing, carreras de sable y lanzamiento de dino.nnnnCon soporte para hasta cuatro jugadores (seis en la NES), debes seleccionar a tu hombre de las cavernas de un total de seis personajes diferentes, con diferentes procedencias, todos con diferentes habilidades y desventajas.

Caveman Games sur Nes est un jeu de sport qui vous permet de participer aux jeux Olympiques à l'époque de l'Age de pierre. Le titre propose différentes activités comme de la course en dinosaure ainsi que six personnages différents ayant leurs propres compétences. Un mode multijoueur est intégré et permet de jouer jusqu'à 6.

locale.title: Chack'n Pop
locale.synopsis: This game is the predecessor of Bubble Bobble and it's a platform game where a roundish yellow creature, named Chack'n, must fight against Monstas and Mightas. The Monstas hatch from eggs at the ceilings and the Mightas push a rock that is used as the game's timer. The eggs have three phases: if it's blue, it's completely harmless, if it's yellow it will pop within 10 seconds and if an eggs turns red it will pop almost immediately. Chack'n uses bombs to release the en-caged hearts and to blow up the Monstas. When the heart is released it will fly up and destroy the separator block between the level and the Mighta. Go to the Mighta and you are in the next level. After 14 levels there's a wedding between Mr. and Mrs. Chack'n.

This game is the predecessor of Bubble Bobble and it's a platform game where a roundish yellow creature, named Chack'n, must fight against Monstas and Mightas. The Monstas hatch from eggs at the ceilings and the Mightas push a rock that is used as the game's timer. The eggs have three phases: if it's blue, it's completely harmless, if it's yellow it will pop within 10 seconds and if an eggs turns red it will pop almost immediately. Chack'n uses bombs to release the en-caged hearts and to blow up the Monstas. When the heart is released it will fly up and destroy the separator block between the level and the Mighta. Go to the Mighta and you are in the next level. After 14 levels there's a wedding between Mr. and Mrs. Chack'n.

Chack'n Pop est un jeu d'action sur console Nintendo 8 bits. Vous incarnez un petit personnage jaune capable de marcher sur les murs et de lancer des bombes. Vous devez récupérer tous les oeufs d'un même niveau et éliminer tous les ennemis pour passer au suivant.

locale.title: Challenge of the Dragon
locale.synopsis: In the land of Lorin, Lady Ninita has been kidnapped by the evil necromancer Demiwind. Sir Burkelot has to fight his way through ten levels to be reunited with his lover. Having mastered the ancient art of Dragon Style Kung Fu, he has many types of attack at his disposal: a sword attack, knee to the chest for close range, a side kick for far range, a flying dragon kick and a shoulder butt. He can also pick up potions to launch magic.

En la tierra de Lorin, Lady Ninita ha sido secuestrada por el malvado nigromante Demiwind. Sir Burkelot tiene que luchar a través de diez niveles para reunirse con su amante. Después de haber dominado el arte antiguo del estilo del dragón de Kung Fu, que tiene muchos tipos de ataques a su disposición: un ataque de espada, rodilla en el pecho de corta distancia, una patada lateral, una patada dragón volador y el golpe de hombro. También puede recoger pociones para lanzar magia.

Challenge Of The Dragon sur Nes est un jeu d'aventure dans lequel vous incarnez Sir Burkelot qui doit retrouver sa bien aimée, Lady Ninita, kidnappée par Demiwind, un nécromancien diabolique. Maîtrisant l'art du Kung Fu, de nombreuses attaques sont à votre disposition pour lutter contre vos ennemis à travers les dix niveaux du jeu.

locale.title: Challenge of the Dragon (Sachen)
locale.synopsis: Challenge of the Dragon, aka Chinese Kungfu (similar to Double Dragon and unrelated to the Color Dreams game of the same name; credits show the Joy Van logo indicating that this was started before the Joy Van/Sachen merge. Chinese Kungfu version features a basic jump move instead of a jump kick.)

locale.title: Challenger
locale.synopsis:
One of Hudson Soft's earliest NES titles, Challenger is an arcade-style game that combines side scrolling, run 'n jump action with overhead, exploratory gameplay. The game consists of two parts.
The first level (or "scene") has you racing the clock to get to the front of a train, where a purple-faced villain is holding your significant other (or, perhaps just some anonymous princess). You have at your disposal a trusty throwing knife to take care of enemies. You will also have to dodge obstacles and jump gaps in the train. This section is taken from the earlier Hudson game, Stop the Express.
Scene 2 places you in an overhead, maze-like environment, where you once again have to fight the clock. This time though, you have to navigate your way through the area, in search of all the different "keywords", which are placed in different caves. Once you have cleared all the caves, the path will be open to the boss' final lair.

un bon petit jeu ou vous devez arrêter un train où le méchant Don Waldorado a enlevé votre belle, la Princesse Mari, alors armé de vos couteaux que le personnage lance vous allez tenter d?arrêter le train puis les poursuivre sur quatre niveaux en tout au travers des pyramides et de Waldorado Island jeu plutôt bien a essayer.

locale.title: Championship Bowling
locale.synopsis:
Championship Bowling plays like a standard 10 frame ten-pin bowling game with the objective to knock down as many pins with the bowling ball as possible.
After picking a lane (5 different designs), a character (4 different characters), and the weight of the bowling ball they will be using, the player is placed on the lane. To bowl the player first picks the location that the bower will bowl from and then, using the Control panel, the player must time it correctly to stop the ball at the desired angle and finally, time it correctly to stop the Power bar at the desired power. The power, and the weight of the ball determine how much effect the control has. Up to four players can play using the NES Four Score accessory with all players taking turns to bowl.

Después de elegir la pista (5 diseños diferentes), un personaje (4 personajes diferentes), y el peso de la bola que va a utilizar, el jugador se coloca en el carril. Primero elige la ubicación desde la que va a lanzar y luego, mediante el panel de la Control, el jugador debe pulsar a tiempo correctamente para parar dar el efecto deseado y, finalmente, el para detener la barra de potencia. La potencia y el peso de la bola determinan cuánto efecto tiene el tiro.

Championship Bowling sur Nes est un jeu de bowling où le but est de faire tomber le plus de quilles possible. Vous avez le choix entre quatre pistes de bowling et cinq personnages. Le poids de la boule et la puissance du joueur sont déterminants dans la réussite de la partie.

locale.title: Championship Lode Runner
locale.synopsis: A follow-up to the original Lode Runner, with identical gameplay. This package contained 50 of the most challenging levels ever designed, and was intended for expert players only. It did not include the level editor, you had to play through the levels in order, but a save-game option was provided (although you lost one life every time you restored).

Le titre d'action/réflexion Championship Lode Runner sur Nes reprend le même principe que le premier jeu mais s'adresse particulièrement aux meilleurs joueurs qui trouveront là 50 niveaux réputés pour être parmi les plus difficiles. Pas d'éditeurs de niveaux dans cette version, mais une fonction de sauvegarde. Attention, toute sauvegarde vous coûte une vie.

locale.title: Championship Pool
locale.synopsis:
Championship Pool is a pool game where players can 8-ball or 9-ball pool tournament that starts off with the BCA Regional Championship where the player must defeat 32 opponents in a first to four games match. If the player loses against any of the 32 opponents, they are then eliminated from the tournament. The winner of that then goes onto the World Championship.
All of the gameplay is done from a top down view of the table. The player moves an icon to indicate location they want to hit the ball too. To aid in the aiming, a ghost of the cue ball and the first ball that is hit is repetitively played out to show the path of the hit ball. With the all the shots there is a very small margin of error, but this is only notable when a long shot is played or a shot from a sharp angle and the ghost balls will randomly play out all the possible occurrences. The player can also change the power and spin of the played shot with the ghost balls will updating to show the outcome of those changes.
There are 4 different game modes that can be chosen, each with a different set of pool games. The different game modes and there games are:
1. Tournament: The player must defeat 32 different players in a first to four knockout tournament in 8-ball or 9-ball pool before going on to the World Championship. During the tournament the opponent is never actually is seen playing there shots. Instead, when it is the opponents turn, it cuts to an image of the player with a caption and then returns the control to the player with some balls removed and moved. This way the opponent can finish the game within 4 turns regardless of if they where snookered or not.
2. Challenge: It has many different pool games that are played, all with one player without an opponent. The games are:
1. 14.1 Challenge  After the break the ball is placed anywhere at the top of the table behind the line. At that point, the player can hit any ball but once the fails to hit a ball in a hole the game is over. If there is only one ball left on the table the rest of the balls are re-racked and play continues. At the end score is given based on the number of balls that where hit in the holes. The score are tallied up over 5 games to get the total score.
2. Eight Ball - After the break the ball is placed anywhere at the top of the table behind the line. The player must hit all the chosen set of balls (stripes or solids) and the 8-ball in one turn. The score is based on how many balls where hit in.
3. Nine Ball - After the break the ball is placed anywhere at the top of the table behind the line. The player must hit the 9 ball in one turn. The score is based on how many balls where hit in.
4. Equal Offence  Same as 14.1 Challenge but there is only one game played.
5. Three Pool  Only have 3 balls on the table. Score is based on how many shots it takes to get all three balls in with lower been better.
6. Speed Pool  Objective is to hit all the balls in as quickly as possible as a timer is timing how long the game takes. Any ball can be hit at any time and the player can miss the shot and not be penalised (other than taking longer).
3. Party: It has many different multiplayer pool games that are played with ether just 2 or 2 to 8 human players. The games are:
1. Eight Ball (2 Players)  A standard eight ball game with the players taking turns to play.
7. Nine Ball (2-8 Players)  A standard nine ball game with up to 8 players taking turns. First player to get the 9-ball in wins.
8. 14.1 Continuous (2 Players)  Players can hit any ball in for a point. If a shot is missed then other player plays. If there is only one ball on the table the pocketed balls are re-racked. Play continues until one of the players reaches the score chosen at the start of the game.
9. Ten Ball (2-8 Players)  Same as Nine Ball except with 10 balls.
10. Rotation (2-8 Players)  Only the lowest ball can be hit and the score for getting a ball in is the value of the ball (e.g. 8-ball is 8 points). Player with the highest score at the end of the game wins.
11. Straight Pool (2 Players)  Same as 14.1 Continuous but the player with the highest score after one game wins.
12. Equal Offence (2-8 Players)  Same as Equal Offence in challenge mode but players can take turns to beat each others score.
13. Fifteen Ball (2-8 Players)  Same as Rotation except that any ball can be hit not just the lowest.
14. One Pocket (2 Players)  The two players are given one of the two pockets at the end of the table. The player must hit all the balls in there nominated pocket with the one with the most balls wins.
Three Ball (2-8 Players)  Same as Three Ball in challenge mode but players can take turns to beat each others score.
15. Speed Ball (2-8 Players)  Same as Speed Ball in challenge mode but players can take turns to beat each others score.
4. Freestyle: Lets the player practice with no opponent, no penalties, the ability to move any ball to the desired location (or remove by throwing the ball in the pocket), and the ability to place potted balls back on the table.

Aquí tienes un juego de billar para jugar contra tus amigos - sin trucos - con riffs de rock 'n' roll bailando en tus tímpanos. Todas las emociones de uno de los juegos más populares del mundo es tuyo cuando quieras y nunca tendrás que esperar una mesa. Championship Pool te ofrece toda la emoción del juego de billar puro, con características únicas que no puedes encontrar en ningún otro producto de billar electrónico. Y este juego de billar está oficialmente respaldado por el Billiard Congress of America. Sumérgete contra la consola o desafía hasta 7 oponentes humanos usando la opción Party Pool. ¿Crees que eres un tiburón? Pruebe el Modo Torneo, donde sólo los mejores jugadores califican para el torneo del campeonato mundial. ¡Juega a 8 bolas, 9 bolas, o más de 15 juegos diferentes!
un jeu de billiard avec des boules qui ne tourne pas vraiment rond.

locale.title: Championship Rally
locale.synopsis:
Championship Rally brings you all the thrills and chills of high-stakes motor racing! A choice of courses, a variety of weather and track conditions, and the ability to customize all the features of your car set this racing game above all others!
Not released in North America.
Juego de rallys visto desde arriba. Para convertirte en campeón tendrás que conseguir la mejor puntuación en las 34 pistas del campeonato.

Championship Rally sur Nes est un jeu de courses qui contient plusieurs modes ainsi qu'une dizaine du circuits différents. Les voitures sont classées en trois groupes : N, A, S et ont chacune des caractéristiques différentes.

locale.title: Chaos World
locale.synopsis:
The king's daughter is seriously ill, and the kingdom is plagued by monsters. The king needs you, the offspring of the brave warrior Mars, to go on a journey and to investigate the matter. During this investigation, you uncover a much more sinister plot and must face the dark forces of the world.
"Chaos World" allows you to customize your character by choosing one of the several classes, gender, and statistics (you can allocate available skill points at your wish in the beginning of the game). Up to fourteen characters can join your party, and you can recruit people in adventurer guilds. The game also features a day/night cycle.

La fille du roi est gravement malade et le royaume est en proie à des monstres. Le roi a besoin de vous, la progéniture du courageux guerrier Mars, pour faire un voyage et enquêter sur l'affaire. Au cours de cette enquête, vous découvrez un complot beaucoup plus sinistre et devez affronter les forces obscures du monde.
"Chaos World" vous permet de personnaliser votre personnage en choisissant l'une des nombreuses classes, le sexe et les statistiques (vous pouvez allouer des points de compétences disponibles à votre souhait au début du jeu). Jusqu'à quatorze personnages peuvent rejoindre votre groupe et vous pouvez recruter des personnes dans des guildes d'aventuriers. Le jeu comporte également un cycle jour / nuit.

locale.title: Chase
locale.synopsis: You play as a green faced thief and must move around in a Pacman like maze collecting all the golden gems to finish the level. Just watch out for the enemy police around you that increase in number with each level, or it's a life lost!

Juega como un ladrón de cara verde que debe moverse en un laberinto tipo Pacman para recoger todas las gemas de oro y terminar el nivel. Sólo ten cuidado con la policía enemiga que te rodea, que aumenta en número a cada nivel, ¡o es una vida perdida!

Vous incarnez un voleur vert et vous devez vous déplacer dans un Pacman like en collectant toutes les gemmes dorés pour terminer le niveau. Faites attention à la police ennemie autour de vous qui augmente en nombre à chaque niveau, ou c'est une vie perdue!

Você joga como um ladrão de rosto verde e deve se mover em um labirinto estilo Pacman coletando todas as gemas de ouro para terminar a fase. Apenas cuidado com a polícia inimiga ao seu redor que aumenta em número com cada fase, ou é uma vida perdida!

locale.title: CheetahMen II
locale.synopsis: Dr. Morbis is out to destroy the Cheetahmen with all new traps and dangers. It is up to the Cheetahmen to make their way to Dr. Morbis' secret (and heavily guarded) laboratory to battle Dr. Morbis and his sub-humans (including the new, powerful ape-man). Cheetahmen II is a side scrolling platform game with arcade style action. There are three different Cheetahmen to control, a different one every second level.

El Dr. Morbis busca destruir a los Cheetahmen con todas las nuevas trampas y peligros. Corresponde a los Cheetahmen avanzar hasta el secreto y fuertemente custodiado Laboratorio del Dr. Morbis para luchar contra él y sus sub-humanos (incluyendo el nuevo y poderoso hombre-mono). nnCheetahmen II es un juego de plataformas de desplazamiento lateral con la acción de estilo arcade. Hay tres Cheetahmen diferentes para controlar, uno diferente cada segundo nivel.

Dans le jeu d'action Cheetahmen 2 sur Nes, vous devez faire sa fête au Dr.Morbis ! Traversez la jungle pour trouver le laboratoire secret du Docteur et incarnez chacun des Cheetahmen. Nombreux sbires et pièges vous attendent dans ce jeu d'arcade orienté action.

locale.title: Chess Academy
locale.synopsis: Chess Academy is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Thin Chen Enterprises and published by Sachen, which was released in Asia in 1991.
Chess Academy es un juego misceláneo, desarrollado por Thin Chen Enterprises y publicado por Sachen, que fue lanzado en Asia en 1991.
Chess Academy est un jeu d'échec, développé par Thin Chen Enterprises et publié par Sachen, qui a été publié en Asie en 1991.

locale.title: The Chessmaster
locale.synopsis:
The Chessmaster is a game where the player has the chance to play against the CPU controlled Chessmaster at a standard game of chess.
To play the game the player must pick up the chess pieces with there hand cursor and place it in the desired location, within the rules a standard chess game. There are 16 different difficulty levels that includes 2 beginner levels, 13 standard levels (ranging from an average of 5 seconds to 4.5 minutes per shot depending on level), and a infinite level that will keep thinking of a shot until a perfect shot can be made or it is forced to move. There is also a teaching mode that shows the player all the possible moves with the selected piece. Two players can play each other with two controllers and there is also an option of letting the Chessmaster play itself.

The Chessmaster es un juego donde el jugador tiene la oportunidad de jugar contra el Chessmaster controlado por la CPU en un juego estándar de ajedrez.nnnnPara jugar el juego el jugador debe recoger las piezas de ajedrez con la mano del cursor y colocarlas en el lugar deseado, dentro de las reglas de un juego de ajedrez estándar. Hay 16 niveles de dificultad, que incluyen 2 niveles para principiantes, 13 niveles estándar (que van desde un promedio de 5 segundos a 4,5 minutos por movimiento según el nivel), y un nivel infinito en el que puede seguir pensando hasta que encuentre un movimiento perfecto o se ve obligado a mover. También hay un modo de enseñanza que muestra al jugador todos los movimientos posibles con la pieza seleccionada. Dos jugadores pueden jugar entre sí con dos controladores y también hay una opción de dejar que el Chessmaster juegue solo.

Chessmaster est un jeu où le joueur a la chance de jouer contre un processeur à un jeu d'échecs standard. Pour jouer, le joueur doit ramasser les pièces d'échecs avec le curseur en forme de main et le placer à l'endroit désiré, dans les règles du jeu d'échecs standard. Il y a 16 niveaux de difficulté différents qui incluent 2 niveaux de débutant, 13 niveaux standard (allant d'une moyenne de 5 secondes à 4,5 minutes par coup selon le niveau) et un niveau infini qui continuera à penser à un coup jusqu'à ce qu'un coup parfait puisse être jouer. Il ya aussi un mode d'enseignement qui montre au joueur tous les mouvements possibles avec la pièce sélectionnée. Deux joueurs peuvent jouer entre eux avec deux contrôleurs.

game.name: Chester Field - Ankoku Shin E No Chousen

locale.title: Chester Field - Ankoku Shin E No Chousen
locale.synopsis: Episode II: Once upon a time there was the kingdom of Guldred, that had been reigned by Gulse I. All his glory brought peace and joy to people.One day, the assassination of Gulse I changed the land of peace into the battleground. That was plotted by General Guemon. It was the critical moment of the Guldred kingdom. Under the circumstances, Gazem, an old knight advised Queen Liza and Princess Karen to ask Backviser for help. Backviser was King Gulse's old friend, who lived in the island of Chester Field. Liza and Karen decided to go there with Gazem. On their way to the island, unfortunately, their ship was attacked by Guemon's men. Gazem fought bravely against the pirates in vain; he got badly wounded and Liza was killed, and what is worse, Princess Karen was imprisoned somewhere in the island of Chester Field. The wounded knight drifted to the island, where he was treated by a young man named Kein. Gazem, however, breathed his last and after he told Kein all of his story. Deeply moved by his story, Kein decided to go on a journey to reconstruct the Guldred kingdom. He had to rescue Princess Karen from the hand of the enemy and to fight against Guemon. And then, the story of the young knight was beginning with the island of Chester Field....

Episode II: Il était une fois le royaume de Guldred, sur lequel règnait Gulse I. Toute sa gloire apportait la paix et la joie aux gens. Le jour de l'assassinat de Gulse I cette terre de paix se transforma en champ de bataille. Ce crime fut commis par le général Guemon. Ce fut le moment critique du royaume de Guldred. Dans ces circonstances, Gazem, un ancien chevalier, conseilla à la reine Liza et à la princesse Karen de demander de l'aide à Backviser. Backviser était le vieil ami du roi Gulse, qui vivait dans l'île de Chester Field. Liza et Karen décidèrent donc d'y aller avec Gazem. Sur le chemin vers l'île, malheureusement, leur navire fut attaqué par les hommes de Guemon. Gazem se battit courageusement contre les pirates, mais en vain. Il fut gravement blessé, Liza fut tuée, et pire encore, la princesse Karen fut emprisonnée quelque part dans l'île de Chester Field. Le chevalier blessé dériva jusqu'à l'île, où il a fut soigné par un jeune homme nommé Kein. Gazem, cependant, rendu son dernier soupir après avoir raconté à Kein toute son histoire. Profondément ému par son histoire, Kein décida d'entreprendre un voyage pour reconstruire le royaume de Guldred. Il devait sauver la princesse Karen de la main de l'ennemi et se battre contre Guémon. L'histoire du jeune chevalier commença sur l'île de Chester Field ....

locale.title: Chester Field : Ankoku Shin e no Chousen
Chibi Maruko-chan - Uki Uki Shopping
locale.synopsis: Chibi Maruko-Chan: Uki Uki Shopping is a simple board game for the Famicom, geared towards kids. The premise is to travel the map to reach a certain landmark before the others, all while buying souvenirs at these locations along the way. There really isn't anything to the game, since your results are not saved or carried over to a new map; when you win the current game, that's all there is. The gameplay and general concept is simple with the inclusion of special cards you can receive to affect the others or yourself. In addition to gaining Yen, you can also gain Happiness Points, which you gain by buying souvenirs and sending them home to enjoy.

locale.title: Chiisana Obake - Acchi Socchi Kocchi
locale.synopsis: Atchi, Kotchi and Sotchi must run around eating all the apples. When all the boxes are empty, you win the level. Collect the power-ups before they disappear.

Atchi, Kotchi et Sotchi doivent courir à travers les niveaux afin de manger toutes les pommes. Quand toutes les cases sont vides, vous gagnez le niveau.Il faut également recueillir les power-ups avant qu'ils ne disparaissent.

game.name: Chik Bik Ji Jin - Saam Gwok Ji

locale.title: Chik Bik Ji Jin - Saam Gwok Ji
locale.synopsis: The game title, "Chik Bik Ji Jin - Saam Gwok Ji" translates to "Three Kingdoms - Battle of Red Cliffs". It is the NES version of the Arcade game Warriors of Fate. The game is based off of the famous Chinese history based novel "Romance of the Three Kingdoms". You can play as one of three generals whose mission is to stop the evil Cao Cao and his army. You can also play co-op with a friend as well!

Le titre du jeu, "Chik Bik Ji Jin - Saam Gwok Ji" se traduit par "Trois Royaumes - Bataille des Falaises Rouges". C'est la version NES du jeu d'Arcade Warriors of Fate. Le jeu est basé sur le célèbre roman sur l'histoire chinoise "Romance of the Three Kingdoms". Vous pouvez jouer comme l'un des trois généraux dont la mission est d'arrêter le mal Cao Cao et son armée. Vous pouvez aussi jouer en coopération avec un ami!

locale.title: Chiller
locale.synopsis: Chiller is a first person shooter for one or two players. Back in the middle ages a castle on the outskirts of town has been invaded by an evil force which is causing the dead to come back to life! You need to stop this force before it can create a large army and take over the town. As you make your way to and eventually inside the castle, numerous dead creatures will be trying to stop you. Each level has a monster counter, and you need to shoot this many monsters before the timer runs out to continue on. Each level also has 8 talismans hidden in it; you need to find and destroy these to stop the monsters from appearing. If you complete a level without destroying all of the talisman, you will need to return to the level later on. There are 32 talisman in all that need to be destroyed in order to rid the town of the monsters!

Chiller es un shooter en primera persona para uno o dos jugadores. Ya en la Edad Media un castillo en las afueras de la ciudad ha sido invadido por una fuerza maligna que está causando a los muertos volver a la vida! Tienes que derrotar a esta fuerza antes de que pueda crear un gran ejército y hacerse cargo de la ciudad. Según avanzas por el interior del castillo, numerosas criaturas muertas estarán tratando de detenerte. Cada nivel tiene un contador de monstruos, y necesitas disparar a tantos monstruos antes de que acabe el tiempo para seguir adelante. Cada nivel tiene también 8 talismanes escondidos en ella, que hay que encontrar y destruir para detener a los monstruos que aparezcan. Si completas un nivel sin destruir el talismán, tendrás que regresar al nivel más adelante. Hay 32 talismanes que necesitan ser destruidos con el fin de librar a la ciudad de los monstruos!

Chiller sur Nes est un jeu de tir qui se déroule aux abords et dans un château maudit. Votre but est de tuer les monstres qui se trouvent devant vous. Vous devez aussi détruire les talismans cachés dans les différentes zones de jeu. Il y a 8 talismans par niveau. Il faut tous les briser pour terminer le jeu.

Chinese Checkers (dames chinoises en Francçais) est un jeu de société se jouant sur un tablier (jeu) généralement circulaire ou hexagonal, sur lequel une étoile à six branches est représentée, comportant 121 emplacements au total. Les pions sont disposés dans les six triangles extérieurs d'une étoile à six branches, formant six groupes de dix pions, et permettant de jouer à deux, trois, quatre, ou six joueurs à la fois. Chaque groupe a une couleur différente. À deux ou trois joueurs, on peut jouer avec des groupes de quinze pions. Chaque pion est toujours sur un emplacement, et un emplacement n'est occupé que par un pion. Malgré leur nom, les dames chinoises ne sont pas d'origine chinoise. En 1883, l'Américain George Howard Monks invente un jeu nommé Halma. Le nom est dérivé du grec ancien qui signifie "saut"

locale.title: Chip 'N Dale : Rescue Rangers
locale.synopsis: The rescue rangers are tiny heroes. Consisting of two chipmunks, two mice and a fly... these heroes may be small but there's no case too big for them to take on. This game starts out simply enough, with a mission to rescue a small kitten, but soon escalates into a wider plot that pits the rescue rangers against their arch-nemesis, the feline kingpin, Fat Cat.
Las ardillas rescatadoras protagonizaron uno de los juegos más recordados en NES por sus coloridos gráficos y buenas ideas, que demostraban el enorme dominio que había alcanzado Capcom con la 8 bits.

locale.title: Chip 'N Dale : Rescue Rangers
locale.synopsis: Chip'n Dale Rescue Rangers sur NES est un jeu de plates-formes inspiré par le dessin-animé de Disney Tic et Tac : Les Rangers du Risque. Vous incarnez ici toute la bande de héros dans différentes missions, comme le sauvetage d'un petit chaton.

A Conexão Salva-Ação (Rescue Rangers) é um grupo de pequenos heróis. Composto por dois esquilos, dois ratos e uma mosca... esses heróis podem ser pequenos, mas não há caso muito grande para eles assumirem. Este jogo começa de forma simples, com a missão de resgatar um gatinho pequeno, mas logo se transforma em um enredo mais amplo que coloca o grupo contra o seu arqui-inimigo, o rei do crime felino, Gatão (Fat Cat).

locale.title: Chip 'N Dale : Rescue Rangers 2
locale.synopsis:
Following the first Rescue Rangers game, the Rangers' overcame the plot of their arch-nemesis Fatcat, and locked him up in the prison/pound. However, Fatcat's henchmen have sprung him from prison by blimp. Suddenly a television news anchor is reporting that there is a bomb threat in a local restaurant. The Rescue Rangers take it upon themselves to save the day only to learn that the whole bomb scare was a diversion in order to allow Fatcat to steal an artifact known as the Urn of the Pharoah. The team must track Fatcat and learn what he has in store for the stolen goods.
Like the previous game, Chip & Dale's Rescue Rangers 2 is a side-scrolling action game where 2 players can play simultaneously as Chip & Dale, or 1 player can control either chipmunk. Our heroes must conquer a series of oversized (from their perspective) stages in order to thwart Fatcat's nefarious schemes. For example, the first stage has the chipmunks hopping across the tables, chairs, and counters of a restaurant, and on through the kitchen. Many enemies try to slow the player's progress. The chipmunks' offensive ability is to pick up any of the copious blocks that litter the landscape and toss it in any of 5 directions (sideways, up, and diagonal-up). Along the way, there are scattered RR blocks for the heroes to collect. The other members of the Rescue Rangers -- Monty, Gadget, and Zipper -- are on hand to lend help out at key junctures.

Secuela de Las Ardillas Rescatadoras, siguiendo la misma formula de plataformas pero con gráficos mejorados, además de nuevas ideas para incentivar y alimentar el celebrado modo cooperativo con dos jugadores controlando a Chip y Dale.

locale.title: Chip 'N Dale : Rescue Rangers 2
locale.synopsis: Chip 'N Dale : Rescue Rangers 2 est un jeu de plates-formes sur Nes inspiré par le dessin animé de Disney Tic et Tac : Les Rangers du Risque. Le soft offre un mode Solo et un mode Coopératif. Chaque étape a été créée comme un jeu d'action en side-scrolling où Tic et Tac peuvent marcher, sauter et ramasser des objets comme des glands, des caisses ou des barils, qu'ils peuvent ensuite lancer à leurs ennemis.

Após o primeiro Rescue Rangers, os heróis superaram o plano de seu inimigo, Gatão, e o trancaram na prisão/gatil. No entanto, os capangas de Gatão o levaram da prisão pelo dirigível. De repente, um âncora de notícias de televisão está relatando que há uma ameaça de bomba em um restaurante local. A Conexão Salva-Ação aproveita para salvar o dia apenas para saber que todo o susto da bomba era uma distração para permitir que o Gatão roubasse um artefato conhecido como a Urna do Faraó. A equipe deve acompanhar Gatão e descobrir o que ele planeja com os bens roubados.
Como o jogo anterior, Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers 2 é um jogo de ação de rolagem lateral onde 2 jogadores podem jogar simultaneamente como Tico & Teco, ou 1 jogador pode controlar qualquer esquilo. Nossos heróis devem dominar uma série de fases enormes (de sua perspectiva) para frustrar os esquemas nefastos do Gatão. Por exemplo, a primeira fase tem os esquilos pulando pelas mesas, cadeiras e balcões de um restaurante, e pela cozinha. Muitos inimigos tentam retardar o progresso do jogador. A habilidade ofensiva dos esquilos é pegar qualquer uma das abundantes caixas que bagunçam a paisagem e jogá-la em qualquer uma das 5 direções (pelos lados, pra cima e diagonal). Ao longo do caminho, existem caixas RR dispersos para os heróis colecionar. Os outros membros da Conexão Salva-Ação - Monty, Geninha e Zipper - estão disponíveis para prestar ajuda em momentos-chave.

locale.title: Chip's Challenge
locale.synopsis: Chip desperately wants to join gorgeous Melinda's exclusive Bit Busters Computer Club, and he's ecstatic when she offers him membership! But there's a catch - before Chip can become a card-carrying Bit Buster, he must complete Melinda's challenge. Over 140 levels of fun and fast puzzling action!

Chip veut désespérément rejoindre le club exclusif de Melinda, le "Bit Bitters Computer Club". Il est en extase quand elle lui offre l'adhésion! Mais il y a un piège - avant que Chip ne devienne un Bit Buster porteur de cartes, il doit compléter le défi de Melinda. Plus de 140 niveaux d'action amusants et rapides!

locale.title: Chiyonofuji No Ooichou
locale.synopsis:
The player is able to customize their own sumo wrestler by giving him a unique appearance. Characters have a chibi appearance to them.
Items that can be added include are the eyes, ears, mouth, and nose. Once the customized wrestler is created, he must fight against other sumo wrestlers for the title of Yokozuna. There are two bars for each player that allow the player to fend off and deliver attacks. A tutorial mode is added that allows players to practice their moves against an AI opponent that is lower in intellect that the actual game's AI.

locale.title: Choplifter!
locale.synopsis:
Choplifter is a side-scrolling action/arcade game that puts you in command of an attack chopper. Your mission: Go behind enemy lines and rescue up to 16 hostages per level. Be careful, though, because tanks and enemy aircraft will try to stop you -- and they won't stop shooting while you are rescuing those hostages!
Originally released for Apple II home computers, Choplifter was later ported to the arcades and a number of video game consoles. Many imitators and homages would follow.

Choplifter est un jeu d'action / arcade à défilement latéral qui vous met aux commandes d'un hélicoptère d'attaque. Votre mission: passer derrière les lignes ennemies et sauver jusqu'à 16 otages par niveau. Soyez prudent, cependant, parce que les chars et les avions ennemis vont essayer de vous arrêter - et ils n'arrêteront pas de tirer pendant que vous secourez ces otages! Initialement publié sur Apple II, Choplifter a ensuite été porté sur bornes d'arcade et un certain nombre de consoles de jeux vidéo. Beaucoup d'imitations et d'hommages suivront.

locale.title: Choujikuu Yousai - Macross
locale.synopsis: In this side-scrolling shooter, players take control of a VF-1 Valkyrie and do battle with the forces of the Zentradi. The main goal is to enter the Zentradi ship and destroy its reactor core.The players Valkyrie can change its appearance and abilities by
Choujikuu Yousai - Macross est un shoot'em up sur console 8 bits Nintendo. Vous évoluez dans l'espace à bord d'un vaisseau qui s'améliore selon les options que vous récupérez dans le niveau.

locale.title: Choujin Sentai Jetman
locale.synopsis:
Choujin Sentai Jetman is based on the Japanese TV show which resembles the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers.
The game was developed by Natsume and plays quite similar to their other title - Shatterhand. Its a sidescrolling action game where the player has to shoot, kick, jump and duck to overcome a plethora of baddies. Before the player selects a stage, they have to select one of five heroes, each with their own amount of health and weapon type. They also have a limited use special attack that can clear the screen of enemies. At the end of each level the hero jumps inside a giant robot and engages in a one-on-one duel with the boss of that level.
The game features four difficulty levels (2 hidden), a password system, and a "Battle mode" in which the player can practice fighting against any of the bosses.

Choujin Sentai Jetman est basé sur l'émission de télévision japonaise qui ressemble aux Mighty Morphin Power Rangers. Le jeu a été développé par Natsume et la jouabilité est assez semblable à leur autre titre - Shatterhand. C'est un jeu d'action sidescrolling où le joueur doit tirer, kicker, sauter et grimper pour surmonter une pléthore de méchants. Avant que le joueur ne sélectionne une étape, il doit sélectionner l'un des cinq héros, chacun avec sa propre quantité de points de vie et d'arme. Ils ont également une attaque spéciale à usage limité qui peut supprimer de l'écran tous les ennemis. À la fin de chaque niveau, le héros saute dans un robot géant et engage un duel en tête à tête avec le boss de ce niveau.Le jeu comporte quatre niveaux de difficulté (2 cachés), un système de mot de passe, et un "mode de combat" dans lequel le joueur peut s'entraîner à se battre contre n'importe lequel des boss.

locale.title: Chu Da D
locale.synopsis: Chu Da D is an originally Japanese card game named daifug or daihinmin and known as President (or asshole) in its western version. It is a game for three or more, in which the players race to get rid of all of the cards in their hands in order to become "president" in the following round.

Chu Da D est le jeu du Président également appelé plus grossièrement le Trou du cul. Pour gagner au jeu du trou du cul, il vous suffit d'être le premier a n'avoir plus de cartes. Quand cela arrive, le jeu doit continuer jusqu'à ce qui ne reste plus qu'un joueur à posséder des cartes.

game.name: Chu Han Zheng Ba - The War Between Chu And Han

locale.title: Chu Han Zheng Ba - The War Between Chu And Han
Chubby Cherub
locale.synopsis: You play as a cherub on a mission to rescue his friends. Your point of view is from the side as you scroll the screen horizontally. You fly through the levels eating several different food items to keep your flight meter powered. You also have to dodge various enemies such as dogs,birds, and balloons. You can also shoot the dog type enemies with hearts from the cherub's Gau-Gau cannon.

Vous jouez un chérubin en mission pour sauver ses amis. Vous volez à travers les niveaux pour manger plusieurs aliments différents afin de garder votre compteur de vol alimenté. Vous devez également éviter divers ennemis tels que des chiens, des oiseaux et des ballons. Vous pouvez également tirer sur les ennemis de type chien avec les coeurs du canon Gau-Gau du chérubin.

locale.title: Obake no Q Tarou : Wanwan Panic
Chuck Yeager's Fighter Combat
locale.synopsis:
The greatest pilot in Air Force history needs a new wing man - Are you up for the challenge?
Then step right up and into the cockpit in the newest smash hit game for the Nintendo Entertainment System; Chuck Yeager's Fighter Combat! Your mission is to climb on board one of the raddest air craft ever created, the F16C Fighting Falcon, and prepare yourself for some of the hottest action around. Are you man enough to handle the Gatling funs and sidewinder missiles? Can you take the heat of the brigadier general as he critiques your every move?
