Are you bad enough to travel the world fighting for US freedom against gnarly Soviets? Well then you came to the right place! State of the art 8-Bit technology put YOU in the cockpit of this action packed flight sim. It's alright if you're too afraid to go alone, the two player mode will allow you to have a co-pilot man your weapons alongside of you!

Chuck Yeager's Fighter Combat fue un pretencioso simulador de vuelo de aviones de combate que se quedó en eso: pretencioso. En un primer momento puede sorprender el uso de modelos poligonales funcionando en nuestra NES, pero la verdad es que esta maquina finalmente se queda en un simple amago a la hora de realizar este tipo de calculos.

Le plus grand pilote dans l'histoire de la Force aérienne a besoin d'un nouveau co-pilote - Êtes-vous prêt à relever le défi ? Montez dans le cockpit du nouveau jeu à succès de Nintendo Entertainment System: Chuck Yeager's Fighter Combat ! Votre mission est de monter à bord d'un des avions les plus radicaux jamais créés, le F16C Fighting Falcon, et de vous préparer à l'action la plus chaude qui soit. Êtes-vous assez fort pour gérer les Gatling et les missiles Sidewinder? Pouvez-vous supporter la forte personnalité du général de brigade quand il critique chacun de vos mouvements? Êtes-vous si mauvais pour voyager dans le monde en luttant pour la liberté américaine contre les soviets ? Eh bien, vous êtes au bon endroit ! La technologie 8 bits vous met dans le cockpit de cette simulation de vol en pleine d'action. Si jamais vous avez trop peur d'y aller seul, le mode deux joueurs vous permettra d'avoir un copilote avec vous à vos côtés!

locale.title: Chuugoku Senseijutsu
locale.synopsis:
A fortune-telling game that uses Eastern mysticism to prognosticate on the player's future, based on their year of birth. Though fortune-telling devices weren't unheard of, this was the first NES "game" to provide such a service. It would, however, be followed almost immediately with Induction Produce's '89 Dennou Kyuusei Uranai; another fortune-telling interactive simulator.
The player can choose to receive their fortune in distinct areas of their lives, including romantic prospects, the best time to marry their partner and the outcome of their future business dealings. Due to the minimal impact and relative obscurity of Eastern horoscopes in the west, the game was never released outside of Japan, though the US would eventually receive their own equivalent with Taboo: The Sixth Sense.

locale.title: Chuugoku Taitei
locale.synopsis: AKA Millionaire II.

locale.title: Cloud Master
locale.synopsis:
You play a small character who floats about on a cloud and shoots small balls of energy at bad guys who fly at you from the left and right of the screen. You can collect powerups and visit shops to upgrade your offensive and defensive powers. There are a number of different stages which are punctated by a mini-boss half way through and a big (literally) boss at the end.
This is one of the only games ever made which features flying noodle bowls and bears with guns.

Dans le shoot'em up Cloud Master sur Nes, vous incarnez un petit personnage perché sur un nuage qui doit envoyer des boules de feu sur ses nombreux ennemis. Les adversaires sont aussi variés que des bols de nouilles ou des ours armés ! Des visites régulières dans une boutique permettront au héros d'améliorer son attaque et sa défense.

locale.title: Circus Caper
locale.synopsis:
A boy named Tim and his little sister Judy go to a circus. They want to buy tickets to enter the circus, but they only have money for one ticket, so only Judy goes in. After the show, the boy is at the exit to meet Judy when she comes out, but when she doesnt the boy sneaks into the circus to rescue his sister from the ringmaster Mr. Magic who has taken her hostage.
The game is a platformer, you must get past many clowns, tight rope artists, and make it over water by jumping on top of alligators. You can also go into small tents to play mini-games.

Un muchacho llamado Tim y su hermana menor Judy van a un circo. Ellos quieren comprar tickets para entrar en el circo, pero sólo tienen dinero para un boleto, por lo que sólo Judy entra. Después del espectáculo, el niño está en la salida esperando a Judy, pero al ver que no sale, se escabulle en el circo para rescatar a su hermana de Mr. Magic que la ha tomado el rehén.nnnnEl juego es un juego de plataformas, tienes que superar a muchos payasos, trapecistas, y saltar sobre el agua saltando en la parte superior de los caimanes. También puedes ir a pequeñas carpas para jugar a minijuegos.

Cirque Caper, connu sous le nom de Moeru! On san au Japon, est le titre d'un jeu vidéo Nintendo Entertainment System où le joueur contrôle un jeune garçon dans une quête pour sauver sa soeur Qui a été enlevé par le cirque. Le jeu a été publié en 1990 par Toho et a reçu de mauvaises critiques. Il s'agit de la version occidentale du jeu Japonais "Moeru! Oniisan" même si de très nombreux éléments ont été modifiés. (cinématique, graphismes, niveaux, etc..)

locale.title: Circus Charlie
locale.synopsis:
You are Charlie, a member of a circus troupe. Your job is to please the crowd by performing five death-defying stunts:
Stunt #1: You and the lion must jump through several rings of fire. Remember to avoid the jugs that emit fire. You must do this for 100 meters.
Stunt #2: Walk the tightrope for 70 meters, avoiding the monkeys that get in your way. Jump the cyan monkeys for 500 points.
Stunt #3: Roll on a ball for 80 meters, jumping from ball to ball. You can move balls backwards if the target is too close to make a successful jump. Avoid contact with the ground.
Stunt #4: Ride a horse for 200 meters, bouncing on trampolines along the way. Be careful not to miss the jump or go over the tops of trampolines. You can speed up or slow down the horse.
Stunt #5: Finally, trapeze from swing to swing for 50 meters. If you miss, make sure that you land on the platforms below so you bounce back on a swing.
Once you have completed all five stunts, you have to do them again and hopefully, more points will be awarded.

Eres Charlie, miembro de una compañía de circo el cual deberá de superar 5 peligrosas pruebas para satisfacer a los espectadores: Pasar por aros de fuego a lomos de un león, andar sobre la cuerda floja esquivando a los monos, saltar de pelota en pelota, saltar los trampolines y volver a lomos del caballo, y finalmente ir de liana en liana. Cada vez que superes las pruebas tendrás que volver a superarlas pero con la dificultad aumentada.

Circus Charlie sur NES est un jeu d'action/course où vous incarnez l'acrobate d'un cirque. Votre but est de satisfaire les clients en réalisant des cascades où vous défiez la mort ! Vous devez par exemple sauter à travers des cerceaux en feu, faire du trapèze ou encore faire l'équilibriste sur une corde longue de 80 mètres.

game.name: City Adventure Touch - Mystery Of Triangle

locale.title: City Adventure Touch - Mystery Of Triangle
locale.synopsis: The twin brothers, Tatsuya and Kazuya Uesugi and their neighbor Minami Asakura get sucked into a alternate dimension while chasing after the twins dog, Punch. Now they have to find a way to return back to their normal home world.City Adventure Touch: Myst

City Adventure Touch : Mystery of Triangle sur Nes est un jeu d'action dans lequel deux jumeaux utilisent leurs battes de base-ball pour repousser les individus qui tentent de s'approcher de leur dulcinée.

City Adventure Touch: Mystery of Triangle é um jogo de ação e aventura para o Famicom que foi publicado pela Toho em 1987. O jogo é baseado no mangá Touch. O City Adventure Touch é um pouco notório no Japão por não ter absolutamente nenhuma semelhança com o material de origem. Uma revista em quadrinhos sobre o Mistério do Triângulo está incluída no manual. A história parece girar em torno do cão de um personagem que desaparece em uma dimensão alternativa e das três crianças que tentam resgatá-lo.
Todo este jogo é um grande quebra-cabeça, e não há como vencê-lo sem um passo a passo.

locale.title: City Adventure Touch : Mystery of Triangle
City Connection
locale.synopsis: Based on the arcade hit, you must drive along on roads, painting them a different color. When you have all the roads painted, you go on to the next level. Cops are frequent along the roads, but oil cans will quickly stop them in their tracks. Avoid cats and spikes, and collect balloons to warp to further levels.

Juego de Plataformas en el que debes conducir a lo largo de las carreteras, pintándolas de un color diferente. Cuando tengas todos los caminos pintados, irás al siguiente nivel. Los policías son frecuentes a lo largo de las carreteras, pero las latas de aceite te detendrán rápidamente. Evita a los gatos y los picos y recoge los globos para llegar a otros niveles.

Dans ce jeu d'action sur NES, un jeune homme né en Californie entreprend de visiter les sites les plus célèbres autour du monde. Au fur et à mesure qu'il conduit sur les autoroutes entourant ces sites, la route se peint en blanc. Tous les tronçons de route doivent être peints pour que le jeune homme puisse passer au lieu suivant. Mais la police locale tente à chaque fois de l'empêcher de réussir son but, sans oublier les chats errants et les pointes qui traînent sur la route.

locale.title: Clash at Demonhead
locale.synopsis: Professor Plum and his designs for the "doomsday device", DEAD END have been taken by the diabolical LAWBREAKERS - a sinister group dedicated to the destruction of mankind. It's only a matter of time before the device is assembled and the final countdown begins. As Sergeant Billy "Big Bang" Blitz of the special Assault Brigade for Real Emergencies(S.A.B.R.E) your mission is to foil the LAWBREAKERS plan. To do this, you must find the shortest route to the summit of Demonhead mountain, where the professor is being held. Rescue the professor and save the world from total destruction. This is a "typical" sidescroller with Role playing elements. the various enemies you meet with leave behind cash which can then be used to buy equipment. You'll need a diving suit to swim underwater, a jetpack to get to those hard to reach areas and don't forget the shop card that can be used to call the shop no matter where you are.

El Profesor Plum y sus diseños para el "dispositivo del juicio final", DEAD END han sido tomados por los LAWBREAKERS diabólicos - un siniestro grupo dedicado a la destrucción de la humanidad. Es sólo cuestión de tiempo antes de que el dispositivo esté montado y comience la cuenta regresiva.nnnnComo el sargento Billy "Big Bang" Blitz de la Brigada de Asalto especial para Reales Emergencias (SABRE) tu misión es frustrar el plan de los LAWBREAKERS. Para hacer esto, debes encontrar el camino más corto hacia la cumbre de la montaña Demonhead, donde encuentra el profesor. Rescatar al profesor y salvar al mundo de la destrucción total.nnnnSe trata de un juego de desplazamiento lateral "típico" con elementos de juegos de rol. los diferentes enemigos que encuentras sueltan dinero que puede ser utilizado para comprar equipos. Necesitarás un traje de buceo para nadar bajo el agua, un jetpack para llegar a las zonas de difícil acceso y no te olvides de la tarjeta de la tienda que se puede utilizar para llamar a la tienda, no importa dónde te encuentres.

Clash At Demonhead est un jeu d'action/aventure sur Nes dans lequel vous incarnez le sergent Billy membre de la Brigade Spéciale SABRE qui a pour mission de mettre fin aux agissements diaboliques du sinistre groupe Dead End. Ces derniers sont entrés, dans leur volonté de destruction, en collaboration avec le professeur Plum qui a mis au point une machine au nom évocateur : Doomsday.

locale.title: Classic Concentration
locale.synopsis:
Concentration was a popular game show in the mid-to-late 1980s, and this game was adapted from that television program.
Two players can play against each other, or one person can play against a computer generated opponent. The answer to the puzzle is hidden by tiles. The tiles have words denoting game prizes ("Mexico", "Camera", "Telescope", for example), and your object is to find the two matching worded tiles. Exposing two at a time, your memory is taxed as more prize tiles are revealed and then covered over again. As more tiles are matched, the hidden puzzle is revealed. Solve the puzzle and you win the game.

Concentration fue una Show de televisión popular en la década de los 80, y este juego es una adaptación de ese programa de televisión.nnnnDos jugadores pueden jugar uno contra el otro, o una persona pueden jugar contra un oponente generado por ordenador. La respuesta al enigma está oculto por las baldosas. Las baldosas tienen palabras que denotan los premios del juego ("México", "cámara", "telescopio", por ejemplo), y tu objetivo es encontrar las dos fichas de características determinadas. Según se emparejan más fichas, el rompecabezas oculto se revela. Resolver el rompecabezas supone ganar el juego.
Classic Concentration sur NES est un jeu de réflexion dans lequel deux participants sont soumis à de nombreuses questions diverses et variées qui offriront au vainqueur une coquette somme d'argent.

locale.title: Cliffhanger
locale.synopsis: Cliffhanger is based on the 1993 Sylvester Stallone movie. The lead character, Gabe Walker, is an expert in high mountain search and rescue and receives a distress signal from a plane that has crashed nearby. However, the plane is actually loaded with terrorists who hijacked a large shipment of cash. The game consists of side-scrolling action. The hero can walk, run, jump, punch, and kick while jumping. Further, he can perform special feats as the situation requires, such as crossing a rope suspended from 2 cliffs. One of the biggest threats in this game is nature as Gabe must defend against wolves and birds, snow falling off cliffs and structures, and falling rocks.

Cliffhanger se basa en la película de Sylvester Stallone Máximo riesgo de 1993. El personaje principal, Gabe Walker, es un experto en búsqueda de alta montaña y rescate y recibe una señal de auxilio de un avión que se ha estrellado cerca. Sin embargo, el avión está en realidad lleno de terroristas que secuestraron un gran cargamento de dinero en efectivo. El juego consta de acción de desplazamiento lateral. El héroe puede caminar, correr, saltar, golpear y patear mientras salta. Además, puede realizar hazañas especiales cuando la situación lo requiere, como cruzar una cuerda suspendida de 2 acantilados. Una de las mayores amenazas en este juego es la naturaleza. Gabe debe defenderse de los lobos y los pájaros, la nieve cayendo por los acantilados y las estructuras, y la caída de rocas.

Cliffhanger est l'adaptation sur NES du film du même nom sorti en 1992. Vous incarnez Gabe (Silvester Stallone) et revivez le scénario du film. Gabe doit escalader les montagnes, éviter les avalanches et éliminer les ennemis. Pour ce faire, il peut se battre à mains nues ou ramasser les armes de ses adversaires.

locale.title: Clu Clu Land
locale.synopsis: A unique puzzle game in which you play a fish like creature who must explore the many play fields collecting gold bars that form a picture. Enemies litter the field, which you can blast away with a wave of energy, removing them for a short amount of time from the game. You also need to grab onto the posts and walls to turn into the gaps on the field, adding an element of timing to the game.

¿Eres lo suficientemente inteligente como para desentrañar el misterio de Clu Clu Land? El malvado Sea Urchin ha escondido todo el oro de Clu Clu Land en un laberinto subterráneo misterioso. Todo depende de tí para encontrar el oro antes de que acabe el tiempo! Pero ten cuidado. El erizo de mar va a hacer todo lo posible para detenerte. Él va a colocar trampas para engañarte, al igual que te invita a su casa, donde te comerá vivo! O te hará rebotar contra la trampa de goma y aterrizarás sobre su espalda! Pero puedes controlar al erizo de mar atrudiéndole con ondas de choque eléctrico, y averiguar dónde está escondido el oro y pasar a una emocionante ronda de bonus.

Clu Clu Land est un jeu de puzzle sur NES dans lequel vous incarnez une sorte de poisson et explorez les divers terrains de jeu. Le but est de ramasser des barres d'or pour former une image au fur et à mesure. Des ennemis viennent souvent vous compliquer la tâche mais vous pouvez utiliser une vague d'énergie pour les faire disparaître temporairement et continuer de compléter votre puzzle.

locale.title: Cobra Command
locale.synopsis:
An arcade game from Data East, Cobra Command is a 2D, side-scrolling helicopter shooter in the tradition of Choplifter. Your mission: blast your way through six stages (Sumatra, Java, Borneo, South China Sea, Siam, and Enemy HQ) and rescue the hostages.
Along the way, you can acquire upgrades for your guns, missiles, armor, engines, and rescue equipment (ropes, ladders). You'll need them, as swarms of enemy soldiers, artillery, tanks, choppers, jet fighters, and warships stand in your way.

Un juego de arcade de Data East, Cobra Command es un shooter 2D de helicóptero de desplazamiento lateral en la tradición de Choplifter. Tu misión: avanzar a través de seis etapas (Sumatra, Java, Borneo, Mar de China Meridional, Siam, y el cuartel general Enemigo) y rescatar a los rehenes.nnnnEn el camino, puedes adquirir mejoras para tus armas, misiles, armaduras, motores y equipos de rescate (cuerdas, escaleras). Los necesitarás, para luchar contra enjambres de soldados enemigos, artillería, tanques, helicópteros, aviones de guerra y buques de guerra.nn
Cobra Command est un shoot'em up sur NES. Vous êtes aux commandes d'un hélicoptère et au cours des différents niveaux, vous devez exterminer tous les ennemis qui fondent vers vous.

locale.title: Cobra Triangle
locale.synopsis:
Cobra Triangle is a single-player boat-racing game that lets you do more than race. It borrows the power-up system from the shoot 'em up genre but keeps the emphasis more on maneuvering than shooting. Since you have a health meter with a dozen bars in it, it's not that important to dodge bullets unless your health is really low, but you should try not to run into too many walls. In order to get very far you need to make use of your power-ups which are TURBO for better acceleration; FIRE for increased firepower; SPEED for increased top-speed; MISSILE for firing missiles as well as bullets; and FORCE which makes you fire tons of missiles and also makes you invincible for a limited time. You get roughly one minute to complete each level. Speaking of which, there are 7 types of levels each with a different objective:
(1) Race to the Finish - Shoot other boats along the way to the finish line and avoid enemies like turrets and sharks. Some boats tow power-up pods behind them that you can collect after you shoot them. It doesn't matter when you finish, and you aren't told if you get 1st or 2nd or 3rd place... it seems that the other boats are only there to get in your way. Watch for the fork in the river; choosing alternate paths takes you to the same levels of the game but in a different order.
(2) Collect the Pods - Simply race in a straight path while running over ramps to collect pods and 1UP's in the air. You go on to the next level when time runs out.
(3) Dispose of Mines - There is a small square in the water with mines in it. You actually have to collect the mines and tow them to another square to make them explode. Of course, there is an invincible enemy boat that tries to steal them back from you and some guys that shoot at you. It takes awhile since you can only tow them one at a time.
(4) Fry the Monster - The 'boss' levels. You fight a sea-serpent, a crab, a shark, etc. He has his own health display right above yours, but it tends to deplete slower. (BONUS) Shoot the Targets - after every boss level you go to an auto-scrolling level where you are rewarded with a 1UP prize if you manage to shoot all the targets along the shore without missing any.
(5) Guard the People - There's a large square filled with 8 helpless swimmers, and for some reason they're all about to be kidnapped. Other boats race into the square and tow them away unless you destroy their ships before they get away. You can tow the people back into the square-if you have time-while avoiding the spaceships that fire stunning missiles at you. If you have at least one swimmer left when the timer runs out then you pass.
(6) Reach the Finish - Race in a straight course with plenty of obstacles but no other boats. You drive upstream while the current drags a horde of logs and whirlpools in your direction to stop you. Occasionally some planes fly by and shoot at you. If you happen to die in this or any other level, you simply reappear on the spot as long as you have an extra life. A continue puts you back at the beginning of the level you were on.
(7) Jump the Waterfall - A level that consists of a series of moving ramps you must use to jump over huge pits. Moving currents, whirlpools, and the violation of several laws of physics makes this more difficult than it sounds.
The entire game consists of repeating these types of levels for a grand total of 25 stages. The later stages are much more difficult than the first. They're filled with additional obstacles like icebergs, more mines, more enemies, and longer courses. There are even speed-ramps that let you take small short-cuts in later racing levels.

Juego de carreras de lanchas rápidas en el que no solo tendrás que participar en carreras sino que tendrás que superar hasta 25 fases en distintos juegos arcade como salvar náufragos, derrotar a un monstruo, etc.

Cobra Triangle est un jeu de courses de bateau sur NES. Évitez les projectiles et les murs et ramassez des bonus pour gagner la partie avec un maximum de points. 5 types de bonus sont disponibles et améliorent respectivement votre accélération, votre puissance de tir, votre vitesse maximale, votre armement ou encore votre blindage. Le jeu comporte 7 types de niveaux avec à chaque fois des objectifs différents.

locale.title: Cocoron
locale.synopsis: Tapir, an enigmatic blue wizard in spotted pajamas from the Dream World, sends the player on a quest to rescue princess Rua. But things quickly become more complicated and the player soon has to rescue other characters along the way, such as Santa Claus, the king of Trump castle and the blue fairy Cocoron. Tapir can manipulate people's dreams and this ability gives Cocoron an unique twist - the player can assemble his own character by combining one of the eight available heads to one of the eight available bodies (which both include several designs to choose from, resulting in literally hundreds of combinations! ). More than a mere physical appearance, each part also defines the character's attributes, such as his health, speed, how high he can jump and so forth.

Cocoron est un jeu d'action/plates-formes sorti sur console Nintendo NES au Japon. Dans ce jeu, vous créez votre propre personnage avant de vous lancer dans l'aventure. Vous devrez venir à bout de vos ennemis pour arriver au terme de chaque niveaux et ainsi libérer la princesse Rua, souveraine du monde des rêves.

locale.title: Code Name : Viper
locale.synopsis: Set against the backdrop of the war on drugs from the late 1980s/early 1990s, Code Name: Viper directly confronts the drug cartel at their bases in South America. You play an American secret agent who must infiltrate the cartel drug bases and mansions, free hostages and informants, and piece together clues about who the kingpin is-- and inevitably bring him down. Equip yourself with a progressively more powerful arsenal as the game progresses in standard NES side-scroller fashion.

Con el trasfondo de la guerra contra las drogas desde finales de la década de 1980 y principios de 1990, Code Name: Viper se enfrenta directamente al cartel de la droga en sus bases en América del Sur. Eres un agente secreto estadounidense que debe infiltrarse en las bases del cartel de la droga y en las mansiones, liberar a rehenes e informantes y armar pistas acerca de quién es el capo, e inevitablemente derribarlo. Equípate con un cada vez más poderoso arsenal según el juego progresa en forma de juego de acción de desplazamiento lateral.

Code Name : Viper sur Nes est un jeu d'action qui vous place dans la peau d'un agent secret américain qui a pour délicate mission de combattre le cartel de la drogue directement en Amérique du Sud. Vous devrez infiltrer des bases et manoirs, libérer des otages ou des informateurs et rassembler des indices afin de découvrir qui se trouve à la tête du cartel. Pour vous aider dans votre mission, vous disposez d'un arsenal conséquent et qui évolue au fil du jeu.

locale.title: Color a Dinosaur
locale.synopsis: Color a Dinosaur is an electronic coloring book designed for kids ages 3 to 6. The game provides 16 different dinosaurs which can be colored in with a variety of colors and patterns. There are two coloring modes available: free form mode where you control a pencil and select the region to be colored, or automatic mode where the computer selects a region and you only have to select a color.

Color a dinosaur es un libro para colorear electrónico diseñado para niños de 3 a 6 años. El juego ofrece 16 dinosaurios diferentes que se pueden colorear en una variedad de colores y diseños. Hay dos modos disponibles: el modo de colorear de forma libre en el que controlas un lápiz y seleccionas la región a colorear o el modo automático en el que el equipo selecciona una región y sólo tienes que seleccionar un color.

Color a Dinosaur est un livre de coloriage électronique conçu pour les enfants âgés de 3 à 6 ans. Le jeu fournit 16 dinosaures différents qui peuvent être colorés dans une variété de couleurs et de motifs. Il y a deux modes de coloration disponibles: le mode de forme libre où vous contrôlez un crayon et sélectionnez la zone à colorer, ou le mode automatique où l'ordinateur sélectionne une région et il vous suffit de sélectionner une couleur.

locale.title: Columbus - Ougon No Yoake
locale.synopsis: In "Columbus: Ougon no Yoake" you take control of young Columbus, who is dreaming to sail the seas and explore the world. You start at the age of 14, becoming a apprentice aboard an old ship, where you learn the basics of combat. Your ultimate goal in this role-playing-game is to discover the continent America, just like the original model Christoph Kolumbus. The Game can be played in two different modes. Either in "Normal Mode" or in "Historical Mode". The only difference of the historical mode compared to the normal mode, is that you have a limited ammount of time to complete the game. You start in December of 1465 and the game then ends by the end of 1492. The time ticks off, based on the number of steps you take, what means that you'll want to keep your steps as low as possible. Discover the new world and take your place in history!

Dans "Columbus: Ougon no Yoake", vous prenez le contrôle du jeune Colombus, qui rêve de naviguer sur les mers et d'explorer le monde. Vous commencez à l'âge de 14 ans, devenant apprenti à bord d'un vieux navire, où vous apprenez les bases du combat. Votre but ultime dans ce jeu de rôle est de découvrir le continent américain, tout comme le modèle original Christophe Colomb. Le jeu peut être joué dans deux modes différents, soit en "Mode Normal" soit en "Mode Historique". La seule différence entre le mode historique et le mode normal est que vous disposez d'un temps limité pour terminer le jeu. Vous commencez en Décembre 1465 et le jeu se termine alors à la fin de 1492. Le temps coïncide, avec les pas que vous faites, ce qui signifie que vous voulez garder vos pas aussi bas que possible. Découvrez le nouveau monde et prenez votre place dans l'histoire!

In "Columbus: Ougon no Yoake" übernimmst du die Rolle des 14 jährigen, jungen Christoph Kolumbus, der davon träumt große Abenteuer zu erleben und über die Weltmeere zu Segeln. Das große Ziel dieses Rollenspiels ist es den Kontinent Amerika zu entdecken. Der Anfang deiner Reise beginnt als Lehrling auf einem alten Schiff. Hier bekommst du die Grundlagen des Kampfes gezeigt und beginnst dein Abenteuer. Das Spiel kann in zwei Modi gespielt werden. Entweder im "Normal Mode" oder im "Historical Mode". Der einzige Unterschied des Historical Mode ist, dass du das Spiel innerhalb eines bestimmten Zeitrahmens erfolreich beenden musst. Hier beginnt das Spiel im Dezember 1465 und endet Ende 1492. Die Zeit wird an den Schritten die du im spiel tätigst gemessen. Jeder deiner Schritte lässt die Zeit ein klein wenig voranschreiten, was bedeutet dass du nicht allzu viel umherirren solltest, falls du dich für den Historical Mode am Beginn des Spiel entscheidest. Entdecke die neue Welt als Christoph Kolumbus, und nimm deinen Platz in der Geschichte ein!

locale.title: Commando
locale.synopsis: Several levels await your super-tough Commando in this arcade conversion. Armed with only a standard rifle and a few grenades you must take on hordes of Nazis. Some are wandering around in the open, while others have picked out hiding places, which you must approach from certain angles. Trees, rivers and bridges create a varied combat-like terrain and must be incorporated into your thinking. Extra grenades can be collected, and will definitely be required, as they allow you to kill form distance and thus avoid some enemy shots.

Varios niveles esperan a tu Comando súper duro en este juego de desplazamiento vertical. Armado con sólo un rifle estándar y algunas granadas debes acabar con hordas de nazis. Algunos están deambulando en abierto, mientras que otros han elegido escondites, que debes abordar desde ciertos ángulos. Los árboles, ríos y puentes crean un terreno variado de combate y deben ser incorporados en tu forma de pensar. Granadas adicionales se pueden recoger, y sin duda se requieren, ya que permiten que mates desde lejos y así evitar algunos disparos enemigos.

Commando est un jeu d'action sur Nes. Armé d'un fusil standard et de quelques grenades, vous devez éliminer des hordes de nazis qui fondent sur vous. Les arbres, les rivières et les ponts créent un vaste terrain de combat et doivent être intégrés dans votre manière de penser.

locale.title: Conan
locale.synopsis:
As Conan returns from another successful adventure, he finds that a band of masked warriors has destroyed his village and murdered his uncle, bad move. Now it's time for Revenge!
"Conan" is a 3D hack'n'slash action title which blends RPG elements by awarding experience points for each defeated enemy. Said points can be spent on a plethora of fighting skills which are then triggered via a simple combo system for spectacular results as you battle hordes of human warriors and supernatural monsters from beyond in your quest for revenge. Should you fall to a well placed blow, Conan offers you the chance to try and regain your honor in the domains of Crom, were a small arena fight can restore your honor and bring you back to life and continue the game or damn you to eternity should you fail.
Also available is a multiplayer Arena mode in which you can duke it out mano-a-mano with other human players as Conan or a selection of original characters. Features the original licensed soundtrack from the Conan movies by Basil Poledouris.

En una era sin precedentes, donde los reinos bárbaros batallan por la supervivencia en una tierra salvaje e implacable ... estás solo. Tú, el grande y poderoso Conan, nacido de sangre cimmeria pura, Reclamarás lo que debe ser tuyo ... el trono de Aquilonia. Sin embargo, ten cuidado! El viaje es muy peligroso, con enemigos y desafíos a cada paso. Demonios voladores y espíritus diabólicos arremeten, una ninfa te reta. Cada detalle del mundo Hyborean ha sido capturado en este juego de super-acción multinivel. Desde los bosques de Asgard a las Tumbas de Zamboula, siente la furia, la pasión, el poder ... de ser Conan!

Conan est un jeu d'action sur Nes. Vous incarnez un simple mortel qui a été appelé par les dieux pour détruire plusieurs créatures mythologiques ayant emprunté le mauvais chemin pour suivre le diabolique Dameron. Le jeu est aussi connu sous le nom Myth : History in the Making sur d'autres supports.

locale.title: Conflict
locale.synopsis:
Conflict is a turn-based, hex-grid wargame for the NES that can be played by one or two players. It is not a strictly historical wargame in which battles of the past are recreated using real-world geography. Instead, the two opposing sides (Blue vs. Red) fight it out across 16 imaginary scenarios with armies modeled on NATO and Warsaw Pact forces of the late 1980s.
The game alternates between two modes of play: a strategic/operational scale, in which players move their units around the hex map; and a tactical combat module for resolving unit-to-unit combats. In the tactical mode, human players have the choice of either issuing orders themselves or using the "auto" mode which delegates command to the AI. Splash graphics and text messages convey battle results.
By capturing towns and winning battles, the player gains "fame" points that can be used to purchase more and better military hardware. Every scenario ends only when the same, single victory condition is achieved by one of the two sides: destroy the opposing side's main battle tank unit in combat.
Winning any one of the first 15 scenarios yields a letter of the alphabet; together, the letters spell out the password that must be entered in order to play the final scenario.

Conflict es un juego de guerra basado en turnos para la NES que se puede jugar con uno o dos jugadores. No es un juego de guerra estrictamente histórico en el que las batallas del pasado se recrean usando la geografía del mundo real. En cambio, las dos partes enfrentadas ( Azul vs Rojo ) luchan por resolverlo a través de 16 escenarios imaginarios de ejércitos inspirados en las fuerzas de la década de 1980 la OTAN y del Pacto de Varsovia .nnnnEl juego alterna entre dos modos de juego: una escala estratégica / operativa , en el que los jugadores mueven sus unidades por el mapa hexagonal ; y un módulo de combate táctico para la resolución de combates unidad a unidad. En el modo de táctica, los jugadores humanos tienen la opción de emitir órdenes por sí mismos o mediante el modo "auto ", que ordenan a los delegados a la IA. Splash gráficos y mensajes de texto transmiten los resultados de la batalla .nnnnAl capturar las ciudades y las batallas, los jugador ganan puntos de "fama" que se pueden utilizar para comprar más y mejores unidades. Cada escenario termina sólo cuando la condición de victoria se consigue por una de las dos partes: destruir al tanque principal de la parte contraria en el combate.nnnnGanar cualquiera de los 15 primeros escenarios produce una letra del alfabeto; juntas, las letras deletrean la contraseña que deberás introducir para poder jugar el escenario final.nnnn

Conflict est un jeu de guerre sur Nes qui peut être joué par un ou deux joueurs. Le jeu utilise la géographie réelle mais les conflits décrits sont complètement fictifs. Les deux équipes inspirées des armées des années 80 s'affrontent à travers 16 scénarios imaginaires. Deux modes de jeu sont proposés : stratégie ou tactique qui permettent une approche différente des 16 niveaux du jeu.

locale.title: Conquest of the Crystal Palace
locale.synopsis: Long ago the Crystal Palace was a thriving kingdom, however the evil war spirit Zaras appeared one day and brought destruction to the lands! The people of the Crystal Palace left as Zaras and his henchman took over, changing the kingdom into a maze of many dangers. You control Farron, the hero of the story who needs to enter the Crystal Palace and destroy the bad guys in order to restore peace. The game is an action platform game that scrolls both horizontally and vertically. On each of five stages you'll need to fight various enemies throughout the varied terrain, and finally defeat the boss at the end. You'll start with just a simple sword, but additional weapons can be found or bought in order to help you out. If you get into trouble, you can also call your dog Zap onto the screen; he'll jump around causing damage to the enemies giving you a chance to escape. You may also come across Kim's shops along your journey. Here you can buy various items, including additional lives, replenish your health, more powerful weapons, and other useful items. To purchase items, you'll need money which can be collected after defeating enemies in battle.

Hace mucho tiempo, el Palacio de Cristal era un reino próspero, sin embargo, el espíritu de la guerra del malvado Zaras apareció un día y trajo la destrucción a las tierras. La gente del Palacio de Cristal vieron como Zaras y sus secuaces se hicieron cargo, cambiando el reino por un laberinto de muchos peligros. Controlas a Farron, el héroe de la historia que necesita entrar en el Palacio de Cristal y destruir a los malos con el fin de restaurar la paz . El juego es un juego de plataformas de acción que se desplaza horizontal y verticalmente. En cada una de las cinco etapas tendrás que enfrentarte a varios enemigos en toda la variedad de terrenos, y, finalmente, derrotar al jefe al final. Vamos a empezar con sólo una espada simple, pero las armas adicionales se pueden encontrar o comprar. Si te metes en problemas, también puedes llamar a tu perro Zap en la pantalla; que va a saltar alrededor y causar daño a los enemigos. También puedes encontrar tiendas en las que podrás comprar varios artículos, incluyendo vidas adicionales, reponer su salud, las armas más poderosas, y otros artículos útiles. Para comprar artículos, necesitará el dinero que se puede recoger después de derrotar a los enemigos en la batalla.nn

Conquest Of The Crystal Palace est un jeu d'action/plates-formes sur Nes. Vous y incarnez Farron le héros de l'histoire qui doit rentrer dans le palais afin de rétablir la paix. En effet le palais était autrefois le siège d'un royaume prospère mais c'était avant que le diabolique Zaras ne s'en empare. Farron doit affronter de nombreux ennemis et a la possibilité d'améliorer son équipement grâce à l'argent obtenu sur les corps de ses ennemis.

locale.title: Contra
locale.synopsis:
In the year 2631, a small meteorite has fallen into the Galuga archipelago, located 20km northeast off the coast of New Zealand. Two years later, a terrorist group known as Red Falcon has seized the island in preparation for an alien invasion. The earth's marines sent two members of their elite Contra unit, Bill Rizer and Lance Bean, to neutralize the terrorists.
As either, Bill (player 1) or Lance (player 2), the player must get to the end of each stage, shooting everything in sight, while avoiding enemy fire themselves. The player can upgrade their standard-issue rifle into one of four different weapons, including the powerful spread shot.

En el año 2631 un meteorito cayo sobre el archipiélago Galuga, situado a 20kms al noroeste de Nueva Zelanda. 2 años más tarde, el grupo terrorista Red Falcon se ha apoderado de la isla y esta preparando una invasión alienígena. Para acabar con la amenaza, la unidad de élite Contra envía a sus dos mejores comandos, Bill Rizer y Lance Bean, los cuales avanzaran por distintas zonas de la isla acabando con los distintos enemigos que saldrán a su paso.

Version japonaise & américaine de Probotector (donc sans armure). Bon jeu sur lequel on reste, à essayer. La version Américaine est bizaremment amputée de ses cinématiques et de quelques effets en jeu.

No ano de 2631, um pequeno meteorito caiu no arquipélago de Galuga, localizado a 20 quilômetros a nordeste da costa da Nova Zelândia. Dois anos depois, o grupo terrorista conhecido como Red Falcon capturou a ilha que estava em preparação para uma invasão alienígena. Os marines terrestres enviaram dois membros da unidade elite Contra, Bill Rizer e Lance Bean, para neutralizar os terroristas.
Controlando Bill(jogador 1) ou Lance(jogador 2), o jogador deverá chegar ao final de cada fase, atirando em tudo que estiver ao alcance, evitando o fogo dos inimigos. O jogador pode melhorar seu rifle padrão com uma das quatro diferentes armas, incluindo o poderoso S(spread shot).

locale.title: Contra Force
locale.synopsis:
Contra Force, a special forces team including Commando Burn, Smith, Beans, and Iron, protects Neo City from the terrorist group, D.N.M.E.
This is the third Contra game for the NES (and was released just after Contra III: The Alien Wars for SNES). There are five missions, involving both side-scrolling and overhead shooting levels. Switch between the four commandos and find secret passages, not to mention a large arsenal of weapons: rocket launchers, flame throwers, bazookas, land mines, rifles, time bombs. For one or two players.

Contra Force es un equipo de fuerzas especiales incluyendo a Commando Burn, Smith, Beans, e Iron, para proteger Neo City de la banda terrorista, DNMEnnnnEste es el tercer juego de Contra para la NES (y fue lanzado justo después de Contra III: The Alien Wars para SNES). Hay cinco misiones, con la participación tanto de desplazamiento lateral y niveles de disparos desde arriba. Puedes cambiar entre los cuatro comandos y encontrar pasadizos secretos, por no mencionar un gran arsenal de armas: lanzacohetes, lanzallamas, bazookas, minas terrestres, rifles, bombas de tiempo. Para uno o dos jugadores.

Contra Force est un jeu de tir sur Nes. Le jeu s'articule autour d'une équipe spéciale de lutte contre les terroristes. Il y a quatre personnages au choix, chacun avec son propre arsenal d'armes. Les caractères peuvent être modifiés durant le jeu en appuyant sur le bouton de sélection.

locale.title: Contra Spirits
locale.synopsis: Contra Spirits (also named Super Contra 3) is a pirated Famicom port of Contra III: The Alien Wars (Contra Spirits in Japan) for the SNES, made by Ei-How Yang (and possibly others) in 1995 and rereleased in 1996.

locale.title: Cool World
locale.synopsis:
A licensed game based on the live action/animation movie "Cool World"
You play Frank Harris and your task is to stop Holli Would from entering the real world.
You accomplish the levels by shooting doodles and collecting coins.
Gameplay is set by 4 World with 4 levels each.
Same as the movie, the game is based in cartoon graphics.

Un juego con licencia basado en la película de personajes reales y animación "Cool World"nnnnJuegas como Frank Harris y tu tarea consiste en conseguir que Holli Would entre en el mundo real.nnnnLogras pasar los niveles disparando garabatos y recogiendo monedas.nnnnLa jugabilidad está fijada por 4 mundos con 4 niveles cada uno.nnnnIgual que la película, el juego se basa en gráficos de dibujos animados.nn
Il s'agit de l'adaptation du film où humains et Toons se cotoyent. Résultat, un jeu de plateforme médiocre et très dur.

locale.title: Corre Benny
locale.synopsis:
The little bee, Benny, lives in a beautiful garden without having to collect honey. Benny has had to leave his house and go elsewhere for his honey. Benny will cross territories of other insects What kind of challenges will he have to face? We go to them with Benny.
A horizontal shoot em up in which you control a bee, there are power ups that upgrade the shot and the speed.

locale.title: Race America
locale.synopsis: Race America is a 2-car cross-country racing game. Either 2 players can compete on the same screen, or the computer can control the second player. The game provides eight colorful opponents to race against, each of whom is supposed to have distinct advantages in a race. Each race begins from a side-scrolling perspective as the 2 competitors speed out of the gate. After a certain distance, the perspective shifts to third person and the driver in the lead occupies the top half of the screen while the driver in second is relegated to half of the lower screen. Occasionally, the game also employs an overhead view. To add to the challenge, the game's cars have 6-speed manual transmissions which players must shift using the control pad, but not while pressing the gas button.

locale.title: Corvette ZR-1 Challenge
locale.synopsis: Corvette ZR-1 Challenge est un jeu de course sorti sur la console Nintendo NES. La particularité du jeu réside dans l'utilisation des différentes vue. Vous contrôlez votre bolide à l'aide du plus grand écran si vous êtes devant votre adversaire, un plus petit écran à gauche si vous êtes derrière et d'un autre en vue aérienne en plein écran si vous êtes à sa hauteur. On note sur cette cartouche la possibilité de disputer des courses à deux joueurs. Le gameplay quand à lui est difficile à prendre en main, vos talents de pilote seront à l'honneur, vous accélérez avec la flèche avant et passer les vitesses avec A tout en relâchant la pédale d'accélération. Vous devrez alors faire attention aux autres automobilistes et motards pour franchir la ligne d'arrivée avant votre adversaire.

locale.title: Cosmic Epsilon
locale.synopsis: An alien menace from the Epsilon Empire threatens to destroy life on Earth as you know it! Take flight and blast your enemies down in this rail shooter that is reminiscent of Space Harrier. Cosmic Epsilon puts the NES through its paces with a stereoscopic 3D mode and advanced background scaling.

Cosmic Epsilon est un jeu de tir sur Nes. Vous voilà aux commandes d'un navire spatial avec lequel vous devrez traverser tous les niveaux en éliminant le plus d'ennemis possible. De nombreux ennemis intelligents et tous différents les uns des autres vous attendent. Lors de vos missions, vous serez amené à traverser des champs de météorites et à explorer plusieurs planètes.

locale.title: Cosmic Wars
locale.synopsis:
Cosmic Wars takes you back to the Gradius universe as the 650-year long alliance between the Gradius empire and the Bacterions shatters and war breaks out again. The difference this time is that instead of fighting from the cockpit of your Vic-Viper starfighter you'll now be taking the commander's chair and take strategic control of your entire fleet.
The game is a turn-based strategy game in which you must first assemble your armada and then take them into outer space to defeat the enemy fleet. You view the action from a top-down galactic map and success in each phase rewards you with further cash which you can use to buy more ships. The game will continue until the enemy fleet is obliterated (or yours).
The game doesn't include a campaign, but instead provides you with a scenario designer from which you select the AI difficulty, which side you will take (you can play as either the Gradius empire or the Bacterions) the map you'll play and away you go. Features single or 2-player Vs gameplay.
C'est une simulation de bataille spaciale dans l'univers de Gradius. Le joueur peut choisir entre l'empire Bacterion ou les forces de Terran.

locale.title: Cosmo Police Galivan
locale.synopsis:
Cosmo Police Galivan puts the player in control of a human being armed with a beam blade, which is only able to attack monsters in close proximity. As the game continues, the player character can use different powers - some ranged - to take out enemies and progress further. Eventually, the player will have the option of becoming a metal-armored officer with considerably more fire-power, though this power-up state will vanish if too much damage is taken. The player character will also level-up after destroying so many enemies, improving their health and "cosmo points" - a stat similar to mana that is used to power the player character's special attacks.
The game's world is a network of caves that the player can explore for necessary items and bonus areas. The NES version expands this aspect, providing some Metroidvania-esque exploration. Some impediments are in place to restrict further exploration until the right item is found, as well.

Cosmo Police Galivan met le joueur dans la peau d'un être humain armé d'une lame faisceau, qui est seulement capable d'attaquer les monstres à proximité. Au fur et à mesure que le jeu continue, le personnage peut utiliser différents pouvoirs - certains à distance - pour éliminer les ennemis et progresser plus loin. Finalement, le joueur aura l'option de devenir un officier blindé en métal avec beaucoup plus de puissance de feu, mais cet état disparaîtra si trop de dégâts sont pris. Le personnage augmentera également de niveau après avoir détruit les ennemis, améliorant sa santé et ses "points cosmos" - une statistique similaire au mana qui est utilisé pour alimenter les attaques spéciales du personnage. Le monde du jeu est un réseau de grottes que le joueur peut explorer pour trouver les objets nécessaires et les zones bonus. La version NES élargit cet aspect, fournissant une exploration Metroidvania-esque. Certains obstacles sont en place pour restreindre l'exploration jusqu'à trouver le bon élément.

locale.title: Cosmos Cop
locale.synopsis: In 2010 A.D., invaders of the Beta Star in the Space of Strangers, attacked our Galaxy with the intention of colonizing the territory. One after another, Legions of Terror were dispatched to invade and occupy each of the celestial bodies. The headquarters of Universe Defense dispatched numerous defensive troops but all disappeared in the vast universe ... The Galaxy was about to be overcome by this evil power. As a last resort, the Commander of the Galaxy sent his best concoction arsenal, COSMOS COP, with the mission to destroy the invaders of the Beta Star and protect the Galaxy. To do this, Cosmos Cop must penetrate into space, destroy the installations of the Legion of Terror, completely annihilate the invader and regain peace for the Galaxy.
Juego arcade en tercera persona donde controlamos a un robot que se abre paso con sus disparos.

En 2010, A.D., les envahisseurs de la Beta Star, ont attaqué notre galaxie avec l'intention de coloniser le territoire. L'un après l'autre, des légions de terreur ont été envoyées pour envahir et occuper chacun des corps célestes. Le quartier général d'Universe Defense a envoyé de nombreuses troupes défensives mais toutes ont disparues dans le vaste univers ... La Galaxie était sur le point d'être vaincue par ce pouvoir maléfique. En dernier recours, le Commandant de la Galaxie a envoyé son meilleur arsenal, COSMOS COP, avec pour mission de détruire les envahisseurs de la Beta Star et de protéger la Galaxie. Pour ce faire, Cosmos Cop doit pénétrer dans l'espace, détruire les installations de la Légion de la Terreur, anéantir complètement l'envahisseur et regagner la paix pour la Galaxie.

locale.title: Cowboy Kid
locale.synopsis: In this game you play the role of a young gunslinger who travels the land fighting baddies and playing mini games. The main game play involves you moving around the towns horizontally collecting gold by hitting chest whilst at the same time killing the bad guys before they kill you. There is also an RPG element to it where you have to visit people in the towns in order to proceed like at the very beginning where you need to first acquire a knife and you are then able to smash the chest and get money in order to buy a key which in turn allows you to enter the Sheriffs building. Once you are made sheriff you can go to various towns hunting down an outlaw for the bounty money. There are also mini-games such as the shooting range where you have to shoot the bad guy targets whilst avoiding shooting the innocent bystander targets.

En este juego juega en el papel de un joven pistolero que viaja por el Oeste combatiendo a los malos y jugando mini-juegos. El juego principal consiste en ir por las ciudades recogiendo oro golpeando los cofres, mientras que al mismo tiempo matas a los malos antes de que te maten. También hay un elemento de RPG donde tienes que visitar a personas en las ciudades a fin de proceder al igual que al comienzo donde tienes que adquirir primero un cuchillo y conseguir dinero para comprar una llave que a su vez te permite entrar en el edificio del Sheriff. Una vez que te hagas sheriff puedes ir a varios pueblos a cazar un bandido para el dinero de la recompensa. También hay mini-juegos, como el campo de tiro en el que tienes que disparar a los objetivos y al mismo tiempo evitar disparar a los objetivos inocentes.

Cowboy Kid est un jeu d'action sur Playstation 2. Incarnez un cowboy errant qui tente d'arrêter le plus de criminels possible. Visitez de nombreuses villes afin de retrouver l'or qui a été dérobé par vos ennemis. Dans chaque ville, vous avez la possibilité d'acheter de l'équipement tels que des couteaux, des colts ou encore des revolvers. Aidez aussi le shérif à capturer des hors-la-loi pour pouvoir toucher la prime.

locale.title: Crackout
locale.synopsis:
In the year 30XX, the mankind has exhausted all the metal resources on the Earth, so they had to travel into space in order to find more. They find a planet high in minerals, and they name it Selim.
But soon they discover that there is someone watching, spying on them; it's some kind of alien race. These aliens find a hole in the humans' main computer and get inside it. The computer, programmed to self-destruct in case of a failure, starts its countdown.
There is only one way to avoid self-destruction, which is entering a 14 digit code into the machine; but these digits are hidden in the walls of the corridors in the complex. Your mission is to find these letters and avoid self-destruction, aboard the "Red Warrior", and using your only weapon, an energy ball.
Crackout is an Arkanoid clone for the NES, but it's probably one of the most singular clones. You'll have to destroy all blocks but also the walls surrounding them, as the 14 letters are spread inside them, apart from killing the alien bosses here and there. In your way, you will find a bizarre mixture of enemies, from alien forms to parts of the body (eyes, lips, skulls...), who will make your game tougher by changing the direction of your ball; but also happier by dropping a sweet variety of power-ups such as the cherries (extra life), the clock (the enemies freeze), a rocket (to throw into the blocks), a fire device (the ball fires missiles), a parachute (slows the ball) an extra ball, or the weirdest of them all, the so-called Konami Man, who will take you to a secret parallel complex with different (and harder) levels.

Crack Out est un casse-briques sur Nes. L'histoire vous emmène en l'an 3000, l'humanité a épuisé toutes ses ressources en métal et voyage à travers l'espace à la recherche d'une planète ayant des gisements exploitables. Ce voyage les mène vers Selim une planète riche en minéraux mais les autochtones qui ne sont pas d'accord vont réagir en sabotant l'ordinateur et lancer l'autodestruction. Votre mission consiste à retrouver le code de 14 lettres dans la base pour annuler l'autodestruction.

locale.title: Crash 'n' the Boys : Street Challenge
locale.synopsis:
Another tournament composed of several different challenges rocks the streets near Nekketsu High and since the series hero Kunio isn't going to turn down a challenge anytime soon, every gang in the city sends its team hoping to come up on top.
Crash 'N the Boys: Street Challenge features the same basic gameplay engine and mechanics found in the rest of the Kunio/Nekketsu High games. The player controls a character in side-scrolling levels and try to defeat opponents using an arsenal of attacks and special moves. Unique to this game is that in order to clear the five stages, the player must also accomplish a series of sport-themed objectives. There is a throwing event, a golfing event, swimming, jumping, and all-out fighting events, all with unique twists inspired by the street/gangs theme of the game (e.g. the jumping event involves jumping across the rooftops in the city).
Depending on the player's performance in each event they may earn medals that can be exchanged for power-ups and stat increases. The game supports two players co-op or vs. gameplay.

Crash'n The Boys - Street Challenge (Bikkuri Nekketsu Shin Kiroku! Harukanaru Kin Medal en japonais) met en scène des épreuves d'athlétisme : 40 mètres haies, lancer du marteau, natation, cross sur toit d'immeubles et Judo. Il s'agit du huitième épisode sur NES de la prolifique série « Nekketsu Koha Kunio-kun » qui peut à peu près être traduit par « le voyou Kunio du lycée Nekketsu » et qui a offert une douzaine de titres à la NES (Renegade, Nintendo World Cup, Crash 'n the Boys: Street Challenge, etc..). Kunio du lycée Nekketsu et son éternel rival et acolyte Riki du lycée Hanazono vont s'affronter une fois de plus lors des jeux inter-écoles, les lycées Reiho et Rengo sont également dans la compétiton, chaque lycée étant représenté par une délégation de cinq athlètes. Dans la version américaine Kunio est rebaptisé Jeff "Crash" Cooney et est le leader des Southside Boys qui ont à nouveau remporté le meeting de la ville face aux snobs des collines mais Theodore "Todd" Thornley troisième du nom (le Riki du lycée Hanazono americanisé) soutenu par la fondation de son père lance un defi à Crash Cooney, des nouvelles épreuves où tous les coups sont permis. Les tenus de lycéens sont remplacés par des tenues plus urbaines et les décors des épreuves ont été modifié.

locale.title: Bikkuri Nekketsu Shin Kiroku! : Harukanaru Kin Medal

game.name: Crayon Shin-chan - Ora To Poi Poi

locale.title: Crayon Shin-chan - Ora To Poi Poi
locale.synopsis: The game is a simple card game with a Tetris element. The layout is similar to a Tennis court with both players on either sides defending their goal, while stacks of cards are positioned in the center. Players must move Shin up and down sliding cards, in two's, to the center pile matching up symbols and push each stack back to the opponent's side in an attempt to over take their goal.

locale.title: Crayon Shin-chan : Ora to Poi Poi
Crazy Climber
locale.synopsis:
As Crazy Climber, climb your way to the top of a series of buildings, where a helicopter is waiting to pick you up and take you to the next building. As Climber scales a building, he is able to climb up and sideways but he cannot climb down. While climbing a building, windows will open and close simultaneously. If any window closes on either of his hands he will lose his grip. However, if a window closes on both of his hands, he will fall to his death, resulting in the loss of a life. You have three Climbers in total, but you are awarded an extra Climber every 30,000 points. Besides windows, Climber is faced with other dangers, including:
1. Bald-headed guys who hurl various objects at you. 2. Pesky condors who fly by, dropping eggs and droppings of an unpleasant substance. 3. Falling steel girders and iron dumbells. 4. Electrical "Nichibutsu" signs with a dangling live wire. 5. Falling "Crazy Climber" signs. 6. King Kong leaping from side to side of the building and slams his hands against the windows.
The climber must try to avoid or overcome each of those hazards which he will encounter as he continues climbing in his attempt to reach the rooftop. If he falls to his death by windows or objects, another climber will replace him and will start at the same location where the last one fell. The specific danger will not be present at the same point, so the climber can go further up to face the next danger. Most of the hazards are announced by certain recognizable musical themes.
Crazy Climber is awarded a bonus score on each building every time after getting carried off by the helicopter. However, each bonus score will decrease by every ten seconds that the climber will spend scaling each building as he attempts reach the top. Somewhere in the game, there is "The Lucky Balloon", which can lift Climber about ten stories and raise the player's bonus score if he catches it.
vous etes un escaladeur fou et devez atteindre le haut de la tour.

locale.title: Creatom
locale.synopsis: Difficult puzzle in which we have to copy the forms we see.
Creatom es un juego de ingenio sin licencia creado por TXC Corp y publicado por Micro Genius en 1991.

locale.title: Crime Busters
locale.synopsis: Crime Busters is a light gun game in which the players takes the role of a police officer and has to shoot bandits. The game consists in three stages: the street outside of a bank, a warehouse and the inside of a bank.
Jeu de tir a jouer avec le Zapper de la NES

locale.title: Crisis Force
locale.synopsis:
The year is 199x and a robot army has invaded Tokyo City. A boy and a girl (who remain unnamed) board their ships to fight off the threat.
This is a vertical scrolling shoot-em-up game viewed from overhead, where the player pilots a fighter ship through seven levels of intense shooting action. Each level hurls enemies and bullets at the player's ship, ending with a boss fight, except for one which instead is a boss rush level. The game allows for two players to play at the same time.
The player has a choice of two weapons; bullets or lasers. Weapons can be changed by picking up gems of different colors. Picking up the same color as you already have allows you to upgrade your current weapon a few times. The player's ship can change form and with it the way that the weapons work. This allows the player to pick the best weapon strategy for each situation. The player also has a limited amount of bombs that are useful to get out of tricky situations.
When a weapon is upgraded it also acts as a shield so the ship can take an enemy bullet without dying. This will however degrade the weapon down to the first level again. There are also pickups that alter the ship's speed and a special gem that, if five of them are collected, temporarily transforms the ship into an invincible super ship.
Crisis Force was only released in Japan.

Crisis Force est un shoot'em up sur Nes. Une horde d'extraterrestres fait soudainement son apparition dans les nuages de la ville de Tokyo et commence, sans raison, à bombarder toute la ville. Un jeune couple d'adolescents décide alors de tout faire pour les arrêter. Ils embarquent dans leurs vaisseaux respectifs, prêts à en découdre avec les envahisseurs.

locale.title: Cross Fire
locale.synopsis: The narcotics triangle is a zone dominated by evil where powerful drug cartels prevail. Colombia in South America, Mongolia in Asia, and Iran in the Middle East - these are the countries in which the world's three largest drug producers are based. Because of these crime-ridden groups, the world is experiencing unprecedented corruption and danger toward the end of the 20th century, people are the world are addicted to drugs, and are losing all motivation to continue their jobs. As a united group, the three major drug organizations are secretly scheming to take advantage of the chaos and invade and conquer the world. Sharing this common goal, the three groups combine their evil ideas and begin to carry out their plans. Heads of state are kidnapped and held hostage at the organization headquarters. Seeing the seriousness of the situation, Billy finally decides to take action and sets out to destroy the evil drug empire.

CrossFire est un run 'n gun composé de six niveaux : Ainsi votre hélicoptère vous posera au 'Nam, en Afghanistan, en Russie, en Colombie... Tous les niveaux sont foutus de la même façon : vous commencez en extérieur puis vous plongez dans les sous-sol avant de remonter à la surface pour la fin du stage (seule exception sur le train colombien). Parfois vous affronterez le boss au milieu du niveau, parfois à la fin et parfois les deux.

locale.title: Crystal Mines
locale.synopsis: You control a CM-205 mining robot, your goal is to retrieve "Starla" crystals from various mines on a remote planet. Using the robot you need to locate your quota of crystals while avoiding the many dangers present in the mines, including lava, rock slides, and unfriendly creatures. The robot is equipped with explosives to help reach remote locations in the mine, or destroy any creatures getting in the way (be careful with explosives, you could set off a rock slide and crush the robot!) Once your crystal quota is met, quickly locate the exit and move on to the next, more challenging mine. Crystal Mines is part action and part strategy. There is a time limit to locate the crystals in each mine, plus avoiding falling rocks and monsters will keep you on your toes, but before long you will need to figure out how to locate crystals by properly removing obstructions and navigating tricky mazes.

Controlas al robot minero CM-205, su objetivo es recuperar los cristales "Starla" de varias minas en un planeta remoto. Usando el robot necesitas localizar su cuota de cristales, evitando los muchos peligros presentes en las minas, incluyendo la lava, deslizamientos de rocas, y las criaturas hostiles. El robot está equipado con explosivos para ayudar a llegar a lugares remotos en la mina, o destruir a cualquier criatura de por medio (ten cuidado con los explosivos, que podrían desencadenar un deslizamiento de rocas y aplastar al robot!) Una vez que cumple con su cuota de cristal, de forma rápida debe localizar la salida y pasar a la próxima mina, más desafiante. Crystal Mines es parte de acción y estrategia. Hay un límite de tiempo para localizar los cristales en cada mina, además de evitar la caída de rocas y monstruos, pero en poco tiempo tendrás que encontrar la manera de localizar los cristales mediante la eliminación de obstáculos y navegar correctamente por laberintos difíciles.nnnn

Crystal Mines est un jeu d'action/aventure sur Nes dans lequel vous contrôlez un robot minier baptisé CM-205. Son but est de récupérer des cristaux assez rares nommés Starla venant d'une autre planète. Le but du jeu est de localiser les gisements de Starla, d'y accéder malgré les différents obstacles et ennemis se trouvant sur votre chemin et de ressortir de la mine en un seul morceau.

locale.title: Crystalis
locale.synopsis:
October 1st, 1997 is known as END DAY. A great war encircles the globe and brings about an end to civilization. The surviving humans concluded that they could never repeat their mistakes and build a great tower in the sky to watch over the world and act accordingly to combat "evil". One hundred years have passed since then and a hidden cryogenic chamber in the mountains springs to life...
Crystalis is a top-down action RPG. Starting from the cryogenic chamber, the player takes the role of a mysterious hero who must uncover the mystery of the tower. The character may equip weapons, armor, shields and globe/bracelets on his body and a single item from his inventory for use in the field. To aid in the hero's goal. he will meet up with the four wise people and learn their magic, while also obtaining the four elemental swords which will help him progress. Players gain experience and gold from defeating monsters. The experience is used to gain levels and improve statistics, however a minimum level is required before one can do damage to specific bosses. Gold is used to purchase items in shops.

El 01 de octubre 1997 se conoce como el Día Final. Una gran guerra rodea el mundo y provoca el fin de la civilización. Los humanos supervivientes llegaron a la conclusión de que nunca debe repetir sus errores y construyen una gran torre en el cielo para ver el mundo y actuar en consecuencia para luchar contra el "mal" . Cien años han pasado desde entonces y una cámara criogénica escondida en las montañas cobra vida ...nnnnCrystalis es un juego de rol de acción visto desde arriba. A partir de la cámara criogénica, el jugador toma el papel de un héroe misterioso que debe descubrir el misterio de la torre. El personaje puede equiparse de armas, armaduras, escudos y pulseras en su cuerpo y un solo elemento de su inventario para su uso en el campo. Para ayudar al héroe en su búsqueda, cuatro personas sabias le enseñaráne gradualmente ofensiva y magia curativa , lo que requiere Puntos de magia para usar.nnnnEl protagonista también obtendrá cuatro espadas elementales que le ayuden a progresar. Cada espada puede cobrar un ataque a distancia de gran alcance; si se encuentran artículos especiales, este ataque puede ser mejorado por dos niveles adicionales. El héroe gana experiencia y el oro de los monstruos derrotados. La experiencia se utiliza para obtener los niveles y mejorar las estadísticas, sin embargo, se requiere un nivel mínimo antes de poder hacer daño a los jefes específicos. El oro es utilizado para comprar artículos en tiendas.

Crystalis est un jeu de rôle sur Nes. À la suite d'une grande guerre impliquant le monde entier, l'espèce humaine était quasiment éteinte. Dans le but de ne jamais revivre cet enfer, les derniers survivants ont décidé de construire une tour à partir de laquelle ils peuvent surveiller le monde et repousser les forces du mal. Incarnez un jeune héros mystérieux dont le but est de percer les secrets de cette tour.

locale.title: God Slayer : Haruka Tenkuu no Sonata
Cyber Stadium Series : Base Wars
locale.synopsis: In the 24th century, the game of Baseball is very different. Tired of paying huge players salaries, the team owners got together one weekend and came up with a bold new idea, Robots. Indeed they renamed their league the Cyber League and stocked it with four robot types; Cyborg, Tank, Floater or Motorcycle, to play. On an orbital stadium in space, these robots all play a slightly different variation of the baseball rules. Hitting the ball and catching pop-flys and making home runs are all the same, but when the call of a play is in dispute, there are no base referees; the robots engage in a one-on-one battle using any weaponry they're carrying. Of course to make things interesting, weaponry (and other robot parts and equipment) can only be purchased with team funds during a tournament game, and team funds can only be obtained by wins. Thus the series closer is always sure to be a sold out game.
Juego de béisbol protagonizado por robots, publicado por Ultra Games en 1991.

Base Wars est un jeu d'action sorti sur Nes. Au 24ème siècle, les règles officielles de base-ball sont très différentes de celles de notre époque. Afin de limiter les énormes frais de salaires pour les joueurs, les différents propriétaires d'équipes se sont réunis et se sont mis d'accord sur une solution : les robots. Ce sont maintenant des robots qui s'affrontent sur le terrain en utilisant tout leur arsenal.

locale.title: Cyberball
locale.synopsis:
After American Football players started cheating by using bionic parts, the game was forced to change its rules. By 2022, the game was played not by humans, but two teams of seven robots. To spice things up, the usual pig skin ball was replaced with a 350 pound bomb.
Cyberball brings this fast and furious action to life. Gameplay is essentially the same as the real sport, although the 'downs' are replaced by the bomb's heat gradually increasing towards 'critical'. After this it will explode and possession will be swapped. This is prevented when you cross the 50-yard line, lose possession or score a touchdown, in which cases it resets to 'cool'. Field goals and punts are not featured - the only kick is the initial kick-off you receive.
Control passes from the quarterback (thrower) to the intended catcher as soon as a pass is released. The two-player game is co-operative - on offense one player passes and the other receives

Es el año 2022. Robots de cinco veces el tamaño de un humano, construidos para soportar la violencia y la destrucción, pelean en una lucha cabeza con cabeza, metal contra metal, hasta el final.
Cyberball es un juego para uno o dos jugadores basado en el fútbol americano. En el siglo 21, todos los humanos han sido eliminados del juego y tú, como capitán del equipo, tomas el control de los robots, seleccionando de entre equipos como Los Asesinos de Los Angeles y los Destructores de Dallas.

Cyberball est un jeu de football américain futuriste sur Nes. Nous sommes en l'an 2022 et ce ne sont plus des joueurs qui s'affrontent mais deux équipes de sept robots. Le ballon a été remplacé par une bombe et le but est bien sûr de la faire exploser dans le camp adverse. Il est possible de jouer à deux dans un mode coopératif.

locale.title: Cybernoid - The Fighting Machine
locale.synopsis:
There are three asteroids, hidden among thousands, where various minerals and precious gems were stored. It was believed the riches would be safe there, until the Zoggians discovered them! Now you have to fly an experimental spacefighter, the Cybernoid, into battle to recover the asteroids. The Cybernoid is equipped with standard laser blasters, missiles, and the ability to pick up other weapons along the way.
Cybernoid is an arcade style action game for one player. You can choose from three different skill levels; easy, hard and lethal. On some versions two different sound modes are also available, a basic music and sound effects mode, and a super sound effects mode with no music. Each room you explore is equipped with a time bomb. The bomb will explode taking you with it should you take too long to get past all the obstacles on the screen. You start the game with nine ships, and more can be earned by collecting enough points during the game.

Los piratas han asaltado los depósitos (almacenes) de la Federación, llevándose consigo valiosos minerales, joyas, munición y modernas armas de combate. La Federación te ha encargado que recuperes la carga y la devuelvas a los almacenes. Tu tiempo es limitado. Si lo consigues ganarás muchos puntos y una nave extra.
Los piratas han activado todos sus sistemas planetarios de defensa, evítalos y enfréntate a la tripulación de la nave pirata. Si no consigues llegar a los depósitos dentro del tiempo acordado, o si el valor de la carga recuperada es insuficiente, perderás una de tus naves Cybernoid.

Cybernoid : The Fighting Machine est un jeu d'action sur NES dans lequel des monstres de l'espace ont volé des minéraux de valeur, des bijoux, des munitions et de l'armement. Aux commandes de son guerrier Cybernoid, le joueur doit poursuivre les pirates et retrouver le précieux cargo avant qu'il ne soit trop tard.

locale.title: Cycle Race - Road Man
locale.synopsis:
It is the player's ultimate objective to make it all the way around Japan. If the player ends up completely damaging the bicycle, running out of energy, or falling behind a certain ranking, then he or she will automatically lose the race. Players can choose a representative from either Team USA, Team Japan, Team France, or Team Italy. As long as the player has at least one spare bicycle in the inventory, games will never end on a completely damaged bicycle. Passwords are used to save the game.
The race is 4,000 kilometers long (2485.5 miles). Players must traverse the countryside that separates major Japanese cities along the coastline during the course of these 4,000 kilometres. Interesting scenery includes forests and cattle farms.
Players are always given the exact altitude of each section; they are also shown how far in a stage the player has to advance in order to reach the finish line.

locale.title: D-pad Hero
locale.synopsis: D-Pad Hero is a 2009 video game demake of the Guitar Hero series developed for the Nintendo Entertainment System. An unofficial release, the game is a ROM which must be dumped onto a cartridge or played via emulator.

locale.title: Dai 2 Ji Super Robot Taisen
locale.synopsis: The second Super Robot War is the first canonical episode, where all the basic fundaments of the story and system are set for the rest of the series.The story begins when a magnificent scientist discovers that Earth is being threatened, and he decides to

Dai 2 Ji Super Robot Wars est un jeu de rôle tactique sur Nes. Des scientifiques ont découvert des technologies extraterrestres au coeur d'une météorite qui vient de s'écraser. Ils en déduisent que les aliens vont attaquer d'un moment à l'autre et vous devez protéger la Terre ! Vous contrôlez une armée de robots géants à positionner correctement sur tous les fronts, sur terre, sur mer ou dans les airs, afin de repousser les attaques toujours plus importantes des envahisseurs !

locale.title: Dai Meiro - Meikyu No Tatsujin
locale.synopsis: In Dai Meiro: MeikyÅ« no Tatsujin the player must navigate a 3D maze and reach the goal. Along the way, the player needs to find all the special items to open the last door. With each step, the player's POW is depleted, which can be regenerated by collect

Dans Dai Meiro: Meikyuu no Tatsujin le joueur doit naviguer dans un labyrinthe en 3D et atteindre le but. En cours de route, le joueur doit trouver tous les objets spéciaux pour ouvrir la dernière porte. À chaque étape, le POW du joueur est épuisé, ce qui peut être régénéré en collectant des objets le long du chemin. Il y a des salles et des objets secrets qui peuvent aider le joueur à atteindre le but. Il y a aussi trois mini-jeux qui peuvent être trouvés dans le labyrinthe. Une mini-carte peut être mise en place, mais cela coûtera du POW. Le jeu n'a pas de combat à proprement parler ou de rencontres aléatoires. Il y a trois niveaux de difficulté, ce qui change complètement la disposition des labyrinthes.

locale.title: Daikaijuu Deburas
locale.synopsis: Scientists discover a giant egg in the ocean, but before it can be studied a Giant Monster (Kaiju) erupts from the sea bent on destroying the egg. Can you battle the monster, limit your losses and ultimately rescue the egg? Tokyo is depending on it!

game.name: Daiku No Gen-san 2 - Akage No Dan No Gyakushuu

locale.title: Daiku no Gen-san 2 - Akage no Dan no Gyakushuu
locale.synopsis: Daiku no Gen-San 2: Akage no Dan no Gyakushuu is an Action game, developed by Micronics and published by Irem, which was released in Japan in 1993.

locale.title: Daiku no Gen-san 2 : Akage no Dan no Gyakushuu
Daisenryaku
locale.synopsis: One of many grand war simulations in Daisenryaku series, Daisenryaku for Famicom is a turn-based strategy with quite modern armies, the abstract "Blue" and "Red" countries (controlled by the player or AI), are at war with each other.Three basic phases mak

Daisenryaku pour Famicom est l'une des nombreuses simulations de grande guerre de la série Daisenryaku, une stratégie au tour par tour avec des armées modernes, les pays «bleus» et «rouges» (contrôlés par le joueur ou l'IA) sont en guerre. Trois phases de base

locale.title: Daiva - Imperial Of Nirsartia
locale.synopsis: DAIVA Story 6: Imperial of Nirsartia is the sixth part of a seven part series developed by Toshiba EMI. The series is not a collection of sequential stories, but rather a presentation of the same story from seven different perspectives. Billed as an "Active Simulation War", each game has the player direct a different protagonist (or "hero") through a galactic war. In most versions, the player must travel from planet to planet, defeating enemy defense armadas, and then storming the planet in a mobile attack suit, destroying as much of the planet's defense systems as possible, all in an effort to take over the planet.nnWhen designing the Famicom version of the game, Toshiba EMI took the system's capabilities, as well as it younger market audience, in to account. The game has been considerably simplified compared to its computer counterparts. Before starting an action sequence, the player is allowed to place three power-ups along a map of the stage. When the player reaches these designated locations, the specified power-up will fall from the sky for the player to collect. The game concludes when the player locates and conquers two specific planets; the Vuritora manufacturing planet, and Nirsartia.

DAIVA Story 6: Imperial of Nirsartia est la sixième partie d'une série en sept parties développée par Toshiba EMI.
