También hay batallas por comandos estilo RPG contra jefes. nnnnTambién hay un modo de torneo, donde hasta 8 jugadores pueden competir para ganar el campeonato. Usted puede elegir el estilo de lucha de tu personaje de seis opciones diferentes; kung fu, boxeo, karate, lucha libre, kick boxing y artes marciales.

Dans le jeu d'action Flying Warriors sur Nes vous êtes confronté à un combat entre la dimension des ténèbres et celle de la lumière. Vous incarnez un maître en arts martiaux qui doit utiliser ses capacités pour détruire le terrible Demonyx.

locale.title: Formation Z
locale.synopsis:
The player competes in a marathon continuous scrolling horizontal shoot-em-up game across land, sea, air and outer space. You can hold down the fire button for a burst of Charged fire, which is especially essential to defeat the bosses.
The player can hold down the Jump button to transform back and forth between a Mobile Robot or an Aero Fighter. Some sections have confrontations on both ground and air; others insist on aerial battling. Your time in the Aero Fighter is limited by its fuel requirement.

locale.title: Formula 1 Sensation
locale.synopsis:
This 3D racing game featuring Formula 1 cars and circuits. Besides a racing a F1 grand prix championship you can also choose to practice a specific race track.
You can select the F1 race track you want to race. Cars are custom made you can select the body type of the car, the body color, the chassis. You can even select your rival drivers.

Este es un juego de carreras en 3D con coches de Fórmula 1 y circuitos. Además de una carrera de un campeonato de Gran Premio de F1 también puedes optar por practicar en una pista de carreras específica.nnnnPuedes seleccionar la pista de carreras de F1 en la que quieres correr. Los coches son hechos a medida se puede seleccionar el tipo de cuerpo del coche, el color de la carrocería, el chasis. Puedes incluso elegir tus conductores rivales.

Formula 1 Sensation est un jeu de courses sur Nes. En plus des courses du championnat de Grand Prix F1, vous pouvez également choisir de pratiquer sur piste libre. Les voitures sont sur mesure et vous pouvez sélectionner le type de carrosserie de la voiture, la couleur, le châssis...

locale.title: Formula One : Built to Win
locale.synopsis:
Formula One: Born To Win is a career racing game. The player begins with a Mini Cooper and claws up the ranks of the racing circuit starting with the lowest ranked races in the eastern part of the United States. By winning races, the player can upgrade parts on the Mini and have a better shot at more races. Win enough races and eventually earn the opportunity to race using faster cars. The other cars available in the game are the Vector W2, Ferrari F40, and of course, the Formula 1. The first races take place in New York City, Detroit, and Miami. The other locales to visit are Yellowstone, Denver, Dallas, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, San Francisco, and finally Hawaii.
The primary game is the "Normal Mode" of the game. The game's main menu also offers a "Free Mode" which allows the player to freely choose any of the 4 cars in the game to race on a selection of courses, without any obstruction from other cars,

Formula One: Built To Win es un juego de carreras. El jugador comienza con un Mini Cooper y debe subir en el ranking del circuito de carreras a partir de las carreras más fáciles en la parte oriental de los Estados Unidos. Por ganar carreras, el jugador puede actualizar partes en el Mini y tener más oportunidades de ganar más carreras. Vencer suficientes carreras da la oportunidad de competir usando los coches más rápidos. Los otros coches disponibles en el juego son el vector W2, Ferrari F40, y por supuesto, la Fórmula 1. Las primeras carreras tienen lugar en la ciudad de Nueva York, Detroit y Miami. Los otros lugares para visitar son Yellowstone, Denver, Dallas, Las Vegas, Los Ángeles, San Francisco, y, finalmente, Hawai.nnnnEl juego principal es el "Modo Normal" del juego. El Menú principal del juego también ofrece un "Modo Libre", que permite al jugador elegir libremente cualquiera de los 4 coches en el juego para competir en una selección de pistas, sin ninguna obstrucción de otros coches.

Formula One: Built To Win est un jeu de course sur NES. Le joueur commence avec une Mini Cooper et gravit les échelons en commençant par les courses les moins bien classées de l'Est des États-Unis. En gagnant des courses, le joueur peut mettre à niveau les pièces de la Mini et établir un meilleur score sur plus de courses. Gagnez assez de courses pour débloquer des voitures plus rapides. Les autres voitures disponibles dans le jeu sont le Vector W2, la Ferrari F40, et bien sûr, la Formule 1. Les premières courses ont lieu à New York, Detroit et Miami. Les autres lieux à visiter sont Yellowstone, Denver, Dallas, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, San Francisco, et enfin Hawaii.
En plus du mode normal, le menu principal du jeu propose également un mode libre qui vous permet de choisir librement l'une des 4 voitures du jeu pour courir sur une sélection de parcours.

locale.title: Four Players' Tennis
locale.synopsis:
The Australian Open, the French Open, Wimbledon, and the U.S. Open - the biggest names in tennis compete in these tournaments every year trying to win the coveted Grand Slam. So, why not you? Asmik's Top Players' Tennis let's you compete for the Grand Slam right along with the pros.
Choose from many different modes - Singles (against the computer or another player), Doubles, and even One Player vs. Two Players on the other side of the net. In the Singles mode you head out on tour with the choice of using Chris Evert or Evan Lendl, or developing your own tournament player. If you decide to go it alone, you'll allocate points among different skills - speed, stamina, strength, agility, concentration, technique, and miracle shot ability. compete in the Asmik Open and try to win enough qualifying rounds to rank high enough to play in the Grand Slam Tournaments. As you win matches your player earns points and becomes stronger in the different skill levels. A password mode enables you to continue with the same player if you decide to.
If you have a few friends ready to play there's a game here for you. Play Singles against on another, or play Doubles on your own, or with up to three people using the Nintendo Satellite. In Doubles play you'll head straight to the Grand Slam tournaments.

locale.title: Four Players' Tennis
locale.synopsis: Jouez le jeu de vos rêves avec Top Players' Tennis - le seul jeu où vous "devenez" Ivan Lendl ou Chris Evert. Mais d'abord, vous avez quatre tournois majeurs à jouer; L'Open d'Australie, l'Open de France, Wimbledon et l'Open des Etats-Unis. Jouer des singles contre un ami, ou l'ordinateur; Doubler avec Lendl ou Evert pour battre l'ordinateur; Ou jouer avec un ami contre l'ordinateur. Il ya de l'excitation, de l'action et de la sueur ! game ... set ... match

game.name: Fox's Peter Pan And The Pirates - The Revenge Of Captain Hook

locale.title: Fox's Peter Pan & the Pirates : The Revenge of Captain Hook
locale.synopsis:
Captain Hook and his army of brute pirates would like nothing better than to overtake Neverland with their corruptive ways. Peter Pan, with the help of Tinkerbell and a little Pixie Dust, will attempt to stop Captain Hook once and for all by making him walk his own gangplank.
The player controls Peter, whose weapon is a sword. You start with 3 lives and you can increase your life meter by collecting treasure chests or Tinkerbell fairies throughout a level. You also can collect bags of fairy dust to temporarily fly. You must defeat all the pirates present on one level to get to the next level.

Al capitán Garfio y a su ejército de piratas no les gustaría nada mejor que dominar Nunca Jamás con sus modos corruptos. Peter Pan, con la ayuda de Campanilla y un poco de Polvo de hadas, tratará de detener al Capitán Garfio de una vez por todas haciendo que pasee por su propia plancha.nnnnEl jugador controla a Peter, cuya arma es una espada. Comienza con 3 vidas y puede aumentar su medidor de vida mediante la recolección de cofres del tesoro o hadas a lo largo de un nivel. También puede recoger bolsas de polvo de hadas para volar temporalmente. Debes derrotar a todos los piratas presentes en un nivel para llegar al siguiente nivel.

Le Capitaine Crochet et son armée de pirates essaient de conquérir Neverland par la force. Peter Pan, avec l'aide de Clochette et d'un peu de poussière de fée, tentera d'arrêter le Capitaine Crochet une fois pour toutes. Le joueur contrôle Peter Pan, armé d'une épée. Vous commencez avec 3 vies et vous pouvez augmenter votre compteur de vie en collectant des coffres au trésor ou des fées Clochette à travers un niveau. Vous pouvez également collecter des sacs de poussière de fée pour voler temporairement. Vous devez vaincre tous les pirates d'un niveau pour passer au niveau suivant.

locale.title: Frankenstein : The Monster Returns
locale.synopsis:
The villagers thought they were safe. But now it is time they learned the terrible truth... Frankenstein has risen, laid waste to the lands surrounding the village, has amassed an evil army of unholy creatures and even gone so far as to capture a young girl.
Frankenstein is a side scroller adventure against all sorts of nightmarish creatures. Some might even call it a clone of the more widely known Castlevania games of the NES. You begin the game with nothing but your fists... but may acquire a magical club from enemies. Finding additional powerups with give the club the ability to toss fireballs. There are treasure chests in various rooms as well as characters that can help you in your quest through dialog hints.

Los aldeanos pensaban que estaban a salvo. Pero ahora es tiempo de descubran la terrible verdad... Frankenstein ha resucitado, devastando las tierras que rodean el pueblo, y acumulando un malvado ejército de criaturas impías e incluso ha ido tan lejos como para capturar una joven. nnnn¨Frankenstein¨ es una aventura de desplazamiento lateral contra todo tipo de criaturas de pesadilla. Algunos incluso podrían llamarlo un clon del más extensamente conocido ¨Castlevania¨ de NES. Comienzas el juego con nada más que tus puños... pero puede adquirir un bastón mágico de los enemigos. Encontrarás powerups adicionales que darán al bastón la posibilidad de lanzar bolas de fuego. Hay cofres del tesoro en varias habitaciones, así como los personajes que te pueden ayudar en tu búsqueda a través de pistas de diálogo.

Frankenstein : The Monster Returns est un jeu d'action sur Nes. Les villageois pensaient être à l'abri, mais le monstre de Frankenstein a déjà détruit les villages voisins et amassé une armée impie. Il a même capturé une jeune fille. Vous devez donc combattre des créatures cauchemardesques sur votre chemin vers le repaire de Frankenstein.

locale.title: Free Fall
locale.synopsis: Free Fall is an Action game, developed and published by Color Dreams, which was cancelled before it was released. You control a hand who must catch falling things and then throw them back up to safety.
Free Fall est un jeu d'action, développé et publié par Color Dreams, qui a été annulé avant sa sortie. Vous contrôlez une main qui doit attraper des objets qui tombent et les remettre en sécurité.

locale.title: Freedom Force
locale.synopsis:
In Freedom Force, Rad Rex and his partner Manic Jackson are part of an elite counter terrorism unit. Their mission is to save the hostages in a hijacked plane by killing all the Bagmen. After they successfully take back control of the plane they must work there way back though the airport and streets to take out the guerrillas hideout to get to their leader, Eugene Extreme.
Freedom Force is a light gun game that is played with the Nintendo Zapper. The object of the game is to kill all of the bad guys with out losing all of Rads health or killing too many hostages or civilians. The friends and foes appears though doors and windows, and from behind objects forcing a quick decision whether to shoot them or not. There are 5 levels in total (Aeroplane, Gangway, Airport Terminal, Street, and Hideout) and the 4 different types of weapons that enemies have are guns (one shot), machine guns (one burst loses about quarter health), grenades (instant kill but can be shot in air), and missiles (faster then grenades).
To help the player an icon can appear quickly in the lower left corner of the screen representing health, ammo, gun, a grenade launcher (weapon to kill everyone at once, not good with hostages and civilians around), and a harder difficulty (more enemies), that the player must shoot to activate. A two-player mode is available with the two players taking turns, with the second player playing Manic Jackson. There is also a hangman mini-game that is played between every two levels where the player must shoot the correct letter when it is lit up.

En Freedom Force, Rad Rex y su socio Manic Jackson son parte de una unidad antiterrorista de élite. Su misión es salvar a los rehenes en un avión secuestrado. Después recuperar el control del avión camino de regreso, aunque el aeropuerto y las calles les llevaran a su líder, Eugene Extreme.nnFreedom Force es un juego de pistola de luz que se juega con la Nintendo Zapper. El objetivo del juego es matar a todos los malos sin perder toda la salud de Red o matar a demasiados rehenes o civiles. Los amigos y enemigos aparecen detrás de las puertas y ventanas, y desde detrás de los objetos obligando a una decisión rápida si disparar o no. Hay 5 niveles en total.

Freedom Force est un jeu de tir sur NES. A l'aide du Zapper de la console, vous devez éliminer les nombreux ennemis qui apparaissent aux fenêtres ou par les portes tout en évitant soigneusement de tirer sur les otages.

locale.title: Friday the 13th
locale.synopsis:
Based on the popular movie franchise, Friday the 13th casts you as one of six camp counselors (three girls or three boys) at the infamous Camp Crystal Lake, and you are tasked with destroying Jason Voorhees once and for all.
To get to Jason, you must run around a camp, killing zombie ghouls and collecting weapons, until you hear an alarm sound. When that alarm goes off, it means Jason has entered a cabin and you must find him.
To save time, you can switch between all six counselors, depending on where you are. Once you enter the house that Jason is in, the game switches to a 3D-esque maze in which you have to hurt Jason with the items you collected. Once he's been damaged enough, he'll run away, only to sound another alarm later and enter another house.

Basado en la franquicia de películas de viernes 13 juegas como uno de los seis encargados (tres niñas y tres niños) en el famoso Crystal Lake Camp, y tienes la tarea de destruir a Jason Voorhees de una vez por todas.nnPara llegar a Jason, debes recorrer el campamento, matando zombies y recoger las armas, hasta que escuches un sonido de alarma. Cuando la alarma se apaga, significa que Jason ha entrado en una cabaña y hay que encontrarlo.nnPara ahorrar tiempo, puedes cambiar entre los seis chicos, dependiendo de dónde se encuentre. Una vez que entras a la casa en la que está Jason, el juego cambia a un laberinto 3D en el que tienes que hacer daño a Jason con el artículo que has recogido. Una vez que ha sido dañado lo suficiente, volverás a recorrer el campamento hasta que vuelva a sonar otra alarma y entrar en otra casa.

Friday the 13th est un jeu d'action sorti sur NES. En attendant de se venger de la mort de sa mère, Jason se cache dans une sombre forêt. Un groupe d'amis a décidé de visiter le camp de Crystal Lake à proximité de l'antre de Jason. A vous de trouver Jason avant qu'il ne les massacre tous. Pour ce faire, vous disposez d'armes allant du petit couteau à la tronçonneuse.

locale.title: Front Line
locale.synopsis: Front Line is a vertically scrolling action game. Your mission is to infiltrate enemy territory and destroy their fortress. To reach the fortress, you will have to make your way through varied and dangerous terrain. Jungles, deserts, brush, and rocks all slow your progress, plus each area has numerous enemy fighters and tanks trying to stop you. To help get past these obstacles, you are armed with a machine gun and grenades; at some points in the game you may even come across an abandoned tank which you can control to increase your odds of survival. When you reach the end of the level and successfully destroy the fortress, the game will repeat at a higher level of difficulty. Gameplay is for one or two players, and four different skill levels are available.

Front Line est un jeu d'action à défilement vertical sur Nes. Le but du jeu est d'infiltrer le territoire ennemi et de détruire leur forteresse. Pour ce faire, vous devrez parcourir des chemins parsemés d'embûches destinées à ralentir votre progression. Vous disposez d'une mitraillette et de grenades pour défaire les soldats et tanks que vous rencontrerez sur votre route.

locale.title: Fun Blaster Pak
locale.synopsis:
Compilation of four games:
PIPEMANIA: A totally radical game entrenched in a deep underground maze of pipes.
TWIN EAGLE: Twin fun with simultaneous two-player shooting action.
METAL FIGHTER: You are Joyvan Kid and must save the planet Earth from alien occupation.
LITTLE RED HOOD: Solve the mysteries of the forest with eight levels of enchanted fun.
Recopilatorio que incluye los juegos Pipemania, Twin Eagle, Metal Fighter y Little Red Hood.

Compilation de quatre jeux:nnnnPIPEMANIA: Un jeu totalement radical retranché dans un labyrinthe souterrain profond de tuyaux.nnnnTWIN EAGLE: Amusez-vous avec des actions de tir simultanées à deux joueurs.nnnnFIGHTER METAL: Vous êtes Joy Kid Kid et devez sauver la planète Terre de l'occupation extraterrestre.nnnnLITTLE RED HOOD: Résolvez les mystères de la forêt avec huit niveaux de plaisir enchanté.

locale.title: Fun House
locale.synopsis:
Fun House is based on a children's television game show of the same name.
The basic premise of the game is to get through the 72 rooms of the Fun House. The object of each room is to throw tomatoes at the targets littered throughout the room before time expires. Sometimes these targets are numbered, so they have to be hit in numerical order. After all targets are hit, a key will appear allowing the player to move on to the next room.
This may appear simple, but the player's character is on rollerblades, thus making navigating not such a simple task. There are also blobs, boingers, the banana launcher, and the spray gun which will either try to hinder progress or take away time if the player gets hit by them. The player also has to deal with various terrain obstacles in each room such as slime covered ramps or icy floors.
The player starts with three lives, but can earn more by collecting 25 silver coins. There are also gold coins with each one equaling 5 silver coins.
Other helpful items the player can collect are glop clocks, with the small ones adding 8 seconds, and the large ones adding 15 seconds to the game clock. There are also sneakers which will temporarily increase the player's speed. There are also starbursts, which increase the players score and warp cubes, which will send the player to another part of the Fun House.

Fun House se basa en el programa de televisión para niños del mismo nombre. La premisa básica del juego es conseguir a través de las 72 habitaciones de la casa de la diversión. El objeto de cada habitación es tirar tomates a los blancos esparcidos por toda la habitación antes de que expire el tiempo. A veces, estos objetivos están numerados, así que tienen que ser golpeado en orden numérico. Después de que todos los objetivos se alcanzaron, aparecerá una llave que permite al jugador pasar a la habitación de al lado.
Fun House sur Nes est un jeu inspiré du TV Show américain du même nom. Dans une ambiance de fête, vous devez éviter les nombreux pièges qui vous attendent.

locale.title: Fushigi no Umi no Nadia
locale.synopsis: Based on the anime Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water. It features 50 different battle fields in which the players employ one character per turn. The characters can either move, use a skill/item, or enter a RPG-like round based close combat. For beating an enemy the characters will gain experience points and level up which will be kept for further sessions.
Fushigi no Umi no Nadia (Nadia et le Secret de l'Eau Bleu, de la série animée éponyme produit par Nippon Hoso Kyokai) est un Tactical RPG sorti exclusivement au Japon.

locale.title: Futebol
locale.synopsis:
This game is a modified version of Ultimate League Soccer; instead of national teams, the game features teams from the Brazilian football league (with different characteristics than the original teams).
One of two players can play a single match between any of the 8 teams available, or one player can play either one of the two championships available.
The "World Cup" championship let the player choose one of 8 Brazilian teams: Internacional, Flamengo, São Paulo, Vasco, Corinthians, Palmeiras, Fluminense or Santos. The "Olympic" championship available restricts the choice to the 4 first teams: Internacional, Flamengo, São Paulo and Vasco. Each team has its own characteristics, varying in offensive, defense, speed, skill, accuracy and experience traits.
After selecting the team, players are prompted to choose the color of their team's uniform, among white, green, gray and red. They are also prompted to choose the duration of the periods (15, 30 or 45 minutes - which run faster than real time). They are also prompted to choose team formation: 4-3-3, 4-2-4 or 4-4-2.
The game is played from a side-scrolling perspective. While conducting the ball layers can make short passes (with button B) or strong kicks (with button A, stronger the longer the button is held). Without the ball's possession, players can try to steal the ball (with button A) or skip to the next player (with button B). The goalkeeper control is manual, and players can make the goalkeeper jump (by pressing button A). Tied matches are decided on a penalty kick contest.
Players can also watch single computer vs. computer matches.

Agora, você vai viver as verdadeiras emoções do futebol Escolha o seu time e suas características próprias, como habilidade, velocidade, etc. Selecione um dos tipos de campeonato: Mundial ou Olímpico e comece a jogar. São 8 times no Campeonato Mundial que podem ser escolhidos: Internacional, Vasco, Flamengo, Fluminense, São Paulo, Corinthians, Palmeiras ou Santos. Já no Olímpico são apenas 4 times que podem ser escolhidos: Internacional, Flamengo, São Paulo e Vasco Você tem três opções de jogo: Jogador contra computador ou Computador contra computador. Use a sua tática e seja sempre o campeão!

locale.title: Fuzzical Fighter
locale.synopsis: The world of Funny is facing troubled times. The Dimensional Stone, which offered protection to this world, was stolen. The king needs someone to locate the Dimensional Stone. He makes a request that his subject Mark pilot the flying craft, called the Fuz

Fuzzical Fighter est un shoot'em up sur NES. Le royaume Funny a perdu sa pierre dimensionnelle qui plonge peu à peu la ville dans le chaos. Mark, le personnage que vous incarnez, se porte volontaire pour tenter de retrouver et de récupérer la pierre. Vous partez alors à sa recherche à bord du Fuzzical Fighter, bravant les monstres et autres créatures sur votre passage. Le jeu comprend des phases de RPG entre chaque niveau lorsque vous faite escale dans les villes pour améliorer votre véhicule.

game.name: G.i. Joe - A Real American Hero

locale.title: G.I. Joe : A Real American Hero
locale.synopsis:
G.I Joe is a side-scrolling action game where you can select 3 out of a possible 5 characters to complete a mission.
Each level is in three main parts: The fight into the mission zone, the mission zone, and the escape from the mission zone. The stages where you fight into and escape from the mission zone are straightforward action  just fight your way to the end of the stage, and defeat the stage boss.
The actual mission zone is a maze, where the object is to place bombs at pre-determined locations, then find and use the exit. The mazes start out easy with the first one being only two screens high and 4 long. Level 6 is 7 by 8 for a total of 56 screens.
Characters:
Duke (Tiger Force first sergeant/squad leader), Rock & Roll (gatling gunner), Capt. Grid-Iron (hand-to-hand combat specialist), Blizzard (arctic attack soldier), Snake Eyes (commando)

G.I Joe es un juego de acción de desplazamiento lateral donde puedes seleccionar 3 de los posibles 5 caracteres para completar una misión.
Cada nivel está en tres partes principales: La lucha en la zona de la misión, la zona de la misión, y el escape de la zona de la misión. Las etapas en las que peleas y escapas de la zona de la misión son una acción sencilla: solo peleas hasta llegar al final del escenario y derrotas al jefe de escenario.
La zona de misión real es un laberinto, donde el objeto es colocar bombas en lugares predeterminados, luego encontrar y utilizar la salida. Los laberintos comienzan fáciles con el primero siendo solamente dos pantallas altas y 4 largas. El nivel 6 es 7 por 8 para un total de 56 pantallas.
Caracteres:
Duke (primer sargento de la Fuerza del Tigre), Rock & Roll (artillero), Capt. Grid-Iron (especialista en combate cuerpo a cuerpo), Blizzard (soldado de ataque del Ártico), Snake Eyes (comando)

G.I. Joe : A Real American Hero est un jeu d'action plates-formes sur NES dans lequel vous incarnez une escouade de 3 membres du G.I Joe à choisir parmi Duke, Snake Eyes, Blizzard, Captain Grid-Iron et Rock 'n Roll (un agent est désigné d'office a chaque mission, les deux autres sont à choisir). Un sixième agent Hawk donne les ordres de mission et est disponible pour le stage final. Il est possible de contrôler des véhicules: le Buzz Boar, le Pogo et le Battle Copter. Les 6 missions que le commando G.I. Joe doit accomplir se déroulent en Amazonie, en Antarctique, à New York, dans les Black Hills et au Sahara. Le stage final étant au Quartier Général de Cobra. Chaque mission se déroule en trois phases, d'abord le commando doit se frayer un chemin jusqu'à une base du Cobra, ensuite les 3 agents doivent placer un certains nombre de bombes dans la base dans un temps imparti et enfin un combat contre un boss de fin de niveau parmis lesquels nous trouvons Range-Viper, Metal-Head, Overlord, Voltar, Destro et le commandant Cobra lui-même.

locale.title: G.I. Joe : The Atlantis Factor
locale.synopsis: Cobra, the evil villain, previous encounter with G.I. Joe ended with Cobraâs base been destroyed (as played in G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero). But this time Cobra has unlocked the secret of Atlantis. Using an ancient power source Cobra has managed to r

Cobra, el malvado villano, tuvo un encuentro previo con G.I. Joe que terminó con la base de Cobra destruida. Pero esta vez Cobra ha descubierto el secreto de la Atlántida. Usando una antigua fuente de energía Cobra ha logrado levantar Atlantis fuera del fondo del océano y ahora está reconstruyendo sus fuerzas destinadas a destruir el mundo. Depende del General Hawk y sus amigos, todos parte del equipo Joe, salvar el mundo.
G.I. Joe: El Factor Atlantis es un juego de plataformas de desplazamiento lateral donde el objetivo es conseguir que el General Hawk y sus amigos terminen en la sede de Cobra. Hay tres caminos a tomar aunque son 22 niveles (más algunos atajos) que se dividen y se combinan en los puntos de decisión y también permite al jugador retroceder y tomar un nuevo camino. Los niveles varían desde un simple "llegar hasta el final" a los laberintos de "encontrar objetos".
El juego comienza como jugando como el General Hawk, el personaje principal, sin embargo según el jugador completa niveles desbloquea nuevos personajes. Estos nuevos personajes, todos con sus propias fortalezas y debilidades (como lo alto que pueden saltar y puntos de golpe) y habilidades especiales. Estos caracteres pueden ser recogidos al inicio de cada nuevo nivel. Los personajes son General Hawk (personaje principal), Wet Suit (puede bucear bajo el agua), Storm Shadow (combate cuerpo a cuerpo), Road Block (cruza pasajes estrechos), Duke (pistola de fuego en cualquier dirección) y Snake Eyes. También hay personajes no jugables que pueden ayudar al personaje elegido que también se desbloquean después de completar ciertos niveles como Stalker (informante), Big Bear (cura durante la batalla), Spirit (cura fuera de la batalla) y Gung-Ho (te da munición).
El jugador obtiene dos armas para empezar y hay tres más para recoger después de completar ciertas misiones. Las armas son Punches (espada para Storm Shadow y Snake Eyes), Machine Gun (arma de partida), Pulse Rifle, Laser Rifle y Rocket Launcher. Cuando un arma es recolectada, cualquier personaje puede usarla. Cada arma tiene 4 niveles de potencia diferentes que pueden obtenerse recolectando unas pocas capturas "Pow" de enemigos caídos o completando ciertos niveles. Cada personaje debe nivelar las armas individualmente.
Guardar contraseña está disponible mediante letras / números en un sistema de cuadrículas.

G.I. Joe : The Atlantis Factor est la suite de G.I. Joe : A Real American Hero sur Nes. Le commandant Cobra a survécu à la derniére confrontation et fait émerger l'ancien continent Atlantis qu'il utilise comme base. Avec une armée quasi indestructible et de puissantes armes spatiales, Cobra veut utiliser les pouvoirs des Atlantes depuis longtemps perdus dans le but de gouverner le monde. Le jeu commence avec Duke mais d'autres agents G.I. Joe sont à débloquer: General Hawk, Roadblock, Wet Suit, Snake Eyes et Storm Shadow. Gung-Ho, Spirit, et Big Bear peuvent également être secourus et serviront ensuite de support en fournissant munitions ou restaurant la vie des agents en jeu. Stalker est également présent mais uniquement pour donner les ordres de missions. Les G.I. Joe doivent une fois de plus se frayer un chemin au travers des diverses se mission afin d'atteindre une base Cobra où ils devront accomplir une mission secondaire (sauver des otages, mettre des bombes ou localiser un élément clé). Chaque mission se termine par une bataille contre un agent Cobra: Overkill, Cesspool, Firefly, le Major Bludd, Destro et le commandant Cobra.

locale.title: Gaiapolis
locale.synopsis: Prince Gerard Himerce seeks vengeance against the Zar Harc Empire for the destruction of his homeland, the Kingdom of Avalon. Joined by the half-human fairy Elaine, last survivor of the Shee clan, and the dragon warrior Galahad, the exiled duke from the land of the dragons, the Prince goes on a journey to the flying citadel of Gaiapolis to prevent King Darkness, the leader of the Zar Harc Empire, from reviving an ancient demon. Along the way, they are guided by a mysterious spirit known as the Warrior of Flame, who tells them that in order to reach Gaiapolis they must seek the three keys to the city that have been scattered around the world.
Gaiapolis est un jeu d'action-aventure pour Nes, dont l'action se déroule dans un monde imaginaire et fantastique.

locale.title: Galactic Crusader
locale.synopsis:
Your starship is alive! A metamorphic creature that can transform from a huge flying insect into a metallic destroyer. Face squadron after squadron of alien fighters, marching ever onward towards a final confrontation with an all-powerful enemy.
This is basically a scrolling, shoot-it-if-it-moves, action game. As your ship scrolls up the screen, you fire on ships coming from the top of the screen. Occasionally, after ships have been destroyed, you can pick up a power up to increase you firing ability. At the end of each level is a boss you must defeat to move onward.

¡Tu nave está viva! Una criatura metamórfica que se pueden transformar de un enorme insecto volador en un destructor metálico. Tendrás que enfrentarte a escuadra tras escuadra de combatientes alienígenas, marchando siempre adelante hacia una confrontación final con un todo-poderoso enemigo.
De vez en cuando, después de que las naves han sido destruidas, se puede recoger un Power-up para aumentar tu capacidad de disparo. Al final de cada nivel hay un jefe al que debes derrotar.

Galactif Crusader est un shoot 'em up à scrolling vertical sur NES. Au fur et à mesure que votre vaisseau défile sur l'écran, vous tirez sur des navires venant du haut de l'écran. De temps en temps, après avoir détruit des navires ennemis, vous pourrez ramasser un power-up pour augmenter votre puissance de tir. À la fin de chaque niveau, vous devrez vaincre un boss pour aller au niveau suivant. La version Japonaise appelée "Papillon" ou "Papillon Gals" comporte des scènes Hentai (pornographie Japonaise) entre les niveaux.

locale.title: Galaga : Demons of Death
locale.synopsis:
Galaga is a vertical arcade shooter from Namco. You control a space fighter at the bottom of the screen, scrolling left and right in order to avoid oncoming bombs and kamikaze attacks from alien invaders--and to fire your own missiles to fight back!
There are an infinite number of stages to progress through. Every third level is a "challenge stage" in which you have a free chance to shoot as many aliens as possible and rack up bonus points.
Certain aliens have tractor beams they can use to capture one of your ships. If that wasn't your last "life," you can try to shoot that alien down and recapture your ship, giving you two ships at once and doubling your firepower.
A summary screen appears when the game is over, giving you both your final score and you final "hit ratio"--the number of missiles fired, enemies destroyed, and the percentage of targets hit.

Galaga es un arcade de disparos vertical de Namco. Controlas un caza espacial en la parte inferior de la pantalla, puedes desplazarte a la izquierda y la derecha con el fin de evitar las bombas que vienen de frente y los ataques kamikazes de los invasores extraterrestres - y disparar tus propios misiles para defenderte!
Hay un número infinito de etapas para progresar. Cada tercer nivel es una "etapa de desafío" en la que tienes la oportunidad y la libertad de disparar a tantos alienígenas como sea posible y acumular puntos de bonificación.
Ciertos extraterrestres tienen rayos tractores que pueden utilizar para capturar a una de tus naves. Si esta no fuera tu última "vida", se puede tratar de disparar a ese extraterrestre y recapturar tu nave, que te da dos naves a la vez y duplica tu potencia de fuego.
Aparecerá una pantalla de resumen cuando el juego ha terminado, que te da tanto tu puntuación final y definitiva "proporción de aciertos" - el número de misiles lanzados, los enemigos destruidos, y el porcentaje de los objetivos golpeados.

Dans Galaga sur NES, vous allez devoir piloter un vaisseau pouvant se déplacer uniquement de gauche à droite. Il vous faudra éviter les tirs de vos ennemis tout en les éliminant. Plusieurs boss feront leur apparition.

locale.title: Galaxian
locale.synopsis: Galaxian is a shoot 'em up in which the player is at the bottom of the screen, with an arrangement of aliens at the top. The player moves left and right to aim at an alien, then shoots a bullet up the screen, and the alien it hits is killed. The aliens are classed as Drones, Emissaries, Hornets and Commanders, with those higher up the screen scoring more points when destroyed. At set intervals an enemy will move down the screen towards you, escorting a bomber, which is a moment of high danger. Clear a wave and another is generated.

Galaxian est un shoot'em up sorti sur NES. Vous vous retrouvez en bas de l'écran alors qu'une horde d'aliens vous attend en haut. En vous déplaçant sur la gauche ou sur la droite, votre but est de terrasser le plus d'aliens possible. Ces derniers sont répartis en quatre catégories : les droïdes, les émissaires, les hornets et les commandants.

locale.title: Galaxy 5000
locale.synopsis:
Galaxy 5000 is an isometric-perspective space racing game where 4 spaceships compete head to head in outer space races. 1 or 2 human players can compete in the races; the rest of the ships are controlled by the computer. The ships complete several laps around each course and have limited firing capacity to throw their opponents off balance. The ships can also jump. In fact, the ships can jump right off the edge of the course and drop down (in space). If the player does not complete a course in good time, the entire race track will disintegrate and leave the ship to fall down (and apparently splash into some water below).
A notable item about this game is its use of squeaky, comical, digitized voices for exclamations when colliding with another player ("Hey!", "Excuse me!", "Watch it!"). There are also 2 completely different control schemes that a player can adopt for cruising around the course. The first scheme rotates and drives the ship in the direction that the control pad is being pressed. The second scheme uses left and right to rotate the ship and up to thrust in the direction the nose is pointing.

Galaxy 5000 es un juego de carreras espaciales de perspectiva isométrica donde 4 naves espaciales compiten en carreras del espacio exterior. 1 o 2 jugadores humanos pueden competir en las carreras; El resto de las naves son controladas por el ordenador. Las naves completan varias vueltas alrededor de cada recorrido y tienen una capacidad de tiro limitada para lanzar a sus oponentes. Las naves también pueden saltar. De hecho, pueden saltar desde el borde de la pista y caer hacia abajo (al espacio). Si el jugador no completa un circuito a su debido tiempo, toda la pista de competición se desintegrará y dejará caer a la nave.

Galaxy 5000 est un jeu de courses dans l'espace sur Nes où 4 vaisseaux spatiaux s'affrontent sur un circuit. Il existe plusieurs styles de contrôles différents et les vaisseaux peuvent sauter et même dire pardon lorsqu'ils se rentrent dedans !

locale.title: Galaxy Patrol Enhanced
locale.synopsis: In this homebrew release you need to collect fuel pellets and avoid colliding with space debris.

locale.title: Gambler Jiko Chuushinha 2
locale.synopsis: Gambler Jiko Chuushinha 2 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Asmik Ace Entertainment, Inc, which was released in Japan in 1990.

locale.title: Game Party
locale.synopsis: Game Party allows you to play 5 different games on one cartridge. The games involved are Air Hockey, Hockey, Pinball, Basketball, and Mind-Q. So grab a friend and start playing some good multiplayer games!
Game Party es un compendio de juegos recreativos que incluye: Air hockey, Hockey pinball, Basketball y Master Mind.

Game party est une compilation de minis-jeux sortis sur la console Nintendo NES. Jouable jusqu'à quatre la cartouche vous propose de jouer à différents petits jeux de sport tel que le basket, le hockey, le flipper, le football, le air hockey où encore le célèbre jeu de société le mastermind. Les jeux les plus faciles à prendre en main garantissent de bonnes tranches de rigolade lorsque vous jouez à deux.

locale.title: Ganbare Goemon 2
locale.synopsis: Ganbare Goemon 2 is an Action game, developed and published by Konami. It is the third game in the Ganbare Goemon series and a sequel of "Ganbare Goemon! Karakuri Douchou".
Ganbare Goemon 2 est un jeu d'action développé et édité par Konami. C'est le troisième jeu de la série Ganbare Goemon et une suite de "Ganbare Goemon! Karakuri Douchou".

game.name: Ganbare Goemon Gaiden - Kieta Ougon Kiseru

locale.title: Ganbare Goemon Gaiden - Kieta Ougon Kiseru
locale.synopsis:
This is a semi-humorous console-style RPG set in medieval Japan. It tells us about the adventures of Goemon, the noble thief and skillful martial artist. One day Goemon returns home and finds out his favorite smoking pipe is gone. Who could have done such a horrible crime? Goemon's friend Ebisumaru offers to help him to find out the criminal, and both embark on a journey full of adventures and danger.
Like most console-style RPGs of the time, "Goemon Gaiden" utilizes a simple turn-based battle system. You talk to town people to gather information, buy weapons, armor and items, fight random enemies, descend into dungeons and find treasures.

locale.title: Ganbare Goemon Gaiden : Kieta Ougon Kiseru

game.name: Ganbare Goemon Gaiden 2 - Tenka No Zaihou

locale.title: Ganbare Goemon Gaiden 2 - Tenka No Zaihou
locale.synopsis:
This is a sequel to the first Ganbare Goemon Gaiden (side-story) RPG. Goemon, a cunning thief and an avid treasure hunting, has nothing to do and sits in his house, bored. But his trusty friend Ebisumaru has good news: there is a big treasure to find somewhere in a big city across the sea. Of course the treasure won't be just given to Goemon: he'll have to perform a dangerous mission before. The two friends board a ship and thus the journey begins...
The game is very similar to its predecessor, as well as to most other console-style RPGs of the period. You talk to people in towns, buy various equipment, descend into dungeons, and fight random enemies and bosses in turn-based combat. The combat perspective is slightly changed in this sequel (over-the-shoulder view of the battle instead of semi-animated pictures).

locale.title: Ganbare Goemon Gaiden 2 : Tenka no Zaihou
Ganbare Goemon! Karakuri Douchuu
locale.synopsis:
First title in the Ganbare Goemon game series of action/adventure titles. Karakuri Douchuu stars Goemon as he has to make his way through several parts of feudal Japan fending off bandits and other evil-doers.
The game is played as a side-scrolling beat 'em up, but with the added challenge of having to find the exit for the maze-like stages besides beating all the baddies. Goemon fights using his smoking pipe, but he can upgrade his weapon with power-ups found in the game or bought at several shops using the money collected from fallen enemies à la River City Ransom. Features hot-seat alternating 2 player gameplay.

Premier épisode de cette série délirante à sortir sur console, Karakuri Douchuu est également la toute première cartouche de 2 mégabits à voir le jour sur Famicom. Armé d'une simple pipe, vous partez explorer différents niveaux dans le Japon de l'ère Edo (la spécificité de la série) où il faudra entreprendre des recherches pour en découvrir la sortie. Au programme, passages secrets à la Zelda, obtention de passes dissimulés ci et là pour progresser, bonus à récolter pour améliorer son personnage, armes qui se dégradent en fonctions des dégâts reçus et affrontements directement inspirés du beat'em all.

locale.title: Ganbare Pennant Race!
locale.synopsis: Ganbare Pennant Race! is a NES baseball game from Konami. It is not a sequel to Exciting Baseball, Konami's only other baseball game for the system, but rather a new game that features cameos from other Konami games and characters from its popular Ganbare Goemon series. Specifically, the fictional team of "Konami Goemontai" is a team comprised entirely of Goemons. Other fictional teams include: Donuts, Gyruss, Caps, Swimmers, Walls, Targets, Lighters, Bubbles, Harps, Flowers, Brains, Olives and Konami Kurokotai.

locale.title: Ganso Saiyuuki - Super Monkey Daibouken
locale.synopsis: This game is based on the Chinese novel Journey to the West. The goal of the game is to survive the long and arduous journey from China to India.Players take control of Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, as he helps guide Xuanzang, a Buddhist monk, on his quest

Ce jeu est basé sur le roman chinois Journey to the West. Le but du jeu est de survivre au long et pénible voyage de la Chine vers l'Inde. Les joueurs prennent le contrôle de Sun Wukong, le roi des singes, alors qu'il guide Xuanzang, un moine bouddhiste, dans sa quête

game.name: Garfield No Isshkan - A Week Of Garfield

locale.title: Garfield: A Week of Garfield
locale.synopsis:
Garfield, the lovable fat orange cat, has gotten himself into a spot of trouble. His pal and center of abuse, the yellow dog Odie, has gone and disappeared somewhere. Their owner, Jon, is too lazy to go look for Odie himself, so he has Garfield go out and look for him. And so Garfield heads off, out into the world.
A Week of Garfield is a side-scrolling platform game based on the comic strip by Jim Davis. Garfield heads to the right through various indoor and outdoor city environments, dealing with endless vermin like frogs, birds, and mice using his judo kick skills and several different weapons such as bones that can be thrown. He has a life bar that can quickly deplete if he isn't careful, but hidden all around each stage are various items, which can replenish his health, refill his weapon supplies, and give him super speed or invincibility; be careful, though, as sometimes he'll also find fish bones which will harm Garfield if eaten.
The game is divided into seven stages, each representing a day of the week, and each with several sections. At the end of each section is a door, and Garfield must find the key hidden somewhere on the screen to unlock the door and continue. At the last door of each stage, there is a boss that must be defeated before Garfield can find the key. Each stage also has a strict time limit to keep him from dawdling, and between stages, Jon will appear to encourage Garfield or give him some advice.

A Week of Garfield est un jeu d'action sur NES. Vous incarnez le célèbre chat paresseux Garfield et devez combattre des souris, des oiseaux, des araignées et autres animaux en utilisant les attaques de Garfield à savoir des coups de pieds. Secourez le pauvre Odie des griffes de méchants chats lanceurs de couteaux et autres objets dangereux !

locale.title: Garfield no Isshukan: A Week of Garfield
Gargoyle's Quest II
locale.synopsis:
The Ghoul realm is under attack by a mysterious force and aspiring warrior Firebrand sets out to save it.
As in its predecessor, gameplay in Gargoyle's Quest II is divided into an adventure and an action part. During the adventure parts, Firebrand explores a world map and several villages from a top-down perspective, talking to his fellow ghouls and zombies to advance the story or receive important items. Action parts are seen from a side-scrolling perspective. In these parts of the game, Firebrand has the ability to jump, cling to walls, fly for a limited amount of time and shoot fireballs at his enemies. As the game progresses, Firebrand becomes more and more powerful, receiving items that improve his agility, armor or attack power.

El reino Ghoul está bajo ataque de una fuerza misteriosa y el guerrero aspirante Firebrand se dispone a salvarlo.
Como en su predecesor, el juego en Gargoyle's Quest II se divide en aventura y acción. Durante las partes de la aventura, Firebrand explora un mapa del mundo y varios pueblos desde una perspectiva de arriba hacia abajo, hablando con sus compañeros ghouls y zombies para avanzar la historia o recibir elementos importantes. Las partes de acción se ven desde una perspectiva de desplazamiento lateral. En estas partes del juego, Firebrand tiene la capacidad de saltar, aferrarse a las paredes, volar durante un período limitado de tiempo y disparar bolas de fuego a sus enemigos. A medida que avanza el juego, Firebrand se vuelve más y más poderoso, recibiendo elementos que mejoran su agilidad, armadura o poder de ataque.

Gargoyle's Quest II est la suite du jeu d'action aventure Gargoyle's Quest sur Game Boy. Comme sont prédécesseur, il comporte une partie aventure, à défilement vertical, dans laquelle le personnage principal explore de nombreux villages, rencontre d'autres personnages et trouve des objets, et une partie action à défilement horizontal. Firebrand est une gargouille du clan des Red Arremer vivant dans le Royaume des Démons. Il s'entraîne à devenir un guerrier capable d'affronter les humains, mais lors de son initiation, son village est attaqué par les Destructeurs, des ennemis de longue date des Démons. Tous les habitants disparaissent mystérieusement, victime d'une « lumière ténébreuse » sauf Firebrand qui survit miraculeusement. Avant de disparaître à son tour, le chef du village confie à Firebrand la mission de trouver le roi et lui venir en aide. Firebrand n'aura de cesse de rencontrer cet étrange « Demon Darkness » qui plane sur le royaume.
La gargouille se lance ainsi dans une longue aventure où il devra combattre les Destructeurs, et apprendre qui il est.

Als junger Dämon in Ausbildung fällt Firebrand die Aufgabe zu, ein böses finsteres Licht zu besiegen, das seine Heimat bedroht.
Gargoyle's Quest II ist eine Mischung aus Jump'n'Run und Rollenspiel, das Adventure- und Action-Elemente kombiniert. Im Lauf des Spiels kannst du Firebrands Flug- und Sprungfähigkeit sowie seine magischen Kräfte verbessern. Du erkundest die Umgebung, sammelst Items und bekämpfst Bosse, um schließlich das ultimative Böse zu bezwingen.

locale.title: Garou Densetsu Special
locale.synopsis: Garou Densetsu Special (literally "Hungry Wolf Legend") is a pirated port of Fatal Fury Special by Hummer Team, made for the Famicom in 1995. This is a port of the SNES version. This version includes 8 characters and four repeats of each: Kim Kaphwan, Tung Fu Rue, Wolfgang Krauser, Ryo Sakazaki, Terry Bogard, Andy Bogard, Joe Higashi and Mai Shiranui. All of the characters are playable. Like some Hummer Team fighting games, the difficulty can be changed on the title screen. Unlike the original game, the characters don't get their own stages, instead they go in a preset loop throughout the game. As well as this, some of the characters' original stages aren't present in this game. The graphics are taken from the original game and downgraded. The music is mostly taken from there as well, but one song is remixed from Street Fighter IV, and the ending music from Kart Fighter is present here. The ending is a shortened version of the one from the original game.

locale.title: Garry Kitchen's BattleTank
locale.synopsis:
Battletank is an advanced tank simulator where players take control of a tank from its driver's seat. Players are stuck straight in the tank and sent off to the battlefield in order to accomplish the mission they are assigned to.
Mission objectives.can be anything from eliminating the enemies to destroying the enemy fuel dump to taking out an enemy camp. However dangerous enemies lurk all over the battlefield. Helicopters, minefields and other tanks wait to block your moves. These enemies can move off-screen and strafe around the tank, leading to difficulties.
However, many strategic elements are involved. The first-person mode offers a limited view of the battlefield, and if players push the tank into overdrive it can miss the target and rush into a nest of tanks or a minefield. Turret angle, ammunition, and tank fuel remaining must all be taken into account by the player. To add to this, certain guns on the tank (there's 4 of them) will only hurt certain enemies. But don't expect any help here! Six hits and your tank is cooked!

Battle Tank sur Nes est un jeu de tir classique dans lequel vous contrôlez un tank et détruisez tous les ennemis se présentant à vous. Un mode Mission et un mode multijoueur sont proposés. Dans les deux cas, vous mènerez des combats dans une arène vue du dessus et participerez à de nombreux massacres en règle.

locale.title: Gauntlet
locale.synopsis:
Gauntlet, the original arcade smash hit, is a fighting game where you choose a character and let rip into the hordes of enemies that assault you on you way to the end of the level. One or two players must make their way through 100 levels of mayhem and magic.
It featured a choice of four characters to play with, each with different weapons. Thor the Warrior, has a bludgeoning battle axe, Thyra the Valkyrie, has a close range sword, Questor the Elf has his long range bow, and Merlin the Wizard has magical bolts.
Ghosts, goblins and even the life draining Death are your enemies. Enemies stream out of generators, so destroy these before tackling the rest.
Keys are needed to open the many doors within the levels, and in some situations a door will contain only bonus items, not a progressive route. Scattered magic potions act like smart bombs and clear the screen of all enemies. Beware of poison though, this reduces your energy level. Treasure is abundant throughout the levels and adds to your score.

Invoque la poderosa hacha de Thor, la guadaña de Thyra, la magia mítica de Merlin o las veloces flechas de Questor en su conquista del Calabozo de las Tinieblas. Entra en el mundo de los monstruos y los laberintos. Viaja por los senderos del misterio y combate en busca del alimento que te dará la energía. Tu camino estará repleto de peligrosos monstruos y legiones de enemigos, pero no estás solo en tu busca de alimentos, tesoros y pociones mágicas, tus amigos estarán contigo.

Gauntlet sur Nes est un jeu d'action hack and slash dont l'objectif est de tuer tous ses assaillants dans un labyrinthe et d'atteindre le niveau suivant. Pour ce faire, le joueur a le choix entre quatre personnages différents. Chacun possède ses propres caractéristiques et correspond à un style de combat particulier. Gauntlet peut être joué à deux simultanément en coopératif.

locale.title: Gauntlet II
locale.synopsis: Based on the arcade game, Gauntlet II is very similar to the original. Up to four players (a wizard, a warrior, an elf, and a valkyrie) make their way through various mazes, collect treasures and magic potions, and fend off assorted creatures and ghosts.

Basado en el juego de la recreativa, Gauntlet II es muy similar al original. Hasta cuatro jugadores (un mago, un guerrero, un elfo y un valkyrie) hacen su camino a través de varios laberintos, recogen tesoros y pociones mágicas, y deben defenderse de criaturas variadas y fantasmas.

Gauntlet II est un jeu d'action sur NES. Vous choisissez votre personnage parmi quatre : un sorcier, un guerrier, un elfe et un Valkyrie. Partez ensuite à la recherche de trésors et d'objets magiques dans des couloirs infestés de créatures malfaisantes.

game.name: Gegege No Kitarou 2 - Youkai Gundan No Chousen

locale.title: Gegege No Kitarou 2 - Youkai Gundan No Chousen
locale.synopsis:
Gegege no Kitarou 2: Youkai Gundan no Chousen (Spooky Kitaro 2: Kitaro vs. Yokai Army) is a RPG game based on a manga and anime from Japan about a boy who is a youkai, a class of spirit-monster to which all of the main characters belong. The main character, Kitarou, is the last living member of a Ghost tribe. He is missing his left eye, but his hair usually covers the empty socket. He fights for peace between humans and yÅkai, which generally involves protecting the former from the wiles of the latter. While the game follows the release of Gegege no Kitarou: Youkai Daimakyou (released in the U.S as Ninja Kid), it is not a direct sequel to the original game, which is an action side-scroller.
Gegege no Kitarou 2 plays very much like a simplified traditional RPG. Fights are turn-based, where the player must input his command, and then watch the sequence of event play out until the round is over and the next round begins. However, even though it is simplified, it is actually a rather difficult and challenging game. In the very beginning of the game, Kitarou struggles to survive more than two fights against monsters before needing to return home and rest until he reaches level 2. A majority of the enemies only provide experience points in the single digits until much later in the game, although to compensate, the amount of experience needed to reach each level is low by comparison as well. Kitarou maxes out at Level 10 when he reaches 999 experience points.
The map of the game's overworld is a fairly faithful representation of Japan, along with part of Korea and a small unidentified island. Kitarou must explore the island nation to rescue his girlfriend and the rest of the world from the onslaught of evil Youkai that threaten to take over the world of the living. He must locate several homes, castles, and cave entrances to make his way through Japan, which suffers from spirit storms that prevent him from exploring new regions on the island until some task has been completed first.

Gegege no Kitarou 2: Youkai Gundan no Chousen est un jeu RPG basé sur un manga et un anime du Japon sur un garçon qui est un yôkai, une classe de monstre spirituel à laquelle tous les personnages principaux appartiennent. Le personnage principal, Kitarou, est le dernier membre vivant d'une tribu des Ghost. Il lui manque l'?il gauche, mais ses cheveux recouvrent habituellement la cavité vide. Il se bat pour la paix entre les humains et yÅ ?? kai, ce qui implique généralement de protéger les premiers contre les ruses de ces derniers. Alors que le jeu suit la sortie de Gegege no Kitarou: Youkai Daimakyou (sorti sur U.S en tant que Ninja Kid), il ne s'agit pas d'une suite directe au jeu original, qui est un jeu d'action.nnnnGegege no Kitarou 2 joue beaucoup comme un RPG traditionnel simplifié. Les combats sont au tour par tour, où le joueur doit entrer sa commande, puis regarder la séquence de l'événement jusqu'à ce que le tour soit terminé et que le tour suivant commence. Cependant, même si c'est simplifié, c'est en fait un jeu plutôt difficile et difficile. Au tout début du jeu, Kitarou lutte pour survivre à plus de deux combats contre des monstres avant de devoir retourner à la maison et se reposer jusqu'à ce qu'il atteigne le niveau 2. La majorité des ennemis ne fournissent des points d'expérience que dans le jeu. Bien que pour compenser, la quantité d'expérience nécessaire pour atteindre chaque niveau est également faible. Kitarou atteint le niveau 10 lorsqu'il atteint 999 points d'expérience.nnnnLa carte de l'Overworld du jeu est une représentation assez fidèle du Japon, avec une partie de la Corée et une petite île non identifiée. Kitarou doit explorer la nation de l'île pour sauver sa petite amie et le reste du monde de l'assaut du mal Youkai qui menace de prendre le contrôle du monde des vivants. Il doit localiser plusieurs maisons, châteaux et entrées de grottes pour se frayer un chemin à travers le Japon, qui souffre de tempêtes spirituelles qui l'empêchent d'explorer de nouvelles régions de l'île jusqu'à ce qu'une tâche soit accomplie en premier.

locale.title: Gegege no Kitarou 2 : Youkai Gundan no Chousen
Geimos
locale.synopsis:
Geimos is an arcade style space shooter where players take control of a spaceship that flies over several different planets' surfaces destroying the incoming enemy units.
The game contains two different game modes. "Mode A" keeps the games camera perspective in the same position. Players have control over their spaceships altitude while flying around the screen and can fire two different weapons. One weapon is meant for ground enemies while the other weapon is meant for aerial enemies. While the majority of the enemies are gun towers, ships and tanks that can be defeated in one shot, at the end of each round players will have to face off with a gigantic boss enemy that will require several shots to defeat.
Mode B is similar to Mode A, but now the camera follows the players ship's movements instead. This mode also features a fixed target reticle in front of the player's ship to help with aiming their fire.
Geimos est un shoot'em up sur Nes dans lequel vous pilotez un vaisseau, volant à la surface d'une planète inhospitalière.

locale.title: Gekitotsu Yonku Battle
locale.synopsis: Gekitotsu Shiku Battle is a Japan-exclusive video game of the vehicular combat game genre released in 1989 by Irem for the Family Computer.
Gekitotsu Shiku Battle est un jeu vidéo exclusif au Japon, sorti en 1989 par Irem pour le Family Computer.

locale.title: Gemfire
locale.synopsis:
Koei made an incursion into the fantasy worlds of magic with this game.
Six magicians, each trapped inside a magical gem, are liberated from the crown Gemfire by Princess Robyn, daughter of the tyrannical ruler of Ishmeria, King Eselred. Fleeing across the length and breadth of the island nation, they each choose a leader from the greatest noble houses as their champion to topple Eselred and bring peace to Ishmeria.
Players select one of these noblemen and seek to unite all the provinces under their banner through a combination of warfare and diplomacy.

Koei hizo una incursión en los mundos de fantasía y de la magia con este juego.
Seis magos, cada uno atrapado dentro de una gema mágica, son liberados de la corona Gemfire por la princesa Robyn, hija del gobernante tiránico de Ishmeria, el rey Eselred. Huyendo a lo largo y ancho de la nación de la isla, cada uno elige a un líder de las casas nobles más grandes como su campeón para derrocar a Eselred y traer paz a Ishmeria.
Los jugadores eligen a uno de estos nobles y buscan unir todas las provincias bajo su bandera a través de una combinación de guerra y diplomacia.

Six magiciens et un dragon, prisonniés des joyaux magiques de la couronne Gemfire, sont libérés par la princesse Robyn, fille du souverain tyrannique d'Ishmeria, le roi Eselred. Parcourant la nation insulaire en long et en large, ils élisent chacun un chef issu des plus grandes maisons nobles pour être leur champion et renverser Eselred afin de ramener la paix à Ishmeria. Les joueurs choisissent l'un de ces nobles et cherchent à unir toutes les provinces sous leur bannière grâce à une combinaison de guerre et de diplomatie.

locale.title: Genghis Khan
locale.synopsis: In a few words: Conquer all you can. You have two options: Mongol conquest or World conquest. In the first campaign as Temujin (later known as Genghis Khan), you must unite all the little tribes of Mongolia. You can use force or diplomacy. In the second campaign, you can be one of four characters. As in the first campaign, you must unite all the countries.

Genghis Khan es un juego de estrategia por turnos, basado en la vida real del líder mongol Gengis Khan.
El principal objetivo del juego es convertirse en el gobernante supremo. El jugador puede elegir entre dos campañas: la conquista mongol o la conquista del mundo. En la conquista de los mongoles, los jugadores asumen el papel de Temujin (más tarde conocido como Genghis Khan), siendo su objetivo unir a todas las tribus de Mongolia. En la conquista del mundo, los jugadores pueden ser uno de los cuatro personajes. Similar a la conquista de los mongoles, los jugadores deben unir a todos los países. Los jugadores pueden utilizar la fuerza militar (deben reunir un ejército y conducirlos a la guerra) o usar la diplomacia (incluyendo cosas como los matrimonios estratégicos).
El foco principal del juego consiste en la gestión del territorio, ya que el jugador maneja varias actividades que mejoran sus provincias. Los campos de batalla son baldosas hexagonales, donde se puede dar órdenes a los grupos de unidades con el objetivo de tratar de derrotar a las fuerzas de los combatientes enemigos.

Genghis Khan est un jeu d'action/stratégie sur Nes. Au début vous pouvez choisir entre une conquête Mondiale, ou la conquête Mongole. Dans la première, il faut que vous unissiez tous les pays présents sur la carte. Dans le deuxième, vous incarnez le grand Temujin et vous devez réunir toutes les petites tribus de la Mongolie.

locale.title: Aoki Ookami to Shiroki Mejika : Genghis Khan

game.name: Genghis Khan 2 - Clan Of The Grey Wolf

locale.title: Genghis Khan II : Clan of the Grey Wolf
locale.synopsis: As in the first part you could participate in two conquests: Mongol conquest and world conquest. In the first you must unite all the little tribes of the country. The world conquest is more complex: You must use all your senses to make the world as you wish.

Genghis Khan II : Clan of the Grey Wolf est un jeu d'action/stratégie sur Nes. En début de partie, il est possible de choisir entre une conquête mondiale, ou la conquête mongole. Dans la première, vous devez conquérir tous les pays afin de bâtir le Monde comme vous le souhaitez. Dans la deuxième vous incarnez le grand Temujin et vous devez réunir toutes les petites tribus de la Mongolie.

locale.title: Aoki Ookami to Shiroki Mejika : Genchou Hishi
Genpei Touma Den - Computer Boardgame
locale.synopsis:
A heavily modified version of Namco's Arcade brawler Genpei Touma Den, known in the west as The Genji and the Heike Clans, Genpei Touma Den: Computer Boardgame is an RPG where the player controls resurrected samurai Tairo no Kagekiyo in his quest for vengeance against the Genji clan.
Kagekiyo travels the country searching for his eternal nemeses all the while fighting youkai and other monsters. These fights are depicted as one-on-one turn-based struggles where the player and creature's health is depicted as candles. Kagekiyo can regenerate health at shrines by spending money and can also level up stats at torii gates by spending "toku", or virtue. Both money and toku are earned defeating enemies.
The game has a physical board game component as well. Included in the box is several miniatures and a fold-out board. Players use the board to move their pieces, but all combat is depicted in-game.

locale.title: George Foreman's KO Boxing
locale.synopsis:
Featuring heavyweight champion George Foreman, this is a boxing simulation where players, taking the role of Foreman, go through a series of twelve rounds against different boxers to win the championship title belt.
Played from an third-person perspective using a view from right over the shoulders over the boxer, players can move left and right to dodge incoming punches, block and throw left and right punches. The standard punch is a cross, but by holding the Up-key pressed, jabs can also be thrown.
By avoiding punches and hitting them, a superpunch often becomes available, inflicting much more damage. A fight consists of a maximum of three rounds of three minutes each. When a boxer is knocked down four times, the match is over (technical knock-out). The same happens when a boxer goes down three times in a single round (regular knock-out). When down, players need to press both punch buttons in rapid succession to get back to their feet. The screen shows an energy meter drained when punches are received. After being knocked down and during intermissions, some energy is restored.
All versions, except for the Game Boy, can be played with two players. A password system is used to save the progress.

George Foreman's KO Boxing es un videojuego de boxeo con gráficos en 2D que utiliza una perspectiva y forma de juego muy similares a los del clásico Punch Out!, en donde el personaje principal está visto de espaldas y el oponente aparece al frente. El lanzamiento de este videojuego se realizó en la época en que George Foreman había regresado al boxeo, luego de estar retirado por 10 años, de modo que su popularidad era muy alta entre los fans de este deporte.
Este título presenta gráficos con enormes sprites de los personajes que tienen un estilo un tanto caricaturesco. Además de Foreman, aparecen 15 rivales a quienes hay que derrotar, estos tienen diseños y personalidades únicas y en general representan a diversos estereotipos que los hacen parecidos a personajes de lucha libre. Durante la pelea además aparecen las caras de los boxeadores junto a sus barras de energía que van mostrando el nivel de daño recibido y como se van desfigurando. El juego incluye diálogos únicos para cada personaje, que se oyen al iniciar el round, incluyendo la voz de George Foreman grabada por él mismo.

Vous incarnez le champion George Foreman dans ce jeu de boxe où vous devez battre des boxeurs fictifs pour remporter la ceinture dorée. George Foreman's KO Boxing propose une vue de côté et des matchs pouvant durer jusqu'à 10 rounds. A noter la possibilité de pouvoir effectuer des "super punches" pour envoyer l'adversaire dans les cordes et ainsi le bloquer tout en lui infligeant de sérieux coups.

locale.title: Getsu Fuuma Den
locale.synopsis:
In the first years of the Demon Age, a horrible demon named "Dragon Master" was revived by his minions in hell. To protect the peace of the overworld, the two eldest Fuuma brothers fought the Dragon Master. Both were unable to defeat him and were killed, losing their legendary Wave Swords, also called Hadoukens. To avenge their deaths, the last of the Fuuma brothers vowed to slay the Dragon Master, and take back the Hadoukens.
Getsufuma Den is an action game with slight RPG elements. You travel through the overworld on pre-determined paths, which branch most of the time, leading you to shops, places where you can encounter other characters, and dungeons. Once you descend into a dungeon, you navigate your character on a platform, jumping and fighting enemies with your sword or other weapons. There are also a few first-person dungeons later in the game. In the dungeons you can collect money and then use it to buy weapons and other accessories on the overworld.

Dans les premières années de l'Âge des démons, un démon horrible nommé "Dragon Master" a été ranimé par ses serviteurs en enfer. Pour protéger la paix de l'au-delà, les deux frères aînés Fuuma ont combattu le Maître Dragon. Tous deux ont été incapables de le vaincre et ont été tués, perdant leurs légendaires Wave Swords, également appelés Hadoukens. Pour venger leur mort, le dernier des frères Fuuma a juré de tuer le Maître des dragons et de reprendre les Hadoukens.nnnnGetsufuma Den est un jeu d'action avec de légers éléments RPG. Vous voyagez à travers l'au-delà sur des chemins prédéterminés, qui sillonnent la plupart du temps, vous conduisant aux magasins, aux endroits où vous pouvez rencontrer d'autres personnages et aux donjons. Une fois que vous descendez dans un donjon, vous naviguez votre personnage sur une plate-forme, en sautant et en combattant des ennemis avec votre épée ou d'autres armes. Il y a aussi quelques donjons à la première personne plus tard dans le jeu. Dans les donjons, vous pouvez collecter de l'argent et ensuite l'utiliser pour acheter des armes et autres accessoires sur le monde supérieur.

locale.title: Ghostbusters
locale.synopsis:
Based on the movie of the same name, the Ghostbusters are the ones to call who will "bust" any ghost hauntings. It does this through the use of nuclear accelerated "proton packs" and traps, whereby the ghosts can be captured and transferred to a secure storage facility. However New York City has suddenly become a very haunted place, and the number of ghosts has suddenly increased. The Ghostbusters must reduce the paranormal (PK) level in the city, representing ghost power, before the Temple of Zuul awakens and ressurects an evil goddess, Gozer.
Ghostbusters is an action game that combines an overhead view and a side-view. From Ghostbusters HQ, the player must monitor the map of New York City for "ghost alarms" as well as casual spirits, and plot a route to the alarmed area. The player then controls the Ghostbuster vehicle as it drives through traffic. Here, the player is able to capture casual ghosts on the way if they are en route. Once at the location, the game switches to a side-view. Two of the ghostbusters will take position and activate their proton beams and toss a trap to the ground. The player will attempt to maneuver the ghost(s) over the placed trap. Once activated, the trap attempts to capture any ghosts directly above it. Successful capture will earn the player money, which can then be used to purchase new Ghostbusters vehicles and new modifications for the vehicle. Unsuccessful capture will see the ghost fly away.
As the game progresses, the PK energy of the city increases. Ghostbusters must keep it under critical levels by being constantly successful at ghost captures. Eventually the Temple of Zuul will activate, and if the PK levels are still manageable, the Ghostbusters can venture there for a final showdown with Gozer.

Basado en la película de 1984 del mismo nombre, los Cazafantasmas es a quien hay que llamar cuando hay apariciones de fantasmas. Lo hacen mediante el uso de "packs" de protones nucleares acelerados y "trampas de fantasmas", por lo que los fantasmas pueden ser capturados y trasladados a una instalación de almacenamiento seguro en su Sede. Sin embargo la ciudad de Nueva York se ha convertido de repente en un lugar muy frecuentado, y el número de fantasmas ha aumentado de repente y de forma espectacular. Los Ghostbusters deben reducir la energía psychokinetica paranormal, el "nivel de PK" en la ciudad, lo que representa el poder fantasma, antes de que en el Templo de Zuul despierte y resucite un dios malvado llamado Gozer.
Ghostbusters es un juego de acción que cuenta con una vista superior y una vista lateral. Desde el HQ de los Ghostbusters, el jugador debe controlar un mapa del centro de Manhattan para "alarmas fantasma" , así como para la informal, espíritus de itinerancia, y trazar una ruta hacia la zona de alarma. Una vez que la ruta está trazada, el jugador controla entonces el Ghostmobile a través del tráfico. Aquí, el jugador es capaz de capturar fantasmas ocasionales en el camino. Cuando se llega al lugar frecuentado, el juego cambia a una vista lateral. Dos de los Cazafantasmas tomarán posiciones, activan sus haces de protones, y tiran una trampa en el suelo. El jugador debe utilizar las dos Ghostbutsers para intentar llevar al fantasma a la trampa colocada. Una vez activado, los resortes de trampas para capturar fantasmas se activarán. Una captura exitosa hará ganar al jugador dinero, que luego puede ser utilizado para la compra de vehículos nuevos cazafantasmas y nuevas modificaciones para ello. Una captura infructuosa y verás al fantasma volando.
A medida que el juego progresa , la energía PK en la ciudad aumenta. Los Ghostbusters deben mantenerla bajo niveles críticos por ser constantemente acertados en capturar fantasmas. Finalmente, el Templo de Zuul se activará, y si los niveles de PK son todavía manejables, los Cazafantasmas pueden aventurarse allí para un enfrentamiento final con Gozer.

GhostBusters sur Nes est un jeu d'action basé sur le film S.O.S. Fantômes. Vous incarnez la fine équipe de chasseurs de fantômes et vous vous attaquez à toutes formes d'activités paranormales. Armé de votre fusil à protons, capturez tous les revenants indésirables de New York et mettez Guzer, le dieu summérien, hors d'état de nuire.

locale.title: Ghostbusters 2
locale.synopsis: Ghostbusters II is a single-player side-scrolling game. Generally, the player controls a ghostbuster as he explores levels based on the film. The character's goal is to make his way to the museum before time runs out. Two levels involve riding around in the heroes' famous car. In another level the player controls the Statue of Liberty, shooting fireballs. The ghostbuster character is armed with unlimited supplies of slime that can be shot out of a cannon and ghost traps.

Basado en la película del mismo nombre, algo extraño está pasando en la ciudad de Nueva York y los Cazafantasmas han vuelto y están armados con su arma de limo para averiguar lo que es. La búsqueda de los Ghostbusters, como en la película, los lleva a un río subterráneo de limo, apariciones fantasmales en el juzgado y una línea de metro abandonada. Estas secuencias de acción están intercaladas con secuencias de conducción con el coche Cazafantasmas, Ecto-1A. Por último, los Cazafantasmas debe llevar la estatua de la libertad a la vida a través del puerto de Nueva York y luego se dirigirán a través de las calles de la ciudad. Esto conduce a una confrontación final con Virgo the Carpathian en la que los 4 miembros ghostbuster deben luchar en su camino hacia el museo.
En las secuencias de acción controlas ghostbuster que puede disparar su arma de limo y saltar. En las secuencias de conducción mueves el Ecto-1A por la pantalla y controlas también un arma de limo y saltar. Además hay que encontrar las flechas de velocidad sobre el terreno para saltar por encima de enormes abismos. Por último, mientras controlas la estatua de la libertad puedes disparar tu antorcha hacia arriba (Encontrar un soplete para disparar en diagonal) o soltar la pastilla que lleva a destruir todos los enemigos en la pantalla.
Encuentra 20 símbolos "Ghostbusters 2" en cualquiera de estos niveles para obtener una vida extra.
L'histoire se déroule à New York. L'équipe SOS Fantôme doit se rendre d'urgence au musée d'art pour affronter Vigo de Carpathe, qui a transformé la ville en un cauchemar paranormal.

locale.title: Ghosts'n Goblins
locale.synopsis:
Ghosts'n Goblins is a sideways scrolling action platformer spread over six levels, each of which must be completed within three minutes (or a life is lost), taking in forest, village, mountain and cavern settings with increasing difficulty.
Arthur the brave knight must rescue his beloved Princess from the Demon King Astaroth and his forces - amongst them are the various undead (ghosts, zombies), bats, ogres and goblins. Other challenges include moving platforms, ladders and water/fire hazards.
As in most games in this genre, the player can pick up power-ups such as daggers and bombs during the course of the game, giving the player greater firepower.

Ghost 'n Goblins es un juego de plataformas de acción de desplazamiento lateral en seis niveles, cada uno de los cuales debe ser completado dentro de tres minutos (o se pierde una vida).
Arthur el valiente caballero debe rescatar a su amada princesa del rey demonio Astaroth y sus fuerzas, entre ellas hay diversos muertos vivientes (fantasmas, zombies), murciélagos, ogros y duendes. Otros desafíos incluyen plataformas móviles, escaleras y obstáculos de agua y fuego.
El jugador puede caminar a la izquierda y la derecha, saltar, y también está equipado con una lanza para usar como arma. Ser golpeado por los enemigos hace que Arthur pierda su armadura y corra en calzoncillos, ser golpeado de nuevo hará que el jugador pierda una vida. Al igual que en la mayoría de los juegos de este género, el jugador puede recoger power-ups como dagas y bombas durante el transcurso del juego, dando al jugador una mayor potencia de fuego.

Ghosts'n Goblins est un jeu d'action/plates-formes sur Nes. Arthur le brave chevalier doit sauver sa princesse bien-aimée des griffes du démon King Astaroth. Différents challenges l'attende au fil des niveaux remplis de créatures malfaisantes à abattre.

locale.title: Ghoul School
locale.synopsis:
In Ghoul School the player is cast as Spike O'Hara, a senior at Cool School High in a small American town. Spike is a rebel and an outcast, but is a good kid. While taking a shortcut through the graveyard home one day, he comes across a glowing skull. Intrigued, he takes it to Dr. Femur, his anatomy teacher, the next day, which happens to be the day before Halloween. Dr. Femur wants to keep it for an overnight study, and Spike reluctantly agrees, noticing that the skull appeared bigger than the day before.
During the night, the skull begins transmitting a message to the realm of the dead. On Halloween, the dead begin their assault. The teachers and students inside are turned into zombies and demons under the control of whatever intelligence has taken over the school. Samantha Pom-Pom, the head cheerleader, is captured by the dead and held somewhere inside the school. Paranormal eliminators and members of the football team have ventured inside to find her, but have not returned. When Spike learns of the mess from the TV news, he rushes to the school and decides to rescue her himself.
Spike ventures inside. The doors shut and lock behind him. There's no turning back now.
Spike begins his quest with only his trusty baseball bat and battered sneakers, but can collect better weapons and shoes along the way.
