Une fois au sol quelques pressions sur la flèche du bas vous permettrons de regonfler les ballons pour reprendre la voie des airs.

locale.title: Heracles No Eikou - Toujin Makyouden
locale.synopsis:
In this game, you play the role of Herakles (or Hercules, in Latin pronunciation), the famous legendary Greek hero. Starting in Athens and wandering all over ancient Greece (and even the mythical land of the dead), you'll have to fight many monsters, including popular figures from Greek mythology like Talos or Hades, and prove yourself worthy of a hero's fame.
The game is very similar to Dragon Warrior series: you fight random enemies in turn-based battles viewed from first-person perspective, collect experience and money, and in towns talk to people and buy weapons, armor, and items. There is no world map in the game, but a continuous location complete with towns and dungeon-like areas.

Dans ce jeu, vous jouez le rôle d'Héraclès (ou Hercule, en prononciation latine), le célèbre héros grec légendaire. À partir d'Athènes et errant dans toute la Grèce antique (et même la terre mythique des morts), vous devrez combattre de nombreux monstres, y compris des personnages populaires de la mythologie grecque comme Talos ou Hadès, et prouver votre gloire.
Le jeu est très similaire à la série Dragon Warrior: vous affrontez des ennemis aléatoires dans des batailles au tour par tour, récoltez de l'expérience et de l'argent, et dans les villes parlez aux gens et achetez des armes, des armures et des objets. Il n'y a pas de carte du monde dans le jeu, mais un emplacement continu complet avec des villes et des zones de donjon.

locale.title: Heracles no Eikou : Toujin Makyou Den

game.name: Heracles No Eikou 2 - Titan No Metsubou

locale.title: Heracles No Eikou 2 - Titan No Metsubou
locale.synopsis:
In this second installment of "Greek mythology" RPG series, the main hero is not the legendary hero Herakles (Hercules), but a young boy from a town Nana, where he lives with his grandmother. The queen tells you that people are being tortured by Titans - an ancient god-like race controlled by the Lord of darkness. You must help to liberate people from the wrath of the Titans. Your first assignment is to go to Athens and to find the famous poet Homer who can tell you about the way to defeat the Titans. During your journey you meet many characters from the Greek mythology, including Daedalus, Cerberus, and Hephaestus, and recruit interesting creatures to fight at your side, such as the half-horse Centaur or the Woman Without Soul. You'll also encounter real people from the Greek history, like Homer the poet or Hippocrates the doctor.
The gameplay is similar to Dragon Warrior style: you travel on the world map, visiting towns and dungeons, talking to people, and fighting random enemies and bosses in turn-based combat viewed from first-person perspective. An interesting innovation is a full day/night cycle. Locations look different at night, and it is sometimes necessary to visit them at different times.

The Glory of Heracles: Titan's Downfall (ou Herakles no Eikou II) est la suite d'un jeu qui s'est fortement inspiré de Dragon Quest, utilisant la même interface, la même façon de combattre. L'originalité de ce soft réside dans le background, puisqu'il fait référence à la mythologie grecque. Jamais sorti en dehors du Japon, ce volet à eu la chance de se voir doté d'une traduction anglaise faite par des fans. C'est cette version que vous tenez entre les mains.

Nesta segunda parte da série de RPG de "mitologia grega", o herói principal não é o lendário herói Herakles (Hercules), mas um jovem de uma cidade de Nana, onde vive com sua avó. A rainha diz-lhe que as pessoas estão sendo torturadas por Titãs - uma raça antiga semelhante a deuses controlada pelo Senhor das trevas. Você deve ajudar a libertar as pessoas da ira dos Titãs. Sua primeira tarefa é ir a Atenas e encontrar o famoso poeta Homero que pode falar sobre o caminho para derrotar os titãs. Durante a sua jornada, você conhece muitos personagens da mitologia grega, incluindo Dédalo, Cérbero e Hefesto, e recruta criaturas interessantes para lutar ao seu lado, como o Centauro, um ser metade homem metade cavalo, ou a Mulher Sem Alma. Você também encontrará pessoas reais da história grega, como Homero, o poeta ou Hipócrates, o médico.
A jogabilidade é semelhante ao estilo Dragon Warrior: você viaja no mapa do mundo, visitando cidades e masmorras, conversando com pessoas e lutando contra inimigos e chefes em combates vistos sob a perspectiva de primeira pessoa. Uma inovação interessante é um ciclo de dia / noite completo. Os locais parecem diferentes à noite, e às vezes é necessário visitá-los em horários diferentes.

locale.title: Heracles no Eikou II : Titan no Metsubou
Hero Quest
locale.synopsis: HeroQuest, the best-selling role playing game has now been developed into an absorbing fantasy adventure game for your Nintendo Entertainment System. Take up the challenge to become a Hero and enter the underground realm of the evil wizard Morcar. But beware, the unlit tunnels hold many dangers - terrible monsters, deadly traps and mysterious rooms. Prototype leaked in 2009.

HeroQuest, el juego de rol más vendido se ha convertido en un juego de aventura de fantasía absorbente por su sistema de entretenimiento de Nintendo. Tome el reto de convertirse en un héroe y entrar en el reino subterráneo del malvado mago Morcar. Pero ten cuidado, los túneles no iluminados tienen muchos peligros - monstruos terribles, trampas mortales y salas misteriosas. El prototipo se filtró en 2009.
L'adaptation machine d'un jeu de rôle plateau. En 3d isométrique, reprenant assez bien l'esprit du jeu plateau mais aux graphismes assez laids.

game.name: Hi No Tori - Gaou No Bouken

locale.title: Hi No Tori - Gaou No Bouken
locale.synopsis: Based on the Osamu Tezuka manga "Phoenix", this platformer is mostly based on the fifth volume, "HÅ-Å" (later called "Karma" when it reached North America in May 2004). Here you play as the bandit Gaou, who lost an arm and eye as a baby and as such was

Hi No Tori est un jeu de plates-formes sur Nes. Votre but est d'évoluer à travers tous les niveaux de gauche à droite. Vous pouvez tirer sur vos ennemis, qui se transforment alors en cubes, que vous pourrez ramasser et placer à tout moment devant vous pour grimper dessus, faire des escaliers, passer au-dessus d'ennemis, vous rattraper en chute libre, etc.

locale.title: Hinotori : Houou Hen, Gaou no Bouken
High Speed
locale.synopsis: High Speed is a conversion of the Williams Electronics pinball game of the same name. The game recreates the pinball table and gameplay from the arcade version and also adds some video game features, such as lightning bombs, attacking enemies, magnetic helicopters, and rust balls which dissolve your flipper. The bottom part of the screen remains on the bottom set of flippers, while the top half scrolls over the whole pinball table to follow the action. Gameplay is for one to four players alternating.

High Speed es una conversión del juego de pinball de Williams del mismo nombre. El juego recrea la mesa de pinball y el juego de la versión arcade y también añade algunas características, tales como bombas de rayos, ataques enemigos, helicópteros, y las bolas magnéticas de óxido que se disuelven tu flipper. El juego es de uno a cuatro jugadores que se alternan.

High Speed est un jeu de flipper sur Nes reprenant la vraie table du même nom créée par Williams Electronics. La table et les commandes sont conservées, mais le jeu rajoute quelques éléments tels qu'une bombe à éclairs, un hélicoptère magnétique, des morceaux de rouille, et toute une variété d'autres ennemis.

locale.title: Hirake! Ponkikki
locale.synopsis: Hirake Ponkikki features a variety of annoying games, which if thought out well could have turned out fun like Mario Party. Developed by Minato Giken and published by Takara, which was released in Japan in 1992.

Hirake Ponkikki propose une variété de jeux agaçants qui, s'ils étaient bien pensés, auraient pu être amusants comme Mario Party. Développé par Minato Giken et publié par Takara, qui a été publié au Japon en 1992.

game.name: Hiryu No Ken 3 - 5 Nin No Ryuu Senshi

locale.title: Hiryu No Ken 3 - 5 Nin No Ryuu Senshi
locale.synopsis: This game in the series focuses on five warriors who set out on their quest to defeat an evil force. The fighting system in the Hiryu no Ken games is unique since it involves hitting/defending targets on your enemy or yourself, and that is the only way to carry out many of the battles.

locale.title: Hiryuu no Ken III : 5 Nin no Dragon

game.name: Hiryuu No Ken 2 - Dragon No Tsubasa

locale.title: Hiryuu No Ken 2 - Dragon No Tsubasa
locale.synopsis: The Tusk Soldiers again threaten peace and stability, and the world needs the power of the Flying Dragon scroll and Ryuhi to defeat them.

locale.title: Hiryuu no Ken II : Dragon no Tsubasa

game.name: Hiryuu No Ken Special - Fighting Wars

locale.title: Hiryuu No Ken Special - Fighting Wars
locale.synopsis: Hiryu no Ken Special: Fighting Wars is a mixed fighting game for the Famicom. It focuses on tournament-style fighting, with characters from a wide variety of technical fighting backgrounds. This gives you the option of going with a fighting style that you prefer or find interesting. Japanese wrestling superstar Jushin Thunder Liger appears as a guest character.

locale.title: Hiryuu no Ken Special : Fighting Wars
Hissatsu Doujou Yaburi
locale.synopsis:
Hissatsu Doujou Yaburi is an RPG - beat-'em-up hybrid that casts you as a novice martial artist that sets out to roam the ancient Chinese countryside in order to hone his skills and earn fame and fortune.
Starting from your village, you must explore your surroundings by walking and jumping across the land in simple side-scrolling fashion, that is until you run across an enemy (fellow martial artists, bandits, ghouls, etc.) and enter combat mode, which allows you to unleash attacks based on your skill level to try and defeat your opponent (always using the 2D side-scrolling engine).
Victory will earn you money and other bonuses which can be used back in town to upgrade your skills and regain health. You can also enter special tournaments found as special buildings across the land in which you must defeat a series of opponents in succession before facing off against the reigning champion. Victory here will reward you with even more money and will mean more people will recognize you in your travels.

locale.title: Hissatsu Shigoto Nin
locale.synopsis: Hissatsu Shigotonin roughly translates to Deadly Work People. I found this name to be pretty strange, but once I started understanding what this game was all about, it made sense. It was released December 15, 1990 exclusively in Japan for the Famicom. It turns out Hissatsu Shigotonin is actually biased off of the popular Japanese historical drama TV series of the same name. The story of both focus on a group of ordinary "work people" who live double lives as assassins. It is an alternate Feudal Japan history (1603-1863) featuring fictional characters with elements of a parallel world. You must uncover a mystery though out the game, which comes though the story in episodes like the TV show. The player controls Nakamura Mondo, a fictional character who is also the star of the TV show. The game is biased on the original 84 episode run/first season of the TV series from 1979-1981 but features characters all the way up to the gameâs release date. The show continues to this day with Assassins as a subtitle. This seems like a really cool concept for a weekly episodic series. The story has an almost assassins creed feel. Iâm sure the idea of everyday people turned into warriors has been around in stories forever, but the setting and time period makes it stand out. Japanâs feudal era is one of the most intense of all the time periods in earthâs history. It was a time of Samurai, Ninja and technology that eventually killed off said Samurai and Ninja. One of the biggest draws of the era is the is the fantastic culture that knew of the outside world, but worked hard in maintaining isolation making them truly unique. The main character, Nakamura Mondo, is a corrupt cop known for accepting bribes who is disrespected by his superiors, and mother-in-law. He ends up bringing together a group of people that have all been wronged in some way, formed to solve mysteries and assassinate targets. The heroes play by the same rules as the villains, as they are not afraid to use underhanded tactics to get the job done. Each episode of the show usually climaxes with the killing of the target, sometimes in an almost humorous manner such as a flower through the skull. I was able to find a random episode but no dubs or subs, which is a bummer since I wanted to learn more of the story. It seems to hold up well to time, has a campy feel to it and comes off like a live action anime. Check out this trailer for one of their many movies to get a better idea of the style, think Al Bundy the Samuri and his gang of misfits.

locale.title: Hit Marmot
locale.synopsis: Hit Marmot is another concoction by Mega Soft, which makes use of the Zapper peripheral. The game is basically a Whack-A-Mole clone, where you choose the game mode and shoot "rats" that pop out of holes on the game board. It is just like any typical shooter game that utilizes the NES Zapper; if you have played Duck Hunt, you already know what to expect here. This game is a bit more fast-paced though, which certainly adds to the difficulty level in later levels. It may be worth checking out if you are a fan of light gun games.

game.name: Hit The Ice - Vhl - The Video Hockey League

locale.title: Hit the Ice : VHL, The Video Hockey League
locale.synopsis: This radical hockey game pits you and your team against some of the toughest skaters ever to burn a hole in the ice! Victory goes to the team that kicks, punches, and high-sticks its opponent into slush. Standard hockey rules apply, plus a few surprises to stir things up. So lace on your skates and fasten your face mask - hockey is about to break loose!

Este juego de hockey radical te enfrenta a ti y a tú equipo contra algunos de los patinadores mas duros que hayan pasado sobre el hielo! La victoria va para el equipo que patea, pega y golpea alto contra el hielo a su oponente. Las reglas normales del hockey son aplicadas, con unas pequeñas sorpresas para dar emoción al juego. Así que ponte los patines y la máscara - El hockey esta a punto de desatarse!

Ce jeu de hockey radical vous oppose vous et votre équipe contre certains des patineurs les plus coriaces qui aient jamais fait un trou dans la glace! La victoire va à l'équipe qui botte, frappe, et envoie son adversaire dans la neige fondue. Les règles de hockey standard s'appliquent, plus quelques surprises pour remuer les choses. Alors enfilez vos patins et attachez votre masque - le hockey est sur le point de se déchaîner!

locale.title: Hogan's Alley
locale.synopsis: This game involves the use of the Nintendo Light Zapper, and has, truly, no plot. You are in the police station doing target practice, either with three targets at a time with at least one innocent person, or in an alley with both good and bad targets in windows and walking on the sidewalk. Then there's Trick Shot, where you shoot the cans, trying to make them land in a slot for points, or at least not let them fall to the ground.

Este juego implica el uso de la pistola Nintendo Zapper de luz. Estás en la estación de policía haciendo prácticas de tiro, ya sea con tres objetivos a la vez con al menos una persona inocente, o en un callejón con objetivos buenos y malos en las ventanas y caminando en la acera. Luego está el Trick Shot, en el que disparas a las latas, tratando de conseguir la mayor cantidad de puntos.

Hogan's Alley est un jeu de tir sorti en 1984 sur NES et nécessitant le NES Zapper. Le titre du jeu est issu du surnom d'un terrain d'entraînement de la ?NRA (National Rifle Association). Le jeu se joue seul et le joueur incarne un policier s'entraînant dans un stand de tir. Il tire sur des cibles en carton et il doit neutraliser les cibles hostiles tout en prenant garde aux civiles. Il y a trois modes de jeu : Le premier présente trois panneaux qui se retournent rapidement dans lesquels se trouvent un ou deux bandits et des gentils. Le second se déroule dans une ville où sont mélangés bandits et méchants, après avoir nettoyé l'écran des vilains, le joueur passe à une autre région. Le troisième est un jeu de jonglage avec des cannettes vides.

game.name: Hokkaidou Rensa Satsujin - Ohotsuku Ni Kiyu

locale.title: Hokkaidou Rensa Satsujin - Ohotsuku Ni Kiyu
locale.synopsis: This time, your initial investigation of a dead body found floating in Tokyo B

locale.title: Hokkaidou Rensa Satsujin : Okhotsk ni Kiyu
Hokuto No Ken
locale.synopsis: This is a side-scrolling Beat-'Em-Up based on the animé series of the same name. You control Kenshirou, the series' main character, trying to rescue your girlfriend Julia. Advancing from right to left, you'll notice various doors you can enter. At some of those doors you'll see Julia's image that will point out the correct way for you. Other than entering doors, you'll be busy punching and kicking punk-like enemies that attack you closely or with projectiles. The game features gory animation for the deaths of your foes: their heads get torn away from the bodies and explode.

" Ken !! Ken !! Survivant de l'enfer !! Ken !! Ken !! Dans le chaos des esprits !!! " Voilà ! Les jeux sont rares, mais voilà une adaptation du fameux " Ken le survivant " en jeux-vidéos, le jeu est assez bien adapté pour une NES car quand donne un coup, on peut entendre un tit bip qui fait " yah " qui nous rappel les fameux cris du héors de la série. Le ptit côté pas mal aussi, est que quand on tue un méchant,comme dans le manga, son coprs explose!! Bien sur je prefere largement ma version Playstation mais celui la est quand même à télécharger!

game.name: Hokuto No Ken 3 - Shinseiki Souzou Seiken Retsuden

locale.title: Hokuto no Ken 3: Shinseiki Souzou Seiken Retsuden
locale.synopsis:
This RPG is based on the animé series Hokuto no Ken, a.k.a. Fist of the North Star. In 1999, a demonic attack caused devastated the human population. In order to re-build the ruined world and to survive in a struggle against demon lords and their minions, mankind needs the power of the Northern Star. You take control of Kenshirou, the hero of the series, and his friends, in a quest to save the humanity and to defeat the evil.
Roaming the wasteland, visiting towns and dangerous dungeons, Kenshirou and his friends will encounter various enemies whom they will have to defeat in turn-based battles. The battle screen shows both parties as animé-style pictures. In boss battles Kenshirou will have to defeat his foes one-on-one.

locale.title: Hokuto no Ken 3 : Shin Seiki Souzou Seiken Restuden

game.name: Hokuto No Ken 4 - Shichisei Haken Den - Hokuto Shinken No Kanata E

locale.title: Hokuto No Ken 4 - Shichisei Haken Den - Hokuto Shinken No Kanata E
locale.synopsis:
This is a RPG set in the universe of the animé series Hokuto no Ken, known outside of Japan as Fist of the North Star. You, the nameless young hero, return to your home village after a prolonged absence, only to find out that a mysterious evil has been plaguing it, and everybody need his help. He decides to investigate the matter and starts a dangerous journey, during which he teams up with some of the characters from the animé series.
The gameplay is pretty similar to Dragon Quest: you interact with things and people by choosing commands from a menu, wander around the world map and fight random enemies from first-person perspective. The enemies and your team members are shown as animé-style pictures during battles.

locale.title: Hokuto no Ken 4 : Shichisei Haken Den, Hokuto Shinken no Kanata e
Hollywood Squares
locale.synopsis: This is a GameTek conversion of the '80s version of the game show Hollywood Squares. Two contestants play a version of tic-tac-toe, with "celebrities" filling in for the squares. The selected celeb is asked a question, answers it, and the contestant must agree or disagree with their answer. A correct guess captures that square. After three games, the winning contestant picks a key and a car out of two separate pools, hoping to match the two up and win the car.

Se trata de una conversión de GameTek del concurso de los años 80 Hollywood Squares. Dos concursantes juegan una versión de tres en raya, con "celebridades" cumplimentando las plazas. A la celebridad seleccionada se le hace una pregunta, responde ella, y el concursante debe estar de acuerdo o en desacuerdo con su respuesta. Un acierto capta esa casilla. Después de tres partidas, el concursante ganador recoge una llave y un coche de dos piscinas separadas, con la esperanza de igualar los dos y ganar el coche.

L'académie des neuf ça vous dis quelque chose ? Bein voila !!! Maintenant vous ne pourrez plus dire que vous ne connaissez pas :-) Et pour les plus agés une petite cure de jouvence ca ne fais pas de mal ! A condition bien-sûr de possèder quelques notions d'anglais.

locale.title: Holy Diver
locale.synopsis:
Randy, the Holy Diver, is setting out to retrieve the five emblem seals belonging to the King Crimson Family in order to expel the greatest evil, the Black Slayer, back into another dimension.
Holy Diver is an action game much in the vein of Castlevania. The player controls the Diver as he uses magic powers such as shooting energy balls and freezing time to traverse the game's eight levels. Enemies throughout the levels respawn and there are destroyable objects in your path. At the end of each level a tougher boss character must be beaten. Once defeated a power-up spell becomes available to the player. To use these spells the player must pause the game and select it from the inventory menu. The player has the ability to shoot horizontally as well as up. Difficult paths may sometimes be crossed by the combination of the right spell at the right time such as the freezing spell that freezes quicksand.
Though scheduled for release in North America, the game never went beyond its release in Japan.

Le jeu porte le même nom que le premier album de Dio et le personnage principal est une représentation du chanteur et leader de ce groupe Ronnie James Dio. Le jeu reprend des thèmes assez présent dans la musique de Dio, ainsi qu'une imagerie similaire au clip de Holy Diver. Aussi, à la fin du jeu, on peut voir qu'il y a d'autres références musicales, telles que King Crimson, Slayer, Emperor ou encore Zakk W. et Randy R. (Zakk Wylde et Randy Rhoads, ont été guitaristes pour Ozzy Osbourne.)
Bien qu'Holy Diver a été développé par Irem, il ressemble beaucoup à un jeu Konami. Il est assez similaire à Castlevania et un des niveaux reprend des textures ressemblant à celles de Contra.

locale.title: Home Alone
locale.synopsis:
Based on the film of the same name, Kevin McAllister has been left home alone for Christmas while his family is on vacation. This would not be so bad except for two burglars, Harry and Marv, aka the Wet Bandits, have decided to burglarize his house. However, Kevin is too smart to play victim and will use the items he has available to make traps for the burglars.
Home Alone is a side scroller. Controlling Kevin, the player must wander around Kevin's house picking up icons representing different kinds of traps. He then drops these icons onto the ground, in the path of one of the burglars, stunning them and earning a score. Once stunned, Kevin can walk past them and continue collecting trap icons.

Basado en la película del mismo nombre, Kevin McAllister se ha quedado solo en casa en Navidad mientras su familia está de vacaciones. Esto no sería tan malo excepto por dos ladrones, Harry y Marv, alias los Bandidos Mojados, que han decidido robar su casa. Sin embargo, Kevin es demasiado inteligente y utilizará los artículos que tiene disponibles para hacer trampas para los ladrones.
Home Alone es un scroller lateral. Controlando a Kevin, el jugador debe pasear por la casa de Kevin recogiendo iconos que representan diferentes tipos de trampas. A continuación, dejar caer estos iconos en el suelo, en el camino de uno de los ladrones, sorprendiéndolos y para obtener una puntuación. Una vez atónitos, Kevin puede caminar más allá de ellos y seguir recolectando iconos de trampas.

Home Alone sur NES, adapté du film "Maman J'ai Râté l'Avion !", vous met dans la peau de Kevin McCallister, dont les parents sont partis en vacances en l'oubliant. Kevin se retrouve donc seul chez lui. Vous devez tendre des pièges dans et autour de la maison afin d'éviter que des cambrioleurs ne s'y introduisent.

game.name: Home Alone 2 - Lost In New York

locale.title: Home Alone 2 : Lost in New York
locale.synopsis:
Loosely based on the film of the same name, Kevin McAllister has arrived in New York City without his parents. However he checks himself into a hotel and begins to have fun. It isn't long before the hotel discovers he's using stolen credit cards and begin to chase him around! On top of that, Harry and Marv the burglars he once defeated, are in town and looking for revenge.
Home Alone 2 is a side scroller. Controlling Kevin McAllister, the player will need to jump over enemies and obstacles while collecting items. These items include health bonuses and a variety of weapons. Losing all of Kevin's health or being "caught" will cost a life. The player starts with three lives for play.

Basado libremente en la película del mismo nombre, Kevin McAllister ha llegado a la ciudad de Nueva York sin sus padres. Sin embargo se registra en un hotel y comienza a tener diversión. No pasa mucho tiempo antes de que los hoteles descubran que está usando tarjetas de crédito robadas y comienzan a perseguirlo! Por encima de todo, Harry y Marv los ladrones que una vez derrotados, están en la ciudad y en busca de venganza. Home Alone 2 es un juego de acción de desplazamiento lateral. Controlas a Kevin McAllister, el jugador tendrá que saltar sobre los enemigos y obstáculos mientras que recoge artículos. Estos artículos incluyen bonos de salud y una variedad de armas. Perder toda la salud de Kevin o ser "atrapado" va a costar una vida. El jugador comienza con tres vidas para el juego.

Home Alone 2 : Lost in New York sur NES est un jeu de plates-formes issu du film "Maman, J'ai Encore Râté l'Avion !". Aux commandes du petit mais néanmoins futé Kevin McAllister, votre objectif est d'échapper aux majordomes de l'hôtel dans lequel le garçon s'amuse illégalement. Les deux compères et malandrins Harry et Marv sont également de la partie pour se venger de l'enfant. Le jeu se déroule en défilement horizontal et vous devrez sauter au-dessus des obstacles pour progresser dans l'hôtel.

game.name: Home Run Nighter '90 - The Pennant League

locale.title: Home Run Nighter '90 - The Pennant League
The Pennant League : Home Run Nighter '90

game.name: Hon Shogi - Naitou Kudan Shogi Hiden

locale.title: Hon Shogi - Naitou Kudan Shogi Hiden
locale.synopsis: This game lets players play the Japanese board game Shogi. Shogi is a game that is played in a similar way as chess. Players take turns moving their pieces in a strategic manner with the main goal of capturing their opponents pieces.

Ce jeu permet aux joueurs de jouer au jeu de plateau japonais Shogi. Shogi est un jeu qui se joue de la même manière que les échecs. À tour de rôle, les joueurs déplacent leurs pièces de manière stratégique dans le but principal de capturer les pièces de leurs adversaires.

locale.title: Honey Peach
locale.synopsis: Honey Peach (also known as Mei Nu Quan) is a very simple rock-paper-scissors game in which the player competes against several increasingly skillful female opponents. The screen displays two hands, each representing a competitor, rapidly closing and openi

Honey Peach (también conocido como Mei Nu Quan) es un juego simple de piedra, papel o tijeras, en el que el jugador compite contra varias oponentes femeninas en las que la dificultad va aumentando gradualmente. En la pantalla se muestran dos manos, en la que cada una representar a un competidor.
Honey Peach est un jeu de papier-ciseaux-caillou érotique. Il fallait l'inventer.

locale.title: Honoo No Toukyuuji - Dodge Danpei
locale.synopsis: Honoo no Doukyuuji: Dodge Danpei is a Sports game, developed and published by SunSoft, which was released in Japan in 1992. It' a game about the Dodgeball, but in this game you have differents power and card for play, it's a funny game.

Honoo no Doukyuuji: Dodge Danpei est un jeu de sport, développé et édité par SunSoft, qui a été publié au Japon en 1992. C'est un jeu sur le Dodgeball (ballon prisonnier), mais dans ce jeu vous avez différents pouvoirs et cartes pour le jeu, c'est un jeu amusant .

locale.title: Honoo no Toukyuuji - Dodge Danpei 2
locale.synopsis: Dodge Danpei 2 is a Nintendo NES console sport game. Second part of the series, the developers have added some improvement over its predecessor. The first game only playable with a card system is maintained, but we see appear a game mode against a friend or the actual dodge ball computer (ball to the prisoner).

Dodge Danpei 2 est un jeu de sport sur console Nintendo NES. Deuxième volet de la série, les développeurs on rajouté quelque amélioration par rapport à son prédécesseur. Le premier opus uniquement jouable avec un système de carte est maintenu, mais on voit apparaître un mode de jeu contre un ami ou l'ordinateur de dodge ball réelle (ballon au prisonnier).

locale.title: Hook
locale.synopsis:
In this video game adaption of the Steven Spielberg film Hook, the player takes the role of a grown-up Peter Pan, whose kids have been kidnapped by Captain Hook. Tinker Bell takes Peter back to Neverland where he must again become Pan and reclaim his children.
This particular interpretation is a side-scrolling action game, in which players must hack their way past Hook's denizens through 11 levels. These include forests, icy regions, and towns which Peter will have to jump, climb, and swim through. Magic items such as apples and pixie dust can be collected for special powers. When enemies are attacked, they simply put their hands up in surrender rather than dying, so as to make the game more child-friendly.

En Hook, basado en la película de 1991 de Steven Spielberg, el jugador controla a Peter Pan que intenta rescatar a sus hijos del Capitán James Hook. Esta versión difiere de otras versiones del juego. Mientras que también es un juego de plataformas, el título también incluye niveles de vuelo, así como escenas de lucha uno a uno.

Hook sur NES est un jeu de plates-formes inspiré du film Hook : La Revanche du Capitaine Crochet. Le joueur incarne Peter Banning (Peter Pan adulte) et doit sauver ses enfants, kidnappés par le Capitaine Crochet. 11 niveaux durant, traversez villages, plaines et forêts et usez de vos pouvoirs spéciaux afin de rendre aux enfants leur liberté.

locale.title: Hoops
locale.synopsis: Gym rats, beware! HOOPS takes you out to the asphault, where basketball is a half-court game of fast hands, faster moves and slam-jam-thank-you-Sam dunks! The legends of the Playground are all here: Mr. Doc, Jammer, Legs, Bomber, Wiz, eight players in all. You can pit them one-on-one or two-on-two. You pick the court - Eastern or Western - and you pick the rules, too. You can play against the computer or one other player. Or you can even team up with another player against the computer. You can block shots, make steals, pass off or go strong to the hoop - in fact, you control just about everything in this ultra-realistic rendition of the playground game. Except, of course, the final score. But win or lose, you know you've been in a game after you've played a game of HOOPS!

Hoops es un juego de baloncesto de acción para uno o dos jugadores. El juego es de medio campo y puede ser de uno contra uno o dos contra dos. Puedes bloquear tiros, pasar, robar, o hacer mates. Hay dos campos diferentes para elegir, y una variedad de jugadores diferentes para seleccionar.
Hoops sur Nes est un jeu de basket qui se déroule sur une moitié de court, et qui vous propose d'effectuer des parties en 1 contre 1 ou en 2 contre 2.

locale.title: Moero!! Junior Basket : Two on Two
Hoppin' Mad
locale.synopsis: Hoppin' Mad is an Action game, developed and published by Elite, which was cancelled before it was released.

locale.title: Hoshi Wo Miru Hito
locale.synopsis:
In the far future, the apocalypse has come and gone. Now people leave peacefully in rural cities making the best of the advanced technology that survives and trying to win back the world day by day. Ark City, the crown jewel of technological advances, has managed to put back into operation a super computer capable of taking control of every aspect of civilization, right down to weather and mind control. This does not bode well for the people of the world, so you as an ESP-gifted warrior take it upon yourself to journey to Ark City and get rid of this threat.
Hoshi wo Miru Hito is a classic NES-era RPG, in which you navigate your party (composed of you and 3 other ESP-wielding heroes you can find) in a top-down world map, chat with NPCs in towns, buy weapons and armor, and finally journey into dungeons to gain clues that help you in your journey.
Combat whisks you away from the top-down perspective to a battle view in which you see your opponents and heroes in a first-person perspective, and assign actions in turns, with the ESP powers taking the place of magic spells.

locale.title: Hot Dance 2000
locale.synopsis: The concept of the main game is based on the popular Dance Dance Revolution video game. The music portrayed in the video game is considered to be top 40 music from the year 2000. The object is to use the arrow keys in sync with the pop music in order to score points. Missing too many steps means game over. There are two different forms of "dancing" in this game: single and mix. Single dancing consists of dancing to a single song while mix dancing refers to dancing to multiple songs. Non-dancers can relax with Pac-Man and pinball. Both of these are primitive forms of video games that do not require the massive level of button mashing required in a single game of Hot Dance 2000.

locale.title: Hot Slot
locale.synopsis: This is a simple slot machine simulation. What makes it different are the erotic pictures of naked or half-naked girls, which you get if you successfully complete a casino round and win a lot of money. There are three casinos you can play in, each one leading to different girls and different short scenes and comments from them.

Esta es una simple simulación de máquina tragaperras. Lo que lo hace diferente son las fotos eróticas de chicas desnudas o semi-desnudas, que se obtienen si se completa con éxito una ronda de casino y ganas mucho dinero. Hay tres casinos en los que puedes jugar, cada uno conduce a diferentes chicas y diferentes escenas cortas y comentarios de ellas.

Hot Slots est un jeu de casino sur Nintendo NES exclusivement réservé aux adultes. Car cette simulation de machine à sous inclut quelques images à caractère érotique. En effet lorsque vous empochez le gros lot, des images érotiques de jeune fille vantant vos talents vous sont délivrés. Le jeu vous laisse le choix entre trois casinos, vous misez ensuite d'une à trois pièces, lancez la roue et décidez d'arrêter le mécanisme quand vous le souhaitez. Bonne chance !

locale.title: Hottaman No Chitei Tanken
locale.synopsis: Players get to dig up dirt beneath the surface, find keys behind four doors, and then find the door to the next level. The most obvious game to compare it to is Dig Dug, but without the boulders and with various devices like teleporting doors, speed, dynamite, and a wet suit. There are 15 levels in the entire game; which repeat themselves after the 15th level is finished. Lava can spew out at a vertical direction towards the player and kill him; it does not reset itself even after the players loses a life (but it does reset itself after a game over) Passwords are activated by pressing a certain button combination on the password screen. Several passwords results in cheat codes that does certain things; such as deactivating the lava in all levels of the game. Certain type of blocks are worth different points once they are dug up; ranging from common dirt to destructible blocks. The game features an instant death clause where players die in a single hit. Killed enemies reappear at the same location where they were killed the first time.

Les joueurs peuvent déterrer la terre sous la surface, trouver les clés derrière les quatre portes, puis trouver la porte au niveau suivant. Le jeu le plus évident à comparer est Dig Dug, mais sans les rochers et avec divers dispositifs comme les portes de téléportation, la vitesse, la dynamite, et un costume humide. Il y a 15 niveaux dans le jeu entier; qui se répètent après la fin du 15ème niveau. La lave peut cracher dans une direction verticale vers le joueur et le tuer; il ne se réinitialise pas même après que les joueurs perdent une vie (mais il se réinitialise après une partie). Les mots de passe sont activés en appuyant sur une combinaison de boutons donnée sur l'écran du mot de passe. Plusieurs mots de passe donnent des codes de triche qui font certaines choses; comme désactiver la lave à tous les niveaux du jeu. Certains types de blocs valent des points différents une fois qu'ils sont déterrés; allant de la saleté commune aux blocs destructibles. Le jeu comporte une clause de mort instantanée où les joueurs meurent dans un coup simple. Les ennemis tués réapparaissent au même endroit où ils ont été tués la première fois.

locale.title: Huang Di - Zhuolu zhi Zhan
locale.synopsis: Huang Di is an action platformer where you can choose from two different characters to play as. These characters play exactly the same, so the difference between them is merely cosmetic. There is a 2 player option as well, but no cooperative mode.

locale.title: Hudson Hawk
locale.synopsis: Hudson Hawk, a cat burglar, has a mission: steal three of Da Vinci's works of art, which include a rocking horse known as "The Sforza", his sketchbook that he called "The Codex", and a precious crystal. The mission will take him through a mansion, castles, rooftops, subways, and the Vatican. Of course, getting all these items will not be as easy as it sounds. Not only does Hawk face security guards, guard dogs, and others, but he must also avoid setting off alarms. To help him, Hawk can either punch enemies, or throw a ball at them.

Hudson Hawk, el "as" de los ladrones, está fuera de prisión y quiere seguir estándolo.
Sin embargo, un selecto grupo de criminales requieren sus servicios y harán cualquier cosa para conseguirlos. Para su desgracia, Hudson Hawk descubre que su mejor amigo ha sido secuestrado. A menos de que robe tres valiosos artefactos de Leonardo da Vinci, su amigo será hombre muerto.
Mientras tanto, Hudson Hawk descubre un terrible plan. Es el plan conocido como Proyecto Alquimia: los criminales esperan emplear estos artefactos de Leonardo para construir una máquina productora de oro.
Quieren utilizar la máquina para controlar el sistema económico del mundo. Como Hudson Hawk, tu objetivo es robar los aparatos para chantajear a los criminales y conseguir que te devuelvan a tu amigo, además de impedir que esa diabólica máquina de hacer oro vea la luz del sol.

Hudson Hawk est un jeu d'action sur NES basé sur le film du même nom. Vous incarnez un voleur malicieux nommé Hudson Hawk. Vous avez pour mission de voler trois oeuvres d'art de Da Vinci. Mais attention ce ne sera pas si facile que cela, des gardes de sécurité et des chiens vous barrent la route !

locale.title: Huge Insect
locale.synopsis: Huge Insect is a Galaga-style game with a wildlife theme, produced in 1993 but released in 2002.

locale.title: Hyakki Yagyou
locale.synopsis: Hyakki Yagyou is named after the Night Parade of the 100 Demons of Japanese folklore, when various youkai and other Japanese demons come out of hiding for a single night to scare people. The game is otherwise a fairly traditional 8-bit RPG, though it does feature uncommon aspects such as being able to see enemies while walking around (as opposed to the then-usual random encounters) and a regularly-proportioned adult protagonist. There is also no overworld map - both the towns and monster-infested wilderness are directly connected.

game.name: Hyaku No Sekai No Monogatari - The Tales On A Watery Wilderness

locale.title: Hyaku no Sekai no Monogatari : The Tales on a Watery Wilderness
locale.synopsis: This Famicom title by ASK combines the mechanics of a tabletop board game with the battle style and character progression of a role-playing game to create an interesting hybrid. One to two players can embark on a great adventure to explore the realm of Yukiria and complete quests for its inhabitants, with multiple endings possible!

Ce titre de Famicom par ASK combine la mécanique d'un jeu de plateau sur table avec le style de combat et la progression de personnage d'un jeu de rôle pour créer un hybride intéressant. Un à deux joueurs peuvent se lancer dans une grande aventure pour explorer le royaume de Yukiria et accomplir des quêtes pour ses habitants, avec de multiples fins possibles!

locale.title: Hyaku no Sekai no Monogatari : The Tales on a Watery Wilderness
Hydlide
locale.synopsis:
An evil demon named Varalys casts a curse upon the princess Ann, turning her into three fairies. You control Sir Jim and set out to find the fairies, and then slay Varalys. Only by vanquishing Varalys can the curse be lifted. Once the princess is restored the kingdom will be saved.
The fighting is a little more in-depth than hack and slash. You can either fight with a defensive or offensive stance, or you can use magic spells.

Un demonio malvado llamado Varalys ha echado una maldición sobre la princesa Ann, convirtiéndola en tres hadas. Controlas a Sir Jim y decides ir a buscar a las hadas, y luego matar a Varalys. Sólo al derrotar Varalys se puede levantar la maldición. Una vez que la princesa sea restaurada, el reino será salvo.
La lucha es un poco más en profundidad que hack & slash. Puedes luchar con una postura defensiva u ofensiva, o puedes usar hechizos mágicos.

Hydlide est un jeu de rôle sur Nes. Partez à l'aventure pour sauver le monde de Hydlide, en proie à une invasion de démons. Utilisez vos armes ou la magie pour venir à bout des monstres et pensez à dormir et à manger de temps en temps pour faire remonter votre énergie. Le jeu permet un système de sauvegarde et de chargement rapide, à condition de ne pas éteindre la console ! Cependant, des mots de passe permettent de reprendre l'aventure où elle s'est arrêtée.

locale.title: Hydlide 3 - Yami Kara No Houmonsha
locale.synopsis:
After the evil dragon lord Varalys tried to enchant the princess Ann, he was thought to be defeated by a brave warrior. But evil can never be defeated once and for all - once again, a curse has fallen upon the land, and you, a nameless young boy, is the only one who can save it. Equipped with your magical sword, you must roam the land of Hydlide and defeat the evil once again.
This is the second NES game of Hydlide series ("Hydlide 2" was only available for the MSX platform). You can choose one of the four character classes to start the game with, and also upgrade your class during the game. The combat is action-based: you can either attack your enemies by ramming them with your weapons, or cast magical spells. In towns there are equipment and items to buy.

Après que le seigneur dragon maléfique Varalys a essayé d'enchanter la princesse Ann, il a été pensé pour être vaincu par un guerrier courageux. Mais le mal ne peut jamais être vaincu une fois pour toutes - une fois de plus, une malédiction est tombée sur la terre, et vous, un jeune garçon sans nom, êtes le seul qui peut le sauver. Équipé de votre épée magique, vous devez parcourir le pays d'Hydlide et vaincre le mal une fois de plus.
C'est le deuxième jeu NES de la série Hydlide ("Hydlide 2" n'était disponible que pour la plate-forme MSX). Vous pouvez choisir l'une des quatre classes de personnages pour commencer le jeu, et aussi améliorer votre classe pendant le jeu. Le combat est basé sur l'action: vous pouvez soit attaquer vos ennemis en les écrasant avec vos armes, soit lancer des sorts magiques. Dans les villes, il y a du matériel et des articles à acheter.

locale.title: Hyper Sports
locale.synopsis: Six tough events await in this joystick-waggling action game. The full sequence of events is - swimming, skeet shooting, gymnastics, archery, triple jumping and weightlifting. You must complete each event in order to be allowed onto the next one.Swimming

locale.title: I Love Softball
locale.synopsis:
Games end after seven innings unless the two teams have an identical score (tie game). The object is to win the championship using female softball players. Players must choose between the six major high schools from all of the regions of Japan. The artificial intelligence of the game is strong, causing even strong human-controlled teams to frequently lose to the computer. It is possible to throw an underhanded pitch in this game up to 120 kilometres per hour (75 mph).
After winning the Japanese high school championship, the player must take on the American women's softball team before becoming a professional softball player.The game looks similar to a video game that belongs to the Family Stadium baseball video game franchise. Players play their high school games at Hanshin KÅshien Stadium.
If the player loses one game, play starts over unless the player uses a password to return to the previous round. The game's password feature allows games to be replayed and maintains total memory of which teams have already been defeated. However, the passwords and long and very difficult to remember.
Pachio-kun, an anime-like pachinko ball that is famous for starring in the game American Dream (which was made by the same company as I Love Softball), announces the team that will be batting for three outs.

locale.title: Ice Climber
locale.synopsis: In Ice Climber one or two players need to climb their way to the top of 32 different mountains. Each mountain is broken up into eight levels of platforms along with a bonus stage at the top. Attempting to stop you from making upward progress are different creatures ranging from polar bears to condors as well as treacherous landscapes with falling icicles, moving platforms, and icy floors. To help out, your only weapon is a mallet which can be used to knock out enemies as well as bust away bricks in the platforms to give you some room to jump up to the next level. When you finally reach the top, it's time to move on to the next, more difficult level.

En Ice Climber uno o dos jugadores tienen que subir a la cima de 32 montañas diferentes. Cada montaña se divide en ocho niveles de plataformas, junto con un escenario de bonificación en la parte superior. Intentando detener al jugador hay diferentes criaturas que van desde osos polares a cóndores, así como paisajes traicioneros con caída de carámbanos, plataformas móviles, y suelos helados. Para ayudar, los jugadores tienen un arma, un mazo, que se puede utilizar para golpear a los enemigos, así como los ladrillos en las plataformas para proporcionar algo de espacio para saltar al siguiente nivel. Cuando el jugador finalmente llega a la cima, es el momento de pasar al siguiente nivel, más difícil.

Partez à la conquête de pics escarpés, franchissez des ravins glacés et assommez des créatures des neiges, en solo ou en duo dans Ice Climber sur Nes. Utilisez votre marteau pour briser les blocs de glace et vous défendre, et sautez de palier en palier jusqu'au sommet. Franchissez le huitième palier pour atteindre le stage bonus, puis ramassez le plus de légumes possible et partez dans les airs avec l'un de vos amis condors.

locale.title: Ice Hockey
locale.synopsis: Ice Hockey is an action game for one or two players. Start of by selecting a team and customizing your players. Each team member can be one of three player types: small and skinny (very fast, but not good at checking or shooting), very large (slow, but with a strong body check and outstanding shooting strength) or average (medium speed, with average checking and shooting strength). After the teams are set up, it's time to play some ice hockey! Gameplay features a scrolling screen to follow the action, and lets you choose which of the players you wish to control when on defense (on offense you always control the player with the puck). Fights can break out between players, and the loser may end up in the penalty box. There are five different speed settings for the game, and periods can be either 7, 10, or 15 minutes long.

Comienzas seleccionando un equipo y personalizando a tus jugadores. Cada miembro del equipo puede ser de uno de tres tipos de jugadores: pequeño y delgado (muy rápido, pero no es bueno en el control de tiro), muy grande (lento, pero con un fuerte control de cuerpo y fuerza de tiro excepcional) o promedio (velocidad media, con Promedio de control y fuerza de tiro). ¡Después de que los equipos estén creados, es hora de jugar al hockey sobre hielo! La jugabilidad cuenta con una pantalla de desplazamiento para seguir la acción, y te permite elegir cuál de los jugadores deseas controlar cuando estás en defensa (en el ataque manejas siempre al jugador con el disco). Las peleas pueden estallar entre los jugadores, y el perdedor puede terminar en la caja de penalti. Hay cinco ajustes de velocidad diferentes para el juego, y los períodos pueden ser de 7, 10 o 15 minutos de duración.

Ice Hockey sur Nes est un jeu de hockey sur glace dans lequel le but est bien entendu, de remporter un maximum de matches possible. Il est possible de mettre en place des schémas tactiques en composant son équipe. Pour chaque membre de votre team, il est possible de sélectionner entre trois types de corpulence. Cela a une influence directe sur la défense et la capacité de votre équipe à effectuer des contre-attaques.

game.name: Ide Yousuke Meijin No Jissen Mahjong

locale.title: Ide Yousuke Meijin No Jissen Mahjong
locale.synopsis: Ide Yosuke Meijin no Jissen Mahjong is a mahjong game developed and published by Capcom. The game shipped with a unique controller that was explicitly designed for Mahjong games and resembles a keyboard. The game is unplayable without it. Ide Yosuke Meijin no Jissen Mahjong does not play the traditional mahjong game, but rather a variation of the game known as "Reach Mahjong" or "Attack Mahjong".

locale.title: Ide Yousuke Meijin no Jissen Mahjong

game.name: Ide Yousuke Meijin No Jissen Mahjong 2

locale.title: Ide Yousuke Meijin No Jissen Mahjong 2
Ide Yousuke Meijin no Jissen Mahjong II
Idol Hakkenden
locale.synopsis:
Japan-exclusive text adventure video game developed by Natsume and published by Towa Chiki in 1989 for the Family Computer.
Erika, an aspiring musician and pop idol, must foil a plot that could ruin her music career. As a Japanese adventure game, players must select through menus of dialogue in order to determine her future. Friends (and sometimes rivals) of Erika give her advice on what to do next.
There are six songs in the game; all of them belonging to the J-pop genre. Erika must master them all in order to become the greatest idol in all of Japan. Lyrics are not sung by a voice actor; they are shown on the bottom of the screen instead.

locale.title: Igo - Kyuu Roban Taikyoku
locale.synopsis:
Igo: Kyuu Roban Taikyoku is the first real attempt to bring the Japanese board game Go to a home console, namely the Famicom. The game was designed by Henk Rogers, a Dutch programmer who would play games of Go against the CEO (at the time) of Nintendo, Hiroshi Yamauchi. It was during one such game that the prospect of developing such a title for the Famicom was discussed. It was later converted from disk format to cartridge and release in August 1987.
Prior to the release of this game, Nintendo had released a game which was played on the Go board in 1983, known as Gomoku Narabe Renju, but the play mechanics were more akin to "Connect Four" (or five, as it were). The real game of Go is traditionally played on a 19 Ã 19 grid, but the permutations of possibilities would take too long for the Famicom's processor to consider, so the board size has been significantly reduced to a 9 Ã 9 grid, which allows for a smoother single player experience. The game also features a lesson mode, in which ninjas appear to teach the player about the rules and strategy of the game.

Igo: Kyuu Roban Taikyoku est la première véritable tentative d'introduction du jeu de plateau japonais Go sur une console de salon, à savoir la Famicom. Le jeu a été conçu par Henk Rogers, un programmeur néerlandais qui jouerait des jeux de Go contre le PDG (à l'époque) de Nintendo, Hiroshi Yamauchi. C'est lors d'un de ces jeux que la perspective de développer un tel titre pour la Famicom a été discutée. Il a ensuite été converti du format de disque à la cartouche et publié en août 1987.
Avant la sortie de ce jeu, Nintendo avait sorti un jeu qui a été joué sur le plateau Go en 1983, connu sous le nom de Gomoku Narabe Renju, mais les mécanismes de jeu ressemblaient plus à "Connect Four" (ou cinq, pour ainsi dire). Le vrai jeu de Go est traditionnellement joué sur grile 19 x 19, mais les permutations de possibilités prendraient trop de temps pour le processeur de Famicom à considérer, de sorte que la taille de la carte a été considérablement réduite à une grille 9 x 9 grille, ce qui permet une expérience plus simple en solo. Le jeu propose également un mode leçon, dans lequel les ninjas semblent enseigner au joueur les règles et la stratégie du jeu.

locale.title: Igo Meikan
locale.synopsis: Igo Meikan is a Miscellaneous game

locale.title: Igo Shinan
locale.synopsis:
Igo Shinan ("Go Lessons") is a simulation of the popular board game Go from Hect. True to its name, it teaches players at both novice and expert level how to improve their Go game and provides some challenging computer opponents to play against. The player can set how much guidance the game will offer, including presenting possible moves for the player to take (generally, one is more favorable than the others) and allowing the computer to take over their turn.
Hect would follow up Igo Shinan with four sequels, each referring to the year in which they were released: Igo Shinan '91, Igo Shinan '92, Igo Shinan '93, and Igo Shinan '94. Igo Shinan, and all its sequels, were only released in Japan. This was and continues to remain standard practice for most video games based on Go or Mahjong, as both board games are far less popular outside of Asia.

locale.title: Igo Shinan '91
locale.synopsis: Igo Shinan ("Go Lessons") is a simulation of the popular board game Go from Hect. True to its name, it teaches players at both novice and expert level how to improve their Go game and provides some challenging computer opponents to play against. The player can set how much guidance the game will offer, including presenting possible moves for the player to take (generally, one is more favorable than the others) and allowing the computer to take over their turn. Hect would follow up Igo Shinan with four sequels, each referring to the year in which they were released: Igo Shinan '91, Igo Shinan '92, Igo Shinan '93, and Igo Shinan '94. Igo Shinan, and all its sequels, were only released in Japan. This was and continues to remain standard practice for most video games based on Go or Mahjong, as both board games are far less popular outside of Asia.

True to its name, it teaches players at both novice and expert level how to improve their Go game and provides some challenging computer opponents to play against. The player can set how much guidance the game will offer, including presenting possible moves for the player to take (generally, one is more favorable than the others) and allowing the computer to take over their turn. Hect would follow up Igo Shinan with four sequels, each referring to the year in which they were released: Igo Shinan '91, Igo Shinan '92, Igo Shinan '93, and Igo Shinan '94. Igo Shinan, and all its sequels, were only released in Japan. This was and continues to remain standard practice for most video games based on Go or Mahjong, as both board games are far less popular outside of Asia.nn

locale.title: Igo Shinan '93
locale.synopsis: Igo Shinan ("Go Lessons") is a simulation of the popular board game Go from Hect. True to its name, it teaches players at both novice and expert level how to improve their Go game and provides some challenging computer opponents to play against. The player can set how much guidance the game will offer, including presenting possible moves for the player to take (generally, one is more favorable than the others) and allowing the computer to take over their turn. Hect would follow up Igo Shinan with four sequels, each referring to the year in which they were released: Igo Shinan '91, Igo Shinan '92, Igo Shinan '93, and Igo Shinan '94. Igo Shinan, and all its sequels, were only released in Japan. This was and continues to remain standard practice for most video games based on Go or Mahjong, as both board games are far less popular outside of Asia.

locale.title: Ikari III : The Rescue
locale.synopsis: The presidential candidate's daughter has been kidnapped! It is your job to get past enemy lines and rescue her. This is the third game in the Ikari Warriors series, and features similar arcade/action gameplay. The screen is a top down view which scrolls vertically, with numerous bad guys to defeat. You start the game with just your fists, and as the levels progress you can find weapons and other objects to help you out.

La hija del candidato presidencial ha sido secuestrada! Tu misión es cruzar las líneas enemigas y rescatarla. Este es el tercer juego de la serie Ikari Warriors, Juego de acción con una vista desde arriba hacia abajo que se desplaza verticalmente, con numerosos tipos malos para vencer. Inicias el juego con sólo tus puños, y según avanzas por los niveles se pueden encontrar armas y otros objetos para ayudarte.

Ikari III : The Rescue est un jeu d'action sur Nes. Dans ce troisième opus de la série des Ikari Warriors la fille du président a été capturée et c'est à vous qu'incombe la tâche de traverser les lignes ennemies pour la sauver. Vous commencez le jeu à mains nues mais vous trouverez de nombreuses armes au cours de la partie.

locale.title: Ikari Warriors
locale.synopsis: A conversion of the arcade game, Ikari Warriors is a vertically scrolling action game. One or two players fight their way through a variety of terrain, such as jungles, rivers, and ruins. Along the way different weapons can be found, including machine guns, grenades, and rocket launchers.

El jugador toma el papel de los comandos Ralf y Clark, que deben tratar de llegar a la aldea de Ikari. Las unidades enemigas que intentan matar al jugador incluyen tanques, soldados enemigos y helicópteros. Una serie de power-ups a lo largo del camino ayudarán al jugador a lograr la victoria.

Ikari Warriors sur NES est un jeu d'action à défilement vertical. Votre avion vient de s'écraser en pleine jungle en territoire ennemi, vous devez maintenant atteindre le village d'Ikari, mais de nombreux ennemis vous bloquent le passage, allant des simples soldats aux hélicoptères en passant par les tanks. Il va falloir vous en défaire pour accomplir votre mission !

locale.title: Ikari Warriors II : Victory Road
locale.synopsis:
Heavy on the action, Ikari Warriors became a favorite both in the arcades and on home consoles. To fuel that frenzy, SNK and Tradewest teamed up again for a sequel, Victory Road, released later that same year.
This time, the Ikari Warriors take on more cosmic foes, battling rock-headed beasts, one-eyed green men and other odd creatures.

Muchísima acción, Ikari Warriors se convirtió en el favorito tanto en recreativas como en consolas. Para alimentar ese frenesí, SNK y Tradewest se unieron de nuevo para una secuela, Victory Road, lanzado más tarde ese mismo año.
Esta vez, los Guerreros Ikari se enfrentan con más enemigos cósmicos, luchando contra las bestias con cabeza de roca, con los hombres verdes de un solo ojo y con otras extrañas criaturas.

Ikari Warriors II : Victory Road sur NES est un jeu d'action faisant suite au célèbre jeu d'arcade. Dans ce deuxième opus, vous contrôlez les guerriers Ikaris, face à toujours plus d'ennemis comme des hommes verts cyclopes, ou encore des bêtes à tête de pierre.

game.name: Ike Ike! Nekketsu Hockey Bu - Subette Koronde Dai Rantou

locale.title: Ike Ike! Nekketsu Hockey Bu - Subette Koronde Dai Rantou
locale.synopsis: Hey there, this is the Nekketsu High School Paper. Our own Kunio has become famous as a leader. With him we won both the dodge ball and soccer championships. They competed and won at the world stage, it is truly amazing. But did you know, Nekketsu High also has an ice hockey club? Sadly, our team is very weak... We probably won't even make the playoffs in the next national championship. Perhaps Kunio can lead our ice hockey team to victory as well. With him, would it become a successful team, or still be in the minor leagues? Passionate ice hockey spirit! Good luck everyone!

El jugador controla a un personaje en niveles de desplazamiento lateral y trata de derrotar a los oponentes usando un arsenal de ataques y movimientos especiales. Exclusivo de este juego es que con el fin de despejar las cinco etapas, el jugador también debe cumplir una serie de objetivos de temática deportiva . Hay un evento de lanzamiento, un evento de golf , natación , salto , y todos son eventos de lucha, todos con características únicas inspiradas en el tema de las pandillas callejeras del juego (por ejemplo, el evento de salto consiste en saltar por los tejados de la ciudad) .nnnnDependiendo del rendimiento del jugador en cada evento puede ganar medallas que pueden ser canjeadas por power-ups y aumentos del estado. El juego es compatible con dos jugadores en modo cooperativo o de juego vs.nn

Ike Ike! Nekketsu Hockey Bu - Subette Koronde Dai Rantou est un jeu de Hockey loufoque à 3 versus 3 plus le gardien. Il s'agit du Septième épisode sur NES de la prolifique série « Nekketsu Koha Kunio-kun » qui peut à peu près être traduit par « le voyou Kunio du lycée Nekketsu » et qui a offert une douzaine de titres à la NES (Renegade, Nintendo World Cup, Crash 'n the Boys: Street Challenge, etc..). Kunio et Shin (appelés Ric et Jack selon les traductions) s'entraînent au ballon prisonnier quand ils rencontrent Yoichi (Greg ou Alex selon les traductions), capitaine de l'équipe de Hockey du Lycée Nekketsu qui est en perdition. Yoichi demande l'aide de Kunio pour remettre l'équipe à flot, ce dernier accepte de prendre les rênes de l'équipe de hockey après l'avoir battu avec son équipe de ballon prisonnier. L'équipe va d'abord se mesurer aux autres clubs sportifs du lycée Nekketsu : le club de Kendo, de Base-Ball et même contre les majorettes avant de s'attaquer aux clubs sportifs des autres lycées : le club de Football Américain du lycée Hanazono, le club de roller du lycée Tanibana, le club de hockey du lycée Shirogane et finalement participer au tournoi inter-écoles contre les lycées Banba Industries, Shitennou Ji et Daisetsuzan. Des cinématiques font avancer la trame de l'histoire entre chaque partie. L'équipe de Kunio peut récupérer les tenues des équipes vaincues ce qui lui confère des bonus en attaque et défense et éventuellement des armes. Le jeu peut être jouer à quatre. Quelques codes : 2437 : second match contre le club de Kendo 0508 : avant-dernier match 9250 : dernier match 4728 : mode hard (équipe de ballon prisonnier jouable uniquement et sans unformes des adversaires disponibles) 7031 : sound test menu

locale.title: Ike Ike! Nekketsu Hockey Bu : Subette Koronde Dai
Ikinari Musician
locale.synopsis:
Ikinari Musician provides a piano-like keyboard, a treble clef on the staff to show note location, a 5-channel Backing track, 4 timbre choices, and controllers to manipulate common synthesizer parameters such as release and attack, LFO, etc. It also provides recording and play back function.
The player has many choices of styles of the backing track, from popular styles such as Rock, Techno, and Jazz, to various ethnic flavors such as Bossa, Rio, Japan, India, Arabia, etc.
The backing tracks representing the styles use familiar elements to make the game more accessible to the general audience. For example, in the Scotland style Cadence to Arms, a familiar bagpipes tune, is used.
Most backing tracks loop around one or two chords, allowing an open improvisation on the main keyboard. Once the style is chosen, the main keyboard is masked in the way that only the scale that easily fits into the style is available, e.g. blues scale, pentatonic scale, etc.
The keyboard is controlled by the UP-DOWN or LEFT-RIGHT d-pads on the game controller so there is no way to play leaps in the scale.
Due to the hardware limitation, the sound produced is the typical 8-bit chiptune music.

Ikinari Musicien propose un clavier comme le piano, une clé de sol sur la partition pour montrer l'emplacement des notes, une piste d'accompagnement 5 canaux, 4 choix de timbre et des contrôleurs pour manipuler les paramètres de synthétiseur communs tels que la le release et l'attaque, LFO, etc. Il est également fournit une fonction d'enregistrement et de lecture.
Le joueur a beaucoup de choix de styles de la piste d'accompagnement, des styles populaires tels que le rock, la techno et le jazz, aux différentes saveurs ethniques telles que la Bossa, Rio, le Japon, l'Inde, l'Arabie, etc.
Les pistes d'accompagnement représentant les styles utilisent des éléments familiers pour rendre le jeu plus accessible au grand public. Par exemple, dans le style écossais Cadence to Arms, un air de cornemuse familier est utilisé.
La plupart des pistes d'accompagnement tournent autour d'un ou deux accords, ce qui permet une improvisation ouverte sur le clavier principal. Une fois que le style est choisi, le clavier principal est masqué de la façon dont seule l'échelle qui s'intègre facilement dans le style est disponible, par ex. échelle de blues, échelle pentatonique, etc.
Le clavier est contrôlé par les d-pads UP-DOWN ou LEFT-RIGHT sur le contrôleur de jeu, il n'y a donc aucun moyen de jouer des sauts dans l'échelle.
En raison de la limitation matérielle, le son produit est la musique chiptune 8 bits typique.

locale.title: Ikki
locale.synopsis: The game is set in medieval Japan, where a poor farming village is planning an insurrection to overthrow their feudal overlord. However, the only participants in the revolt are the player's character, Gonbe, and the optional second-player character, Tago (??), and the player battles against an army of ninjas instead of samurai and foot soldiers. The game displays text in the vertical direction, which was very unusual for a game of the period, and all in-game messages use speech reminiscent of jidaigeki films. The game consists of four different levels, with the fifth level being an alternate version of the first, the sixth being an alternate version of the second, and so on. The difficulty gradually increases as the game progresses, and the game levels loop infinitely. There is no ending screen for the game, and completion of level 99 brings the player to level 00, which is an alternate version of the fourth level. The player returns to level 01 after completing level 00. A "secret letter" appears on-screen after each of the first 8 levels in the Famicom version. The secret letters displayed are E, R, A, W, T, F, O, S, in order, and if the letters are read backwards as indicated in the game's instruction manual, they form the word "SOFTWARE." This code word was required for the gift campaign that was conducted during the game's initial release.

El juego se desarrolla en el Japón medieval, donde una familia pobre de campesinos está planeado una sublevación para derrocar a su señor feudal. Sin embargo, los únicos participantes en la revuelta son los personajes jugables, Gonbe, y el segundo jugador opcional Tago, El jugador pelea contra un ejercito de ninjas en vez de samurais y soldados de infanteria. El juego muestra el texto en dirección vertical, lo cuál era muy inusual para un juego de la época, y todos los mensajes del juego usan discursos que recuerdan a las películas de Jidaigeki. El juego consiste en cuatro niveles diferentes, y con un quinto nivel que resulta una versión alternativa del primero, el sexto una versión alternativa del segundo y así en adelante. A lo que el juego progresa también lo hace su dificultad de una manera gradual, y los niveles se tornan en una espiral infinita. No hay una pantalla para el final del juego, y el completar el nivel 99 regresa al jugador al nivel 00, el cuál es una versión alternativa del cuarto nivel, el jugador regresa al nivel 01 después de completar el nivel 00. En la versión de la Famicom, una "letra secreta" aparece en pantalla después de cada uno de los primeros 8 niveles. Las letras secretas mostradas son E,R,A,W,T,F,O,S, en ese orden, y si las letras son leídas de atrás hacia adelante, tal como indica en el manual de instrucciones del juego, forman la palabra "SOFTWARE". Este código era necesario para la campaña de regalo que se realizo durante el lanzamiento inicial del juego.

Le jeu se déroule dans le Japon médiéval, où un village agricole pauvre projette une insurrection pour renverser son suzerain féodal. Cependant, les seuls participants à la révolte sont le personnage du joueur, Gonbe, et le personnage optionnel du second joueur, Tago (??), et le joueur se bat contre une armée de ninjas au lieu de samouraïs et de fantassins. Le jeu affiche du texte dans la direction verticale, ce qui était très inhabituel pour un jeu de la période, et tous les messages dans le jeu utilisent un discours qui rappelle les films jidaigeki. Le jeu se compose de quatre niveaux différents, le cinquième niveau étant une version alternative du premier, le sixième étant une version alternative du second, et ainsi de suite. La difficulté augmente progressivement au fur et à mesure que le jeu progresse, et les niveaux de jeu tournent à l'infini. Il n'y a pas d'écran de fin pour le jeu, et l'achèvement du niveau 99 amène le joueur au niveau 00, qui est une version alternative du quatrième niveau. Le joueur revient au niveau 01 après avoir terminé le niveau 00. Une "lettre secrète" apparaît à l'écran après chacun des 8 premiers niveaux de la version Famicom. Les lettres secrètes affichées sont E, R, A, W, T, F, O, S, dans l'ordre, et si les lettres sont lues vers l'arrière comme indiqué dans le manuel d'instructions du jeu, elles forment le mot "LOGICIEL". Ce mot de code a été requis pour la campagne de cadeaux qui a été menée pendant la première version du jeu.

locale.title: Image Fight
locale.synopsis:
A mysterious alien life form is spreading across the galaxy, trying to conquer the world. It took control of the moon base and is threatening to descend on the Earth. The humans have sent the most advanced fighter jet to oppose the aliens: the OF-1. The OF-1 has the ability to change speed at any time and equip different weapons and pods. OF-1 is humanity's last hope!
Image Fight is a top-down vertically scrolling space shooter. On every level there will be enemy ships, turrets, robots, and other machines shooting projectiles or trying to ram you. But there are also power-ups scattered around in small green containers. You must destroy these containers before you can obtain the power-up. Those power-ups include pods that add extra attack power or speed, new kinds of weapons, the ability to fire in different directions, etc.

Una misteriosa forma de vida alienígena se está extendiendo a través de la galaxia, tratando de conquistar el mundo. Tomó el control de la base lunar y amenaza con descender sobre la Tierra. Los humanos han enviado el avión de combate más avanzado para oponerse a los extraterrestres: el OF-1. El OF-1 tiene la capacidad de cambiar la velocidad en cualquier momento y equipar diferentes armas y vainas. OF-1 es la última esperanza de la humanidad!
ImageFight es un shooter espacial que se desplaza verticalmente. En cada nivel habrá naves enemigas, torretas, robots y otras máquinas disparando proyectiles. Pero hay también power-ups esparcidos alrededor en pequeños envases verdes. Debes destruir estos contenedores antes de poder obtenerlos. Esas nejoras incluyen vainas que agregan potencia o velocidad de ataque adicional, nuevos tipos de armas, la habilidad de disparar en diferentes direcciones, etc.

Image Fight est un jeu de tir sur Nes. De mystérieux aliens se répandent à travers la galaxie, tentant de tout conquérir sur leur passage. Après avoir pris la Lune, ils tentent d'envahir la Terre mais sont confrontés au dernier rempart de l'humanité : le OF-1. Il s'agit du meilleur vaisseau de combat capable d'équiper de nombreuses armes pour mettre fin à l'invasion.

locale.title: The Immortal
locale.synopsis:
The Immortal is an isometric action-adventure game.
Your old mentor Mordamir has disappeared. Probably kidnapped. You're not too sure where he might be, but a dungeon is always a good place to look, so you seek out the nearest one and plunge into its depths. Beware: 8 levels of isometric death await.
The Immortal is the prototype of a trial-and-error game. Progress is made by encountering a hazard, dying, solving the problem, encountering the next hazard. To solve a level, you have to know its traps and their patterns by heart. As frustrating as this may sound (it is), The Immortal quite cleverly balances annoyance with curiosity and graphical rewards. In short: You want to see what challenge lies in the next room.
The puzzles range from simple avoidance of traps to the correct use of items; you collect objects in an inventory. Every now and then, The Immortal surprises with a special challenge. For example, you've got to ride a magic carpet through a hallway full of fire traps, or ride a barrel on an underground river. The dungeon isn't empty: some friedlies may have valuable information or trade items, the nasty sort of guys will attack. Combat is fought man-to-man on a special screen. Your adversary indicates his next attack a few seconds before he executes it, so you've got time to react appropriately. You can dodge to the left or the right, as well as attack from these two directions. There is no save option in the game, of course, but you may restart each level as often as you like. Levels can be skipped by entering passwords.

Tu viejo mentor Mordamir ha desaparecido, probablemente secuestrado. No estás muy seguro de dónde podría estar, pero un calabozo es siempre un buen lugar para buscar, por lo que buscas el más cercano y te sumerges en sus profundidades. Cuidado: ocho niveles de trampas y enemigos mortales esperan.
El inmortal es un juego isométrico con resolución de enigmas y acción de combate. Para resolver un nivel, tienes que saber donde están sus trampas y sus patrones de memoria. Los puzzles van desde evitar trampas a el uso correcto de los objetos del inventario. De vez en cuando, el juego ofrece un reto especial. Por ejemplo, tienes que montar una alfombra mágica a través de un pasillo lleno de trampas de fuego, o montar un barril en un río subterráneo.
El calabozo no está vacío: algunos simpáticos personajes pueden tener información o comerciar com valiosos elementos, otros te atacarán. El combate se libra de hombre a hombre en una pantalla especial. Tu adversario indica su siguiente ataque unos segundos antes de que lo ejecute, por lo que tienes tiempo para reaccionar adecuadamente. Puedes esquivar a la izquierda o a la derecha, así como el ataque en estas dos direcciones. No hay opción de guardar en el juego, pero puedes reiniciar cada nivel tantas veces como quieras. Los niveles pueden ser omitidos mediante la introducción de contraseñas.

The Immortal est un jeu d'action/aventure sur NES. Pénétrez dans le cachot de la terreur où cauchemars deviennent réalité. Aventurez-vous dans plus de 50 salles à explorer et essayez de sortir vivant de ce maudit cachot.

locale.title: Impossible Mission II
locale.synopsis: You have 8 hours to prevent Elvin, a psychotic genius from destroying the world in this sequel to the highly successful Impossible Mission. Enter Elvin's tower fortress, avoid his robots, assemble security combinations for each tower, recover musical sequences and tie them together into a full melody to reach Elvin's central control room.

Tienes 8 horas para evitar que Elvin, un genio psicótico destruya el mundo en esta secuela de la exitosa Misión Imposible. Entra en la fortaleza de la torre de Elvin, evita sus robots, ensambla combinaciones de seguridad para cada torre, recupera secuencias musicales y átalos juntos en una melodía completa para llegar a la sala de control central de Elvin.

Impossible Mission II est un jeu d'action sur NES, inspiré de la série Mission Impossible. Dans cette adaptation, vous avez 8 heures pour arrêter le Docteur Elvin, dangereux scientifique de génie, et empêcher la Terre d'être détruite. Partez à sa poursuite dans son donjon et stoppez-le avant qu'il ne soit trop tard.

locale.title: The Incredible Crash Dummies
locale.synopsis:
Junkman breaks into the crash test center and kidnaps two of the Incredible Crash Dummies, Daryl and Spare Tire with the intentions of using them for their parts to build his junkbots. Now it's up to Slick and Spin to go and rescue the kidnapped crash dummies.
In The Incredible Crash Dummies the player alternates between Slick and Spin as they go through five levels with each level containing 2 stages (except for the 4th level which only consists of one). One of the Dummies' legs has been replaced with a wheel while the other Dummy has his legs intact. So the main difference in gameplay is that in some stages the player either rolls throughout it or walks throughout it. The Dummies' arsenal includes an air gun which stuns enemies at close range and an oil gun which shoots and kills enemies at a far range. There are also a few powerups scattered throughout the stages such as the arrow, balloon, and arm powerup.
Un reconocido diseñador de maniquíes usados para pruebas de colisión ha sido raptado y los únicos que podrán rescatarlo son precisamente los maniquíes que el creó

The Incredible Crash Dummies sur NES vous propose d'incarner deux mannequins de crash-test dans des missions loufoques où le but est d'infliger à votre mannequin un maximum de coups et de dégâts. Les missions vont de la conduite de véhicules, au classique jeu de plates-formes.

game.name: Indiana Jones And The Last Crusade

locale.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
locale.synopsis:
As in the movie (and the more famous graphic adventure), your task is to find the Holy Grail. Before this can be done you must find the Cross of Coronado, a shield and a diary.
This makes for a four-level arcade adventure combining climbs, exploration (with several routes through each level, and some traps) and puzzles. Indy is armed with his trusty whip to fight off foes, but can also get involved in hand-to-hand combat.
