RoadBlasters is a futuristic racing action game. The goal is to reach the finish line in one piece throughout each of 50 levels. Numerous enemies are out on the road to try and stop you, including armored cars, motorcycles, canons on the side of the road, landmines, and more.
Your vehicle is equipped with a machine gun to help you out, and occasionally a weapons plane will fly in and drop additional power ups that can be collected. Some of these are the U.Z. canon, cruise missiles, and speed boost. Your car has a very limited amount of fuel, however more can be picked up along the way by crossing the halfway point of a level, or by collecting the red and green fuel spheres that appear in the road or after destroying certain enemies. On many levels collecting fuel is critical otherwise you won't be able to reach the finish line.

RoadBlasters es un juego de carreras futurista de acción. El objetivo es llegar a la meta de una pieza en cada uno de los 50 niveles. Numerosos enemigos están en la carretera para tratar de detenerte, incluyendo coches blindados, motocicletas, cañones en el lado de la carretera, minas terrestres y más. nnnnTu vehículo está equipado con una ametralladora para ayudarte, y de vez en cuando un avión de armas volará y dejará caer los potenciadores adicionales que se pueden recoger. Algunos de estos son los U. Z. misiles de crucero y aumento de velocidad. Tu coche tiene una cantidad muy limitada de combustible, sin embargo más puede ser recogido a lo largo del camino cruzando el punto medio de un nivel, o recogiendo las esferas rojas y verdes de combustible que aparecen en la carretera o después de destruir a ciertos enemigos. En muchos niveles la recolección de combustible es crítica, de lo contrario no podrás llegar a la meta.

RoadBlasters est un jeu de courses sur NES disposant d'une bonne dose d'action. Le but est de franchir la ligne d'arrivée en un seul morceau au cours des cinquante niveaux du jeu. De nombreux ennemis vous attendent sur la route et feront tout pour vous arrêter. Heureusement vous disposez de plusieurs armes pour riposter et d'autres bonus peuvent également être ramassés sur le parcours.

locale.title: Robert Byrne's Pool Challenge
locale.synopsis: Robert Byrne's Pool Challenge (from here on out referred to as "Cue Stick') was being developed by Odyssey Software during 1992. George C. Rucker III programmed the Cue Stick game and it would later be passed on to American Video Entertainment for publishing. Do to a twist of fate with the gravity of the pool balls in Cue Stick, the game was pushed back and passed on to American Video too late.nnnnAmerican Video Entertainment had licensed the game with famous pool shark Robert Byrnes. Byrnes requested some last minute changes before the game shipped, American Video Entertainment folded, and Cue Stick was canned. Odyssey Software survived for a few more years before they met a similar fate.nnnnThe game is filled with tons of features. There are four different modes of play including Straight Pool and Nine Ball, a trainer mode, and several table colors to choose from. There are also several different frictions (or lack of) that you can add to the table, including ice and sand. This option gives the balls a slightly different behavior, increasing the challenge.nnnnCue Stick is viewed similarly to Side Pocket. If you press select during gameplay you can see the numbers on the different balls. A chart at the bottom allows you to decide the force of the Cue Stick against the Cue Ball.nnnnAt first appearence one might comment that it is just another pool game. However, the options make the game superb.

Robert Byrne's Pool Challenge (appelé désormais «Cue Stick») a été développé par Odyssey Software en 1992. George C. Rucker III a programmé le jeu Cue Stick et il sera ensuite transmis à American Video Entertainment pour publication. Suite à un coup du sort avec la gravité des balles de billard dans Cue Stick, le jeu a été repoussé et transmis à American Video trop tard.nnnnAmerican Video Entertainment avait autorisé le jeu avec Robert Byrnes. Byrnes a demandé des changements de dernière minute avant que le jeu ne soit expédié, American Video Entertainment a plié, et Cue Stick a été mis en boîte. Odyssey Software a survécu quelques années de plus avant de connaître le même sort.nnnnLe jeu est rempli de tonnes de fonctionnalités. Il y a quatre modes de jeu différents, y compris Straight Pool et la Nine Ball, un mode entraîneur et plusieurs couleurs de table. Il y a également plusieurs frictions différentes (ou absence de) que vous pouvez ajouter à la table, y compris la glace et le sable. Cette option donne aux balles un comportement légèrement différent, ce qui augmente le défi.nnnnCue Stick est similaire à Side Pocket. Si vous appuyez sur select pendant le jeu, vous pouvez voir les numéros sur les différentes balles. Un graphique en bas vous permet de décider de la force du Cue Stick contre la Cue Ball.nnnnÀ première vue, on pourrait dire que c'est juste un autre jeu de billard. Cependant, les options rendent le jeu superbe.

locale.title: Robin Hood : Prince Of Thieves
locale.synopsis:
England is in trouble.
Richard the Lion-Hearted, king of England, is off fighting in the Crusades, and while he's gone, the kingdom is ruled by the Sheriff and his evil black witch Mortianna.
You start in the city dungeons, being whipped by the Sheriff's prison guards.
Now its all up to you. Set yourself free, find friends in Sherwood forest, rescue the lovely Main Marian, and set England free!

Inglaterra está en problemas, Ricardo Corazón de León, rey de Inglaterra, está luchando en las Cruzadas, y mientras él se ha ido, el reino está gobernado por el Sheriff y su malvada bruja negra Mortianna.nnnnEmpiezas en las mazmorras de la ciudad, siendo azotado por los guardias de la prisión del Sheriff. Ahora todo depende de ti. Libérate, encuentra amigos en el bosque de Sherwood, rescata a la encantadora Marian y libera Inglaterra!

Disponible sur Nes, le jeu de rôle Robin Hood : Prince Of Thieves vous permet d'incarner le célèbre prince des voleurs, qui doit retourner en Angleterre après avoir été emprisonné à Jérusalem. De retour au pays, Robin apprend que son père a été assassiné et que le shérif de Nottingham règne sur l'Angleterre en l'absence du roi Richard. Joignez vous à la résistance avec vos compagnons dans la forêt de Sherwood qui deviendra votre QG, et complétez les nombreuses missions qui vous attendent !

locale.title: Robo Warrior
locale.synopsis:
In a desperate measure to combat the overpopulation of Earth, scientists work to create an artificial planet named Altile, named after the scientist who designed it. During the construction of Altile, humanity has become united and peaceful. During this new era of prosperity, Earth decommissions the RoboWarriors, a force of heavily armed half-man half-robot war vehicles. But from another dimension, aliens calling themselves the Xantho Empire and lead by the being Xur invade planet Altile and terraform it for their own uses. The survivors of Altile send out a distress call to Earth. Receiving this message, the people of Earth quickly activate the latest and most powerful of the RoboWarriors, a model known as ZED (Z-Type Earth Defense) and send it at top speed to Altile.
Controlling ZED from an overhead view, the player is able to move in any of 4 directions (up,down,left,right), drop bombs and shoot a projectile weapon. The terrain of Altile is made up of many obstacles and the bombs serve to destroy these and make passage for ZED. Destroying any enemy or obstacle may yield different power-ups which contain any of 10 different effects (including ammunition and energy refills) which may be stocked and used at any time from the menu. Or the power-ups may be instant-use refills for bombs and energy supplies.
Additionally some levels contain keys, which unlock doors and Chalices which prevent the level from running on endlessly. Secret areas such as a Well of Hope and a Room of Idols may also be found. Altogether, there are eight different "worlds" for ZED to conquer, containing numerous stages and guarded by a vicious boss monster.

En una medida desesperada para combatir la superpoblación de la Tierra, los científicos trabajan para crear un planeta artificial llamado Altile, llamado así por el científico que lo diseñó. Durante la construcción de Altile, la humanidad se ha unido y se ha vuelto pacífica. Durante esta nueva era de prosperidad, la Tierra desmantela a los RoboWarriors, una fuerza de vehículos de guerra fuertemente armados y semipropulsados. Pero desde otra dimensión, los extraterrestres se llaman a sí mismos el Imperio Xantho y liderados por el ser Xur invaden el planeta Altile y lo terraforman para sus propios usos. Los supervivientes de Altile envían una llamada de socorro a la Tierra. Recibiendo este mensaje, los habitantes de la Tierra activan rápidamente el último y más poderoso de los RoboWarriors, un modelo conocido como ZED.nnnnControlando ZED desde una vista aérea, el jugador es capaz de moverse en cualquiera de las 4 direcciones (arriba, abajo, izquierda, derecha), soltar bombas y disparar un arma proyectil. El terreno de Altile está formado por muchos obstáculos y las bombas sirven para destruirlos y hacer paso a ZED. La destrucción de cualquier enemigo u obstáculo puede dar lugar a diferentes power-ups que contengan cualquiera de los 10 efectos diferentes (incluyendo munición y recargas de energía) que pueden ser almacenados y utilizados en cualquier momento desde el menú. O los potenciadores pueden ser recambios de uso instantáneo para bombas y suministros de energía.

RoboWarrior sur Nes est un jeu d'action futuriste. Sur Altile, une planète vivant en harmonie, de terribles changements climatiques surviennent. C'est un coup de l'Empire Xantho ! La terre décide donc d'envoyer son RoboWarrior le plus puissant afin de contrer cette terrible menace.

locale.title: Robocco Wars
locale.synopsis:
The game allows the player to control a shape-changing robot named R-10 (and his human controller Lance) as they fight evil robots. On the land, the player is a freight train that must follow the railroad tracks to the boss of the level. However, the robot turns into an airplane when the player is forced to fly to the next mission. Sea missions require the player to transform into a submarine.
The player has three lives and three continues as he struggles to liberate the world of Robocco from evil.

Robocco Wars est un petit jeu comme il y en a tant eu sur NES qui est resté méconnu de par sa diffusion qui s'est limitée au Japon. Vous prenez le contrôle du R-10, un Robot qui a la capacité de changer de forme pour s'adapter à l'environnement. C'est ainsi que suivant le stage (une dizaine en tout), ce sera un avion, un sous-marin, ou une sorte de tank. Si vous cherchez un petit jeu sympa et pas trop difficile, vous pouvez jeter un coup d'?il à ce titre.

locale.title: RoboCop
locale.synopsis:
Patrolman Alex Murphy was killed on the streets of Detroit. The major corporation there, Omni Consumer Products (OCP) saw an opportunity to sell a new kind of law enforcement officer to the troubled city. They took what was left of Murphy, encased it in titanium armor, wiped his memory and created RoboCop. Now it's up to RoboCop to clean the streets of Detroit and eliminate the one responsible for his murder, Clarence Boddicker. But it looks like Clarence might not be the kingpin of this town...
Based on the 1987 movie of the same name, RoboCop allows the player to control RoboCop. The majority of the game is a side scroller. RoboCop can punch unarmed citizens and shoot armed citizens. He can move left, right and duck but can not jump. Different weapons can be picked up from enemies, and power-ups to restore health and/or energy. Following levels, RoboCop will have to match a criminal's face to the proper mugshot and engage in a first-person shooting bonus round.

El patrullero Alex Murphy fue asesinado en las calles de Detroit. La corporación principal allí, Omni Consumer Products (OCP) vio la oportunidad de vender un nuevo tipo de agente de policía a la ciudad en problemas. Tomaron lo que quedaba de Murphy, lo envolvieron en una armadura de titanio, borraron su memoria y crearon RoboCop. Ahora le toca al RoboCop limpiar las calles de Detroit y eliminar al responsable de su asesinato, Clarence Boddicker. Pero parece que Clarence podría no ser el rey de esta ciudad...nnnnBasado en la película de 1987 del mismo nombre, RoboCop permite al jugador controlar RoboCop. La mayoría del juego es un desplazamiento lateral. RoboCop puede golpear a ciudadanos desarmados y disparar a ciudadanos armados. Puede mover a izquierda, derecha y agacharse pero no puede saltar. Diferentes armas pueden ser recogidas de los enemigos, y power-ups para restaurar la salud y / o energía. Siguiendo los niveles, RoboCop tendrá que comparar la cara de un criminal con la foto de la ficha policial apropiada y participar en una ronda de bonificación de disparos en primera persona.

RoboCop est un jeu d'action sur NES. Vous êtes à Néo-Détroit, en 2015. Les quartiers sont à feu et à sang et l'OCP prend le contrôle de la ville. Au coeur d'une sombre machination entre pouvoir, corruption et trafic de drogue, vous incarnez RoboCop, le seul espoir.

locale.title: RoboCop 2
locale.synopsis: RoboCop 2 is a mission-based platform game. Missions have various objectives, such as destroying nukes or killing all the enemies. If you didn't destroy/kill enough, you'll be transported to a training mission, which is a first-person perspective shoot 'em up. Should you also fail the training, you must go to the beginning of the previous mission. Successfully completed mission or enough points scored by training allow you to proceed to the next stage. Unlike in the first RoboCop, there's no time limit, and you are able to jump.

RoboCop 2 es un juego de plataformas basado en misiones. Las misiones tienen varios objetivos, como destruir las armas nucleares o matar a todos los enemigos. Si no destruiste o mataste lo suficiente, serás transportado a una misión de entrenamiento, que es una perspectiva en primera persona. Si también fallas el entrenamiento, debes ir al comienzo de la misión anterior. Una misión cumplida con éxito o suficientes puntos conseguidos por el entrenamiento te permiten pasar a la siguiente etapa. A diferencia del primer RoboCop, no hay límite de tiempo y puedes saltar.

RoboCop 2 sur Nes est un jeu d'action inspiré du film. Contrairement au premier opus, il n'y a pas de limite de temps et vous êtes capable de sauter. Les missions sont à objectifs divers comme la destruction d'armes nucléaires ou la destruction de tous les ennemis se trouvant sur votre chemin.

locale.title: RoboCop 3
locale.synopsis: RoboCop 3 is a side-scrolling platform shooter. You get missions (such as rescuing your colleagues who are being kept hostages), which are divided into several smaller levels. The levels usually consist of several platforms, and are heavily populated by enemies who shoot at you. You can gather special repair kits, which will be used to restore your health after you've completed a level. "RoboCop 3" is more of a shooter than its predecessors, having more and tougher enemies.

RoboCop 3 es un shooter con plataforma de desplazamiento lateral. Obtienes misiones (tales como rescatar a tus colegas que están siendo mantenidos como rehenes), que se dividen en varios niveles más pequeños. Los niveles suelen constar de varias plataformas, y están muy poblados por enemigos que te disparan. Puedes reunir kits de reparación especiales, que se utilizarán para restaurar tu salud después de que hayas completado un nivel. "RoboCop 3" es más un shooter que sus predecesores, con más y más enemigos.

RoboCop 3 sur NES est un jeu mêlant plates-formes et tir. Vos missions consistent pour la plupart à porter secours à des collègues ou des civils en mauvaise posture. Vous trouverez en chemin des kits de réparation qui vous permettront de récupérer l'énergie que vous auront enlevée vos nombreux assaillants.

locale.title: RoboCop versus The Terminator
locale.synopsis: In the future, human soldiers of John Connor's resistance force against the machines are fighting a losing war against Skynet and its robot forces. Discovering that one of the foundation technologies for Skynet is the cybernetics technology used in the creation of cyborg police officer RoboCop, Flo, a resistance soldier, is sent back in time to destroy RoboCop and stop Skynet from being built. However, Skynet learns of the time travel attempt and sends Terminators to stop Flo. RoboCop soon meets up with Flo and must engage in battle against Terminators, the forces of OCP and several obstacles.

En el futuro, los soldados humanos de la fuerza de resistencia de John Connor contra las máquinas están luchando una guerra perdida contra Skynet y sus fuerzas robóticas. Descubriendo que una de las tecnologías fundamentales para Skynet es la tecnología cibernética utilizada en la creación del oficial de policía ciborg RoboCop, Flo, un soldado de la resistencia, es enviado atrás en el tiempo para destruir RoboCop y detener la construcción de Skynet. Sin embargo, Skynet se entera del intento de viaje en el tiempo y envía Terminators para detener a Flo. RoboCop pronto se reúne con Flo y debe luchar contra Terminators, las fuerzas de OCP y varios obstáculos.

Jeu tiré de la bande déssinée éponyme écrit par Frank Miller et dessinée par Walter Simonson en 1992. Si le jeu fut édité sur plusieurs plateformes, la version de la NES fur développé en fin de vie de la console, les développeurs migrant sur la SNES, et ne fut finalement jamais édité mais distribué online pour l'émulation. L'histoire commence alors que Skynet envoie 3 terminators du futur a notre époque pour protéger Alex J. Murphy alias Robocop qu'un soldat humain a pour mission de tuer, Flo Langer. Mais quand Murphy va découvrir que la technologie utilisé pour sa cybernétique va servir au développement de Skynet et à la destruction du monde, il va s'associer à Flo et combattre les terminators et l'OCP.

locale.title: Robodemons
locale.synopsis:
Robodemons tells the tale of Kull, demon king of the Hades underworld. Kull conquered the earth by using a special machine to transplant demon souls into robots. You are a brave warrior who has accepted the challenge of rectifying this situation. Using only a boomerang for offense, the hero descends into the depths of the underworld. The game begins with a flying/shooting side scrolling level and then proceeds to walking/jumping side scrolling action. All kinds of undead creatures (mostly skeletons) are waiting to destroy you.
Audibly, the game makes liberal use of digitized voices, a rarity for 8-bit NES games.

Robodemons cuenta la historia de Kull, rey demonio del inframundo Hades. Kull conquistó la tierra usando una máquina especial para trasplantar almas demoníacas en robots. Eres un guerrero valiente que ha aceptado el reto de rectificar esta situación. Usando sólo un bumerán para el ataque, el héroe desciende a las profundidades del inframundo. El juego comienza con un nivel de desplazamiento lateral de vuelo/disparo y luego pasa a la acción de desplazamiento lateral de caminar/saltar. Todo tipo de criaturas no-muertos (sobre todo esqueletos) están esperando para destruirte.nnnnEl juego hace un uso liberal de las voces digitalizadas, una rareza para los juegos NES de 8 bits.

Robodemons raconte l'histoire de Kull, le roi démon du monde souterrain Hades. Kull a conquis la terre en utilisant une machine spéciale pour transplanter des âmes démoniaques dans des robots. Vous êtes un guerrier courageux qui a accepté le défi de rectifier cette situation. Armé d'un simple boomerang, le héros descend dans les profondeurs du monde souterrain. Toutes sortes de créatures mort-vivantes (principalement des squelettes) vous y attendent.nnLe jeu fait un usage généreux des voix numérisées, chose rare dans les jeux NES.

locale.title: Rock 'n' Ball
locale.synopsis: Rock 'N' Ball is a pinball game with several gameplay options. The first is regular pinball game for one to four players. The second option is called nineball and the object is to shoot the balls into the playfield and have them land in the holes to form a bingo pattern (i.e. a vertical line, a horizontal line, etc.) This game is also for one to four players. Next is battle flipper. There is a set of flippers at both the top and bottom of the table, and two players try to knock the pinball past their opponents flippers. Lastly is sports pinball. In this game the pinball table is set up to look like a soccer or hockey field. Similar to battle flipper, each player tries to knock the pinball past their opponents goalie. There is only one flipper in this game, however you have a goalie to block shots and the flipper can be moved from side to side.

Rock' N' Ball es un juego de pinball con varias opciones de juego. El primero es el juego de pinball regular para uno a cuatro jugadores. La segunda opción se llama nineball y el objetivo es lanzar las bolas al campo de juego y hacer que caigan en los hoyos para formar un patrón de bingo (es decir, una línea vertical, una línea horizontal, etc.) Este juego es también para uno a cuatro jugadores. El siguiente es Battle Flipper. Hay un juego de flippers en la parte superior e inferior de la mesa, y dos jugadores intentan golpear el pinball más allá de las aletas de sus oponentes. Por último, el pinball deportivo. En este juego la mesa de pinball está preparada para que parezca un campo de fútbol o de hockey. Similar a la flipper de batalla, cada jugador intenta golpear el pinball más allá del portero de su oponente. Sólo hay una flipper en este juego, sin embargo tienes un portero para bloquear los tiros y la flipper se puede mover de lado a lado.

Rock 'n' Ball sur Nes est un jeu de flipper dans lequel vous trouverez de nombreux modes de jeu comme le Battle Flipper ou le Sports Flipper. A chaque mode ses caractéristiques, aussi préparez-vous pour une bonne dose d'adrénaline seul ou entre amis !

locale.title: Rockball
locale.synopsis: When the world was in Chaos, there was a big fight between the God of Heaven and Evils of Hell. The Evils were captured by the God of Heaven and restrained in four towers with four magic Balls. People have now lived peacefully for thousands of years. As time passed, the magic Balls were affected by the magnetic field and have become loose. At this moment, the Abbot of Sou-Lin Temple senses the crisis, then orders Pan-zo and Pan-lo to recapture the Evils with the four magic Balls

locale.title: Rocket Ranger
locale.synopsis:
In the 1940s, the Nazis built a base on the moon and plan to use a mysterious substance called Lunarium to reduce people's intelligence. However, in the 21st Century time travel has been mastered, as have jet-propulsion backpacks, plus some cataclysmic weaponry and advanced code-breaking equipment. Thus, you are sent back in time to change the result of the war using this technology to find their five rocket factories and destroy the moon base.
The game fits the Cinemaware template closely, with a string of action sequences linked by cinematic animation sequences to set the scene. There's also a strategic element, as you move your spies around to gain information and avoid detection, and decide how much Lunarium to use at each stage of the game. Action sequences include hand-to-hand combat with a Nazi guard, and flying through the air shooting either hordes of enemy planes or the Zeppelin itself.

En la década de 1940, los nazis construyeron una base en la luna y planean usar una misteriosa sustancia llamada Lunarium para reducir la inteligencia de la gente. Sin embargo, en el siglo XXI se ha dominado el viaje en el tiempo, al igual que las mochilas de propulsión a chorro, más algunas armas cataclísmicas y avanzados equipos para romper códigos. Por lo tanto, son enviados atrás en el tiempo para cambiar el resultado de la guerra utilizando esta tecnología para encontrar sus cinco fábricas de cohetes y destruir la base lunar.nnnnEl juego se ajusta a la plantilla Cinemaware de cerca, con una cadena de secuencias de acción enlazadas por secuencias de animación cinematográfica para establecer la escena. También hay un elemento estratégico, como mover a sus espías alrededor para obtener información y evitar la detección, y decidir cuánto Lunarium a utilizar en cada etapa del juego. Las secuencias de acción incluyen combate cuerpo a cuerpo con un guardia nazi, y volar por el aire disparando a través de las hordas de aviones enemigos o el propio Zeppelin.

Rocket Ranger sur Nes est un jeu d'action/aventure où vous incarnez un homme moderne envoyé en 1940 pour détruire une base lunaire construite par les Nazis. Ceux-ci projettent d'utiliser du Lunarium, une mystérieuse substance découverte sur la Lune, pour réduire l'intelligence de l'espèce humaine. Vous devez les en empêcher en détruisant leurs fabriques de missiles, à l'aide de votre technologie ultra sophistiquée impliquant un jet-pack et des armes à feu contemporaines.

locale.title: The Rocketeer
locale.synopsis:
The Rocketeer is based on the 1991 Disney movie of the same name. Nazis are trying to steal an experimental jet pack that will presumably give them a strategic edge in modern warfare for the purpose of world domination. It is up to the hero to don the jet pack and the helmet to stop the Nazis and keep the world safe.
The Rocketeer is a side-scrolling, run-and-jump (and sometimes fly) game. About halfway through the first stage, the Rocketeer is able to scavenge jet fuel power-ups, in addition to health and ammo power-ups. The fuel power-ups allow him to use his namesake power and fly for short distances. The Rocketeer has 6 offensive options available from the start of the game, limited only by the amount of ammunition points he has in reserve: A punch (requires no ammo points and is therefore unlimited), pistol (1 ammo point per fire), tommygun (2 ammo points), spread gun (3 ammo points), grenade (5 ammo points), and a bazooka (20 ammo points).

The Rocketeer sur NES est un jeu d'action qui permet au joueur de revivre la plupart des scènes du film éponyme de Walt Disney. Faire la course contre un avion ou encore se battre sur un dirigeable sont quelques-unes des missions de cet homme volant avec son jet pack sur le dos. Des phases de tir sont aussi présentes où il est possible de s'envoler tout en mitraillant ses ennemis.

locale.title: Rockin' Kats
locale.synopsis:
Willy is a young jazz cat who goes by the name of "The Rockin' Kat". His girlfriend, Jill, was kidnapped by Mugsy, the local crime boss.
In this side scrolling game, you must help Rockin' Kat Willy to save his girlfriend through 7 stages. Each stage is a TV show broadcast through different channels of a TV set, and you must thus choose which channel you want to play. Through the channels Willy it will be sent to different themed shows such as western movies, gangster movies, etc, as well as some bonus channels.
Willy can walk and jump around, and carries as a weapon a spring-load Super Punch Gun, which he can put in diverse uses:
1. Knock his enemies: by pressing A. Perform higher jumps: by jumping (B) and pressing down + A. Spin Attack: by grabbing a ledge (A) and rotating with the d-pad. Spin Jump: by grabbing a ledge (A), rotating with the d-pad and jumping (B). Catch and Trow: by holding A, grabbing an object and releasing A.
He can also buy attachments that will make his gun more powerful, such as the Bomber, the Twin Balls, the Hammer Punch and the Jet Sneakers.
Rockin' Kats is so cartoonish that you might expect to see it on Saturday morning TV.

Willy es un joven gato de jazz que se llama "The Rockin' Kat". Su novia, Jill, fue secuestrada por Mugsy, la jefa criminal local.nnnnEn este juego de desplazamiento lateral, debes ayudar a Rockin' Kat Willy a salvar a su novia a través de 7 etapas. Cada etapa es un programa de televisión que se transmite a través de diferentes canales de un televisor, y por lo tanto debe elegir qué canal desea reproducir. A través de los canales Willy se enviará a diferentes programas temáticos como películas occidentales, películas de gángsters, etc, así como algunos canales de bonos.nnnnWilly puede caminar y saltar alrededor, y lleva como un arma una pistola Super Punch Gun de resorte de carga, que puede poner en diversos usos:nnnn1. Golpea a sus enemigos: presionando A.nnRealizar saltos más altos: saltando (B) y presionando hacia abajo + A.nnSpin Attack: cogiendo una repisa (A) y girando con el d-pad.nnSpin Jump: cogiendo una repisa (A), girando con el d-pad y saltando (B).nnCatch and Trow: sosteniendo A, agarrando un objeto y soltando A.nnnnTambién puede comprar accesorios que harán que su arma sea más poderosa, como el Bombardero, las Bolas Gemelas, el Golpe de Martillo y las Zapatillas Jet.

Rockin' Kats sur Nes est un jeu d'action dans lequel vous incarnez Willy, un jeune chat jazzman dont la petite amie a été capturée par Mugsy, le caïd local. Vous devez aider notre héros à la sauver des griffes de votre ennemi à travers 7 niveaux aux thèmes différents.

locale.title: Rocman X
locale.synopsis: Rocman X (also known as Thunder Blast Man) is an unlicensed game created by Sachen, released on the Famicom and NES sometime in the 90's and also sometime later for the Game Boy Color. The NES and English Game Boy Color versions were released as Thunder Blast Man, the Chinese version of the GBC game released as Rockman X Gold, and one of the NES versions' label calls it Thunder Blaster Man. Rocman X's title screen is mostly copied from the first Famicom game of Rocman's, with the logo taken from Rocman X. The game also includes a story in English where Gadem City celebrates its centennial before the mayor's daughter, Miss Lucy, is kidnapped by the Paulung-Tang gang, who then take over and sabotage the city, holding it for a $20 billion ransom. Thunder Blast Man himself (also commonly known as Rocman X) appears to be based on Rocman/Mega Man and bears a passing resemblance to Quickman from Mega Man 2, as well as sporting a cape. His default weapon is a boomerang as opposed to a standard Mega Buster, and only one can be thrown on screen at a time. You can get different weapons as well as buy a spare continue (if you don't have one) by visiting stores located before boss fights in each world, save for the motorcycle stage. As well as this, Thunder Blast Man has a charge move triggered by holding B and, after it fully charges (designated by the health bar flashing) releasing it while holding up, left, or right to fly in that direction (releasing it while being still cancels the move.) This allows him to get across many pits throughout the game. The first three areas are available on the stage select screen, and most stages (save for the fourth area, where the boss is fought at the end of a single motorbike area) are split into two parts and a boss each. After clearing these, the game becomes linear as you access the last three areas automatically in order. The fourth area is a motorbike chase scene which looks and plays somewhat similarly to the speedboat sequence towards the end of Wave Man's stage in Mega Man 5. If you die in a stage you can continue from the point that you left off at (assuming you have a continue; you always start a new game with a continue) but if you used it up or don't have one you have to restart at the stage you're currently on, losing your bought weapons in the process. This is a bit different in the mine cart segment of the final world, as falling into the spikes give you a game over regardless of health or continues, but you restart the level with your on-hand items (spare continue and/or weapons) intact. The ending explains that Thunder Blast Man has saved Gadem City from the Paulung-Tang gang and that the city has made a statue of him.

locale.title: Rod Land
locale.synopsis:
Taking a rather literal view of the term 'slap-stick humour', Rodland features two fairies called Tam and Rit, whose mission is to rescue their mum who's been captured and taken to a castle.
There are 40 screens to clear, all full of baddies, who are disposed of by grabbing them with a stick, and flipping them from side to side to inflict damage. The hits needn't all be inflicted at the same time, as it's possible to release them to move them out of the way.
When killed, each bad guy releases some kind of extra, ranging from points bonuses to various devices which can be used to kill other enemies.
Each level also contains a certain amount of fruit. If you can collect all of this (with some bad guys still alive - you move on immediately once they're gone) you enter a bonus game, in which each enemy's death results in one of the letters E,X,T,R and A being released - collect them all for an invaluable extra life.
In the Game Boy version the difficulty lies slightly lower because the player can use his wand even when climbing ladders.

Rodland tiene una visión bastante literal del término "humor de bofetadas" y presenta a dos hadas llamadas Tam y Rit, cuya misión es rescatar a su madre que ha sido capturada y llevada a un castillo. nnnnHay 40 pantallas para despejar, todas llenas de malos, que se eliminan cogiéndolas con un palo y volteándolas de un lado a otro para infligir daño. No es necesario que todos los golpes sean infligidos al mismo tiempo, ya que es posible liberarlos para sacarlos del camino.nnnnCuando lo matan, cada malo libera algún tipo de extra, que va desde bonos de puntos a varios dispositivos que pueden ser utilizados para matar a otros enemigos.nnnnCada nivel también contiene una cierta cantidad de fruta. Si puedes coleccionar todo esto (con algunos malos todavía vivos - te mueves inmediatamente una vez que se han ido) entras en un juego de bonificación, en el que la muerte de cada enemigo resulta en una de las letras E, X, T, R y A siendo liberado - recoger todos ellos para una vida extra inestimable.

Rodland est un jeu d'action sur NES. Le soft comprend 40 écrans où il faut déblayer tous les méchants ennemis. Pour chaque adversaire tué, vous recevez un bonus qui vous sert à tuer d'autres ennemis avec des coups spéciaux.

locale.title: Roger Clemens' MVP Baseball
locale.synopsis:
Join one of the most dominant pitchers in baseball history for Roger Clemens' MVP Baseball. While the game does not come with the license of Major League Baseball or the MLBPA, there are still 26 similar teams with rosters resembling those of their actual MLB counterparts, including 1991 statistics. Though player names could not be used, the fictional ones make it apparent who each player represents. For instance, you can strike out one of Oakland's Bash brothers (M. Bash or J. Bash) with Texas' R. Nolan or hit a home run with Detroit's C. Fieldman off of Chicago's M. Gaddox.
The gameplay of Roger Clemens differs from that of most NES baseball games. Though the batting scenes may resemble those typified by R.B.I. Baseball and Major League Baseball, the view switches to what one might see from the outfield stands once the ball is hit. This results in different controls from most baseball games as well.
A player can challenge a friend or the computer, and one-player games may be exhibition or part of a 33-game season, complete with playoffs once the season is complete. In order to help make your season a successful one, Roger Clemens himself is there to offer advice.

Roger Clemens' MVP Baseball est un jeu de base-ball. Les vingt-six équipes correspondent au championnat Americain de baseball (MLB) de 1991 mais les noms de franchises et de joueurs n'est pas exact à cause du défaut de license. Les joueurs ressemblent toutefois aux officiels de par leur stats et leur ressemblance. Seul Roger Clemens, vainqueur du Trophée Cy Young de 1991 avec les Boston Red Sox et parrain du jeu porte son vrai nom. Le jeu propose une saison complète avec playoffs et incluant la National Division et l'American Division comme en MLB ainsi qu'un mode exhibition jouable e mode deux joueurs.

locale.title: Rokudenashi Blues
locale.synopsis: Rokudenashi Blues is a role-playing game based on the Japanese manga by Masanori Morita. The game allows you to play as Taison Maeda as well as three other characters, each with their own storylines. Most of the game takes place at the high school. Like m

locale.title: Rollerball
locale.synopsis:
Rollerball is a pinball simulation for one to four players.
There are two different game variations included. The first is Skyscraper, which is a four screen tall pinball table where each player competes individually for the highest score. The second is called Matchplay. In this game two players compete against each other to see who can reduce his opponents score to zero first. Each player has a set of flippers and a ball in play, and points are awarded or taken away by hitting the various targets in the playfield.

Rollerball est une simulation de flipper pour un à quatre joueurs.
Il y a deux modes de jeux inclus. Skycrapper qui met en scène est une grande table de 4 plateau ou chaque joueur s'affronte individuellement pour le meilleur score. Le mode Matchplay permet à deux joueurs de s'affronter simultanément, le but étant de réduire le score de son adversaire à zéro. Pour cela chaque joueur dispose de ses propres flippers et de sa propre bille, les points sont attribués en fonction des différentes cibles touchés sur la table.

locale.title: Rollerblade Racer
locale.synopsis: In Rollerblade Racer your goal is to enter (and hopefully win!) the super rollerblade challenge. In order to enter the race, you will first need to qualify by earning 5,000 points and completing several obstacle courses. As you rollerblade through the suburbs, city streets, beaches, and parks you can earn points by performing a variety of tricks and jumps. Additional points are earned by completing the course under the time limit. There are also several bonus rounds where you need to navigate through (or jump over) obstacles such as barrels or cones. In order to place in the super rollerblade challenge, you need to complete all of the events and the challenge with 10,000 points for third place, 15,000 for second, or 20,000 for first! If you crash too many times during an event or run out of time, the game will be over. The game allows you to select one of two characters, and features an isometric overhead point of view which scrolls to follow the action.
Un simple jeu de roller qui consiste a enchainer des figures et a éviter des obstacles.Pas franchement terrible, ce jeu s'adresse uniquement aux collectionneurs et aux fans de roller(et encore!)

locale.title: Rollergames
locale.synopsis:
This is a platform game in the same fashion as Turtles II, that is that it's a sidescroller were you can move up and down on the screen, but you go on rollerskates. This makes the game go much faster than its counterpart, which adds difficulty and also a sense of speed.
It includes a silly story about three different roller skates gangs (somewhat like motor cycle gangs) in a close future, which is most an excuse for the game to exist.
You can choose between three different gangs, one is all-around, one is fast and weak (and consists of women) and one is slow and strong, you get the fashion. This adds some replayability, but in reality, they are kind of the same.
The game also suffers from trial and error; you must learn the courses if you want to master them. Luckily, the game has unlimited continues.
RollerGames sur SNES est une adaptation de la série américaine éponyme de roller derby, le sport extrême le plus populaire du 21ème siècle.

locale.title: Rolling Thunder
locale.synopsis: Rolling Thunder is the worlds most powerful secret police force and you are its best agent. Your mission is to stop an underground conspiracy to conquer the world and to save agent Leila, who has been captured. Starting out armed only with a handgun, you have to make your way through heavily guarded hallways and secret passages to find Leila and stop the enemy. Rolling Thunder features side scrolling action based on the arcade game.

Rolling Thunder sur NES et un jeu d'action dans lequel vous incarnez le meilleur agent de la Rolling Thunder, la plus puissante des forces de police secrète dans le monde. Votre mission est d'arrêter une conspiration qui tente de conquérir le globe, mais aussi de retrouver l'agent Leila, qui a été capturée par cette même organisation.

locale.title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms
locale.synopsis:
Based on the events of the Three Kingdoms era in China (3rd century), and on Luo Guanzhong's famous novel Sanguo Yanyi, you take command of one of the many warlords rivaling for control after the Yellow Turban Rebellion.
This strategy/RPG game introduces hundreds of historically real characters of the Three Kingdoms era. The main purpose of the game is to be supreme ruler of the remnants of the falling Han Dynasty. To do this you have to build a mighty empire by conquering provinces and recruiting generals worthy of command. Fight massive battles, triumph over natural disasters and capture the enemy stronghold is the name of the game. In the end, can you unite China?

Basé sur les événements de l'ère des Trois Royaumes en Chine (3ème siècle), et sur le célèbre roman de Luo Guanzhong Sanguo Yanyi, vous prenez le commandement de l'un des nombreux seigneurs de guerre rivalisant pour le contrôle après la Rébellion des turbans jaunes.nnCe jeu de stratégie / RPG présente des centaines de personnages historiques réels de l'ère des Trois Royaumes. Le but du jeu est d'être le souverain suprême des restes de la chute de la dynastie Han. Pour ce faire, vous devez construire un puissant empire en conquérant les provinces et en recrutant des généraux dignes de commander votre armée. Combattre dans des batailles massives, triompher de catastrophes naturelles et capturer la forteresse ennemie sera votre lot quotidien dans ce jeu. En fin de compte, réussirez-vous à unir la Chine ?

locale.title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms II
locale.synopsis: The sequel to Romance of the Three Kingdoms. The game concept is still the same, though they did improve a lot of features that one may consider 'disturbing' from RTK I (e.g. Generals dying easily due to disease, etc.). RTK can be said to be much more 'stable' where players no longer have to worry that much about time length in the game, as the game take a slower time rate to allow the players to build up their forces without much interference. The RTK II gameplay and interface is closely similar to Nobunaga's Ambition II.

Romance of the Three Kingdoms II est la suite sur NES de l'adaptation du roman historique de Luo Guangzhong. Le jeu relate l'histoire chinoise des deuxième et troisième siècles après J.C. Les neuf scénarios vous font incarner le gouverneur de la province que vous sélectionnez. En dirigeant l'un des héros de guerre de chaque période comme Liu Bei, Cao Cao ou Sun Jian, vous devrez user de stratégie pour tenter de régner sur la Chine en créant des alliances ou déclarant la guerre aux ennemis.

locale.title: Romancia - Dragon Slayer Jr.
locale.synopsis:
In Romancia: Dragon Slayer Jr., you are a young warrior whom the king sends on a mission to rescue a lost princess. You must leave the town and enter the dreadful monster-infested catacombs in order to complete your quest.
The game is a departure from Dragon Slayer RPG-oriented gameplay style. It tends more towards medieval-themed platformer action. The hero has hit points, can buy items and weapons, use magic, and stay in inns to recover health. However, instead of receiving experience points and becoming stronger, you simply must attack quicker (by bumping into your opponent on platform levels) and jump higher.

Dans Romancia: Dragon Slayer Jr., vous êtes un jeune guerrier que le roi envoie en mission pour sauver une princesse perdue. Vous devez quitter la ville et entrer dans les affreuses catacombes infestées de monstres afin de compléter votre quête. Au départ, le jeu est du style orienté RPG de Dragon Slayer mais il tend plus vers l'action de plateforme médiévale. Le héros a des points de vie, peut acheter des objets et des armes, utiliser la magie et rester dans les auberges pour récupérer la santé. Cependant, au lieu de recevoir des points d'expérience et de devenir plus fort, vous devez simplement attaquer plus rapidement (en heurtant votre adversaire sur les niveaux de la plate-forme) et sauter plus haut.

game.name: Round Ball - The Two On Two Challenge

locale.title: Roundball : 2-on-2 Challenge
locale.synopsis:
Roundball: 2-On-2 Challenge is a 2-on-2 basketball game that is played on a half court. There is an option to play a 1-on-1 game also. The game modes contain an exhibition game and a tournament mode. The tournament involves 4 teams playing in a round robin to decide the winner. Players can set the time of the game at either four, eight, twelve or sixteen minutes.
The game offers 24 unique and fictional players to pick from each with their own individual ratings. Players are rated in the following skills: three point shots, field goals, free throws, rebounds, stealing, shot blocking, assists, and personal fouls.

Dans Round Ball : The Two On Two Challenge, jeu de basket sur Nes, le joueur évolue seulement sur une moitié de terrain de basket-ball. Vous avez le choix entre 24 personnages fictifs différents, jouables lors de tournois en 1 contre 1 ou en 2 contre 2. En plus de cela, le temps de chaque partie peut être réglé selon votre bon vouloir.

locale.title: Route-16 Turbo
locale.synopsis: Route-16 Turbo is an updated version of an older arcade game entitled Route 16, developed jointly by Tehkan (later Tecmo) and Sunsoft (in a manner similar to the way Namco's Warpman is an updated version of Warp & Warp.) Route-16 Turbo takes the concept established in Route 16, and updates the quality of the graphics, but keeps the goal of the game the same. The game play is a near perfect combination of Rally-X and Venture. The player drives a car through several zoomed in blocks collecting bags of money and other items, and travels between blocks along a zoomed out view of the world.

locale.title: Rpg Jinsei Game
locale.synopsis:
RPG Jinsei Game is a Japan-only role playing game for the Family Computer that is similar to Jinsei Game, which is the Japanese version of The Game of Life.
The object is to explore a city full of stores, places of employment, and learning places. Starting from home, the player must earn money and statistics in order to unlock the better features of the game.
Unlike most games based on the Jinsei Game series, RPG Jinsei Game doesn't use a spinner system. Instead, the controller pad is used for movement and random encounters are featured like in Dragon Quest. The player can also talk to strangers who might either give him/her advice or do something malevolent to him/her. As in the actual Game of Life board game, the player has to choose from a series of careers ranging from a musician to a photographer and even a professional wrestler. Most of these tasks are mundane while one of the quests directly involves chasing down unidentified flying objects. Buildings that are crucial to the quest (other than shops and learning places) can be fully explored; otherwise the player simply talks to the resident.
Fights can occur like in a real role-playing game. However, the players stats are used instead of hit points and magic points

locale.title: RumbleStation 15 in 1
locale.synopsis:
The Rumble Station is a NES-on-a-chip based Famiclone system that contained 15 games. It includes every NES game developed by Color Dreams, as well as two Sachen games published by them. Color Dreams licensed out the games for use on the system. It was originally distributed by Systema in the United Kingdom, and by Pelican in the US under the name Game Station Arcade. (although the menu screen still said "Rumble Station")
At its heart the Rumble Station consists of a generic NES-on-a-chip micro-controller (a complete cloned NES on a single chip) with 15 games programmed into it. The system is the size and shape of a Dreamcast Game controller (without the window for a VMU), and is powered by either 4 AA-size Batteries or an optional 9V DC Power Supply (Sold Separately). The casing itself is blue, with a black panel where the window on the Dreamcast Controller once was.
The syste features jacks for Composite Video Output and Audio Output (2x RCA Connector - there is only Right-side Audio output).
Games Included
Baby Boomer Captain Comic Challenge of the Dragon (Color Dreams) Crystal Mines Galactic Crusader King Neptune's Adventure Master Chu Menace Beach Moon Ranger Operation Secret Storm Pesterminator: The Western Exterminator The P'radikus Conflict Raid 2020 Robodemons Secret Scout

La Rumble Station est un système Famiclone basé sur NES-on-a-chip qui contient 15 jeux. Il comprend tous les jeux NES développés par Color Dreams, ainsi que deux jeux Sachen publiés par eux. Il a été distribué à l'origine par Systema au Royaume-Uni et par Pelican aux États-Unis sous le nom Game Station Arcade. (bien que l'écran de menu disait encore "Rumble Station")
En son c?ur, la Rumble Station se compose d'un micro-contrôleur NES-sur-une puce générique (un NES cloné complet sur une seule puce) avec 15 jeux programmés à l'intérieur. Le système a la taille et la forme d'un contrôleur de jeu Dreamcast (sans la fenêtre pour un VMU), et est alimenté par 4 piles AA ou une alimentation 9V CC en option (vendue séparément). Le boîtier lui-même est bleu, avec un panneau noir où était la fenêtre sur le contrôleur Dreamcast.
Le syste dispose de prises pour la sortie vidéo composite et la sortie audio (connecteur RCA 2x - il n'y a que la sortie audio Right-side).
Jeux inclus
Bébé Boomer Capitaine Comic Défi du Dragon (Rêves de couleur) Mines de cristal Croisé galactique L'aventure du roi Neptune Maître Chu Menace Beach Moon Ranger Opération Secret Storm Pesterminator: l'exterminateur occidental Le conflit de P'radikus Raid 2020 Robodemons Scout secret

locale.title: Rush'n Attack
locale.synopsis:
Depending on which title you use, and how you interpret it, this game is about a guy who a)rushes in before attacking b)attacks Russians (this was the mid-80s, when the US helped bin Laden do the same), or c)wears a rather goofy hat. One way or another, this arcade conversion arms you with a knife and sends you on a kamikaze mission against hordes of enemy fighters.
There are four distinct sections of gameplay, taking in a Missile Base, a Harbour, a Bridge, and an enemy Prison Camp. Extra weapons with limited ammunition can be collected along the way, which will make the task a lot easier. The level is divided into 3 horizontal levels, which can be moved between either by jumping or using ladders, and this gives a chance to avoid the more threatening mobs of enemy fighters

Rush'n Attack, disponible sur Nes, est un titre d'action dans lequel vous incarnez un béret vert durant la Guerre Froide qui doit infiltrer le camp ennemi afin de délivrer des prisonniers. Avec votre fidèle poignard, vous allez ramasser des armes le long des niveaux qui vous permettront de vous frayer un chemin. Personnalisez votre partie avec quatre niveaux de difficulté et partez sauver vos compatriotes.

locale.title: Rygar
locale.synopsis: A hero has arrived to defeat the forces of evil in the land of Argool, and you are this hero. Do you have what it takes? This game was one of the first adventures to hit the NES and the remarkable aspect on top of this was the multiple viewpoints the games offers. When you are in an action zone, the game is a side-scrolling action game; however, then you are travelling between zones, the game takes on an overhead view that can also lead to combat situations.

Le monde d'Argool a besoin d'un héros pour chasser les forces du mal et restaurer la paix. Etes-vous l'élu, celui que tout le monde attend ? Rygar sur NES vous apporte la réponse. Ce jeu combinant action et aventure alterne entre vue de profil durant les scènes d'action et une vue en hauteur lors des phases transitoires.

game.name: Saint Saiya - Tian Ma Huan Xiang

locale.title: Saint Saiya - Tian Ma Huan Xiang

game.name: Saint Seiya - Ougon Densetsu Kanketsu Hen

locale.title: Saint Seiya - Ougon Densetsu Kanketsu Hen
locale.synopsis: Another game based on the animÃ© series Saint Seiya. The animÃ© (and the game) tells the story of the noble Bronze Saints who have to save the goddess Athena, the only benevolent deity among the rivaling Greek gods. In the game, you control four Bronze Sa

Este juego de la franquicia Saint Seiya tampoco apareció en España. Se desarrolla durante la etapa de la batalla de las 12 casas y hay que enfrentarse a los caballeros de oro. Puedes escoger entre: Seiya de Pegaso, Shiryu del Dragón, Hyoga del Cisne o Shun de Andrómeda para completar el camino. Curiosamente el final de el juego no es el mismo del anime ya que fue editado antes de la conclusión de este arco argumental.

Saint Seiya - Ougon Densetsu Kanketsu Hen sur Nes est un jeu d'action inspiré du dessin animé Les Chevaliers du Zodiaque. Vous contrôlez à tour de rôle les 4 chevaliers de Bronze qui doivent une fois de plus sauver la princesse Athéna. Le jeu est divisé en deux parties, une de plates-formes simple et l'autre plus axée jeu de rôle.

locale.title: Saint Seiya : Ougon Densetsu Kanketsu Hen
Saiyuuki World
locale.synopsis: Saiyuuki World is an action platformer game for the Nintendo Entertainment System.nnnnSaiyuuki World is a Journey to the West-inspired platformer for FC by NMK/Jaleco. A good game which requires you to use your items/attacks wisely. And, strangely enough, it feels almost like a clone of Bikkuriman World for the PC-Engine. Not really much else to say about it. Go play it now! Have fun. :-)

Saiyuuki World est un jeu de plate-forme d'action pour la Nintendo Entertainment System. Saiyuuki World est un voyage vers l'ouest. Un bon jeu qui vous oblige à utiliser vos objets / attaques à bon escient. Et, chose étrange, cela ressemble presque à un clone de Bikkuriman World pour le PC-Engine. Pas vraiment autre chose à dire. Allez y jouer maintenant! Profitez :-)

game.name: Sakigake!! Otoko Juku - Shippuu Ichi Gou Sei

locale.title: Sakigake!! Otoko Juku - Shippuu Ichi Gou Sei
locale.synopsis: Sakigake!! Otokojuku: Shippuu Ichi Gou Sei is an action beat ?em up game for the Nintendo Entertainment System. Litteraly "Charge! Men's Private School" is a manga series written and illustrated by Akira Miyashita. It was originally serialized at the Weekly Sh?nen Jump from 1985 to 1991. It is staged in a private boys' school that teaches oendan to troubled teenagers. The students are trained to "revive the Spirit of Japan" and mainly engage in fighting courses.

Sakigake !! Otokojuku: Shippuu Ichi Gou Sei est un jeu d'action beat em up pour la Nintendo Entertainment System. Litteralement "Charge! Men's Private School" est une série de mangas écrite et illustrée par Akira Miyashita. Il a été à l'origine sérialisé au Weekly Shen-Nen Jump de 1985 à 1991. Il est mis en scène dans une école privée pour garçons qui enseigne l'oendan aux adolescents en difficulté. Les étudiants sont formés pour «faire revivre l'esprit du Japon» et participer principalement à des cours de combat.

locale.title: Sakigake!! Otoko Juku : Shippuu Ichi Gou Sei
Samsara Naga
locale.synopsis: Sansara Naga is set in the fantasy-filled lands of India during the Vedic age and also mixes elements of Japanese folklore such as the legend of Brahman Umibozu ("sea bonze"). Many of the NPCs in game will tell you that Cows are sacred animals and a few will mention the Tower of Rta Satya. There is a set of armor in the game called Dharma Armor, which will prevent the player from dealing or being dealt damage. The story revolves around a Boy/Girl that steals a treasured Ostrich egg from the village of Orissa and decides to reflect upon one's actions; aspiring to become a Dragoon to restore their lost honor. The protagonist will set out on an adventure saving lives, performing good deeds, and raising a newly hatched dragon. There are bosses and many NPC street vendors will attempt to scam you with defective items or attempt to mug you. While the main protagonist does not level and their base stats are fixed at 40 STR, 40 DEF. The dragon that you raise does level. More unique game mechanics to this game include the ability to feed dead bodies to your dragon to raise his level, enchanted armors, field map events, hidden landmarks, a few side quests, and mini-games. Sansara Naga's gameplay and gameplay mechanics are similar to those of Dragon Quest I, Pokémon and Earthbound. The Silver Mountains are also referred to as Heaven.

Le Sansara Naga se déroule sur les terres fantastiques de l'Inde à l'époque védique et mélange aussi des éléments du folklore japonais tels que la légende de Brahman Umibozu («mer bonze»). Beaucoup de PNJ dans le jeu vous diront que les vaches sont des animaux sacrés et quelques-uns mentionneront la tour de Rta Satya. Il y a un jeu d'armure dans le jeu appelé Armure du Dharma, qui empêchera le joueur d'infliger ou d'être blessé. L'histoire tourne autour d'un garçon / fille qui vole un précieux oeuf d'autruche du village d'Orissa et décide de réfléchir sur ses actions; aspirant à devenir un dragon pour restaurer leur honneur perdu. Le protagoniste partira à l'aventure en sauvant des vies, en accomplissant de bonnes actions et en élevant un dragon nouvellement éclos. Il y a des boss et de nombreux vendeurs de rue de PNJ vont tenter de vous arnaquer avec des objets défectueux ou tenter de vous agresser. Alors que le protagoniste principal ne se met pas à niveau et que ses statistiques de base sont fixées à 40 STR, 40 DEF. Le dragon que vous relevez est de niveau. Les mécanismes de jeu plus uniques à ce jeu incluent la capacité de nourrir des corps morts à votre dragon pour élever son niveau, des armures enchantées, des événements de carte de champ, des repères cachés, quelques quêtes secondaires, et des mini-jeux. Les mécanismes de gameplay et de gameplay de Sansara Naga sont similaires à ceux de Dragon Quest I, Pokémon et Earthbound. Les Montagnes d'argent sont aussi appelées les Cieux.

locale.title: Samurai Spirits
locale.synopsis: Wu Shi Hun ("Samurai Spirit"), called Samurai Spirits on the label and also released as Samurai Shodown III, is a Famicom fighting game based on SNK's Samurai Shodown and developed by Rex Soft. First version has only Nakoruru, Ukyo, Haohmaru, and Charlotte. Then last version adds Jubei, Kyoshiro, Galford, and Wan-Fu.

Wu Shi Hun , appelé Samurai Spirits sur l'étiquette et également publié comme Samurai Shodown III, est un jeu de combat Famicom basé sur Samurai Shodown de SNK et développé par Rex Soft.
La version 1 a seulement Nakoruru, Ukyo, Haohmaru et Charlotte Samurai Shodown III version permet à deux joueurs de choisir le même de ces quatre caractères La version 2 ajoute Jubei, Kyoshiro, Galford et Wan-Fu

game.name: San Goku Shi - Chuugen No Hasha

locale.title: San Goku Shi - Chuugen No Hasha
locale.synopsis:
Sangokushi refers to a novel written about the Three Kingdoms period of China, where the country was temporarily split into three warring states. This is different to the the Romance of the Three Kingdoms novel, a mostly fictionalized account written some considerable time after the conflict was over and has had many video game adaptations, not least of which being Koei's Romance of the Three Kingdoms and their later Dynasty Warriors series.
As a war strategy game, the goal for the player and their chosen side is to reclaim all of China under their rule. Players can gather intel, invade other territories or increase their own stats and purchase weapons and supplies for their armies. The game affords the player a certain number of actions per turn before letting the CPU opponents have their turns.
Though this game was created after Romance of the Three Kingdoms, it is in fact the first NES game to be based on the conflict.

game.name: San Goku Shi 2 - Haou No Tairiku

locale.title: San Goku Shi 2 - Haou No Tairiku
locale.synopsis: Sangokushi II: Haou no Tairiku is a strategy game set during the Three Kingdoms era in China, very similar in style, gameplay, and interface to Koei's Romance of the Three Kingdoms series. One or two players can compete for dominance in one of the country

locale.title: San Goku Shi 2 - Haou No Tairiku

game.name: San Guo Zhi - Qun Xiong Zheng Ba

locale.title: San Guo Zhi - Qun Xiong Zheng Ba
locale.synopsis:
San Guo Zhi: Qun Xiong Zheng Ba (The Romance of Three Kingdoms: The Fight Of Heroes' Pleiades) is a fighting game in the setting of the Chinese era of Three Kingdoms made by ASDER at an unknown date. This, most likely, has nothing to do with Koei's Three Kingdoms-based 3D fighting game, Dynasty Warriors.
This game doesn't use a 'traditional' Street Fighter II engine, instead, it comes up with a heavily modified engine from Samurai Shodown. Several features that weren't present in any other fighting games on Famicom were included: a 'rage' gauge that may be refilled by holding BW+A and performing a super move when it's fully charged; three-tiered health bar; and, finally, the 'conquest' mode, where you have to eliminate all of your opponent's fortresses in order to win.
The game has six playable characters, with every of them selectable from the beginning (from left to right): Guan Yu, Zhang Fei, Huang Zhong, Cao Ren, Mei Ya [?] and Lu Bu. However, during the 'conquest' mode, there are two more characters that are not playable the regular way: Shi Ren and Xie Seng. Both of them are slightly overpowered but have only two tiers of health at the very beginning.
In the 'arcade' mode, the player should defeat all six opponents (including his clone) in a specified order. Only nine continues are available for this type of game.
'Conquest' mode, in its' turn, proposes the player to choose one of two preset teams, with each having three characters. After the choice is done, the player has to decide which enemy's fortress he should siege. Once the fortress is selected, the attacker's staying on his own, while the defending side has Shi Ren, Xie Seng and the actual "defender" (stage "owner") appearing in the same defined order, King of Fighters style. Should only the attacker defeat one of the opponents, his health's being fully restored. Once all three opponent's fortresses fall, the player wins.

game.name: San Guo Zhi 4 - Chi Bi Feng Yun

locale.title: San Guo Zhi 4 - Chi Bi Feng Yun
San Shi Liu Ji
locale.synopsis: Boardgame from China based on The Thirty-Six Stratagems, a Chinese essay used to illustrate a series of stratagems used in politics, war, and in civil interaction all the possible schemes and stratagems

locale.title: Sanada Juu Yuushi
locale.synopsis: It is a Sengoku era themed RPG featuring ninjas. Sanada Yukimura (also known as Sanada Nobushige) is the titular character. He was a Japanese samurai warrior of the Sengoku period. He was especially known as the leading general on the losing side of the Siege of Osaka. Yukimura was called "A Hero who may appear once in a hundred years" and "Crimson Demon of War". A legend says that Yukimura had ten heroes who took an active role at the battles of Osaka Castle. They were called the Sanada Ten Braves, the group of ninjas who are also referenced by the title. In the game, Sanada must locate and recruit the ten braves. Upon finding each one, they usually require that Sanada complete a task before they agree to join him. Combat is conducted in turns, using typical menu commands. However, unlike the Dragon Warrior or Final Fantasy series, which popularized party-on-party battles, combat in this game is strictly one-on-one. However, the player may select from among any recruited character to do battle, even changing characters between rounds. The game was never released outside of Japan, nor translated from the original Japanese. A remake was developed for mobile phones and published in 2005.

locale.title: Sanma No Meitantei
locale.synopsis: Sanma no Meitantei lit. "Great Detective Sanma") is a murder mystery detective adventure game developed and published by Namco for the Famicom in 1987. In the vein of Portopia Renzoku Satsujin Jiken, the player must visit several locations associated with the murder victim, to discover clues which will open up more locations in order to find more clues until ultimately, the identity of the murderer can be confirmed. The game is played entirely in Japanese and was never translated into English. The summary of the story is that while the president Yoshimoto held a party at his villa, Katsura Buntin was found to have been killed in the vault. On top of that, the "Star of Africa" diamond that was stolen from the vault. As detective Sanma Akashiya's assistant, you must help him determine the perpetrators of the incident. The game features a mini game which is a parody of Galaxian, and contains sound effects from other Namco hits such as Dig Dug and Xevious

locale.title: Sanrio Carnival
locale.synopsis: The genre of this game is a puzzle game. The player must place blocks with various Sanrio character faces on them. Matching three of these characters (e.g. vertically) causes them to disappear and this counts as a 'line'. There are various game modes, such as the Famicom version's introductory course (in which the playing field is small, Sanrio character icons are relatively large and the only objective is to make lines) and 'aim for a highscore' mode, in which the playing field is large, icons take up far less of the screen and the objective other than to clear lines is to score the most points and clear levels.

Le genre de ce jeu est un jeu de puzzle. Le joueur doit placer des blocs avec différents visages de personnages Sanrio sur eux. La correspondance de trois de ces caractères (par exemple verticalement) les fait disparaître et cela compte comme une «ligne».nnIl existe différents modes de jeu, comme le cours d'introduction de la version Famicom (où le terrain de jeu est petit, les icônes de personnages Sanrio sont relativement grands et le seul objectif est de créer des lignes) et le mode "highscore". le champ est grand, les icônes occupent beaucoup moins de l'écran et l'objectif autre que d'effacer les lignes est de marquer le plus de points et de niveaux.

locale.title: Sanrio Carnival 2
locale.synopsis: The genre of this game is a puzzle game, like the original Sanrio Carnival. The game features a mode in which the player must advance through multiple stages, such as one featuring the character Minna no Tabo.

Le genre de ce jeu est un jeu de puzzle, comme le Sanrio Carnival original. Le jeu comporte un mode dans lequel le joueur doit avancer à travers plusieurs étapes, telles que celle mettant en vedette le personnage Minna no Tabo.

locale.title: Sanrio Cup - Pon Pon Volley
locale.synopsis: Sanrio Cup: Pon Pon Volley is a volleyball video game featuring many of the popular Sanrio characters including Hello Kitty, Keroppi and Minna no Tabo. Matches can be played in with either two, three or four players. Players can choose between three different tracks of background music, or to simply play without the music.nnnnThe game is basically a volleyball/tennis game but without the nets, closely resembling four-square. There is an option to increase the difficulty level that modifies the level of intelligence with which computer-controlled play. There are opportunities to commit do-overs. After the end of the game, the player is awarded with a large ostrich trophy.nnnnThough the game was released exclusively in Japan, a fan translation to English was made.

Sanrio Cup: Pon Pon Volley est un jeu vidéo de volleyball mettant en vedette plusieurs des personnages populaires de Sanrio, dont Hello Kitty, Keroppi et Minna no Tabo. Les matchs peuvent être joués avec deux, trois ou quatre joueurs. Les joueurs peuvent choisir entre trois pistes différentes de musique de fond, ou simplement jouer sans la musique.nnnnLe jeu est essentiellement un jeu de volleyball / tennis mais sans les filets, ressemblant étroitement à quatre carrés. Il y a une option pour augmenter le niveau de difficulté qui modifie le niveau d'intelligence avec lequel le jeu commandé par ordinateur. Il y a des occasions de commettre des reports. Après la fin de la partie, le joueur reçoit un grand trophée d'autruche.nnnnBien que le jeu ait été publié exclusivement au Japon, une traduction en anglais a été faite.

locale.title: Sansuu 1 Nen - Keisan Game
locale.synopsis: An educational game consisting of four different mini games. The minigames included are:Addition 1 - Players control a car and have to drive it into the correct number to answer a math problem. Crashing into another car or answering the problem wrong will

Un jeu éducatif composé de quatre mini-jeux différents. Les mini-jeux inclus sont: Addition 1 - Les joueurs contrôlent une voiture et doivent la conduire dans le bon nombre pour répondre à un problème de maths.

locale.title: Sansuu 2 Nen - Keisan Game
locale.synopsis: An educational game consisting of four different mini games. The minigames included are: Addition & Subtraction 1 - Players control an arrow inside a dungeon maze. Players can only exit the dungeon when they locate a treasure chest. While searching for th

Un jeu éducatif composé de quatre mini-jeux différents. Les mini-jeux inclus sont: Addition & Soustraction 1 - Les joueurs contrôlent une flèche dans un labyrinthe de donjons. Les joueurs peuvent seulement quitter le donjon lorsqu'ils trouvent un coffre au trésor.

locale.title: Sansuu 3 Nen - Keisan Game
locale.synopsis: An educational game consisting of four different mini games. The minigames included are: Division 1 - Players control a submarine in a body of water. Players have to pilot the submarine into the correct answer of a division problem, while simultaneously d

Un jeu éducatif composé de quatre mini-jeux différents. Les mini-jeux inclus sont: Division 1 - Les joueurs contrôlent un sous-marin dans un plan d'eau. Les joueurs doivent piloter le sous-marin dans la bonne réponse à un problème de division.

locale.title: Sansuu 4 Nen - Keisan Game
locale.synopsis: An educational game consisting of four different mini games. The minigames included are: Division - Players control a man in front of a building which has several doors. Entering a door will bring the player to a separate room where they have to try and l

Un jeu éducatif composé de quatre mini-jeux différents. Les mini-jeux inclus sont: Division - Les joueurs contrôlent un homme devant un bâtiment qui a plusieurs portes. Entrer dans une porte amène le joueur dans une pièce séparée.

locale.title: Sansuu 5 & 6 Nen - Keisan Game
locale.synopsis: An educational game consisting of two different mini games. The game modes included are:Decimal Multiplication - Players control a spaceship in a side-scrolling shooter. Blasting enemy ships earns the player points. At certain intervals, the ship will lan

Un jeu éducatif composé de deux mini-jeux différents. Les modes de jeu inclus sont les suivants: Multiplication décimale - Les joueurs contrôlent un vaisseau spatial dans un jeu de tir à défilement latéral. Les navires ennemis qui explosent gagnent les points du joueur.

locale.title: Satomi Hakkenden
locale.synopsis: A Famicom RPG based on a famous Japanese novel series of the same name. Satomi Hakkenden (usually translated as "The Eight Dog Chronicles") was a long-running 19th century novel series about eight samurais from the Sengoku period and their various adventures. It was in some ways partly inspired by the ancient Chinese epic The Water Margin, which has itself seen video game adaptations in the form of the Suikoden games. Receiving numerous TV and film adaptations, including the 1983 film known in the west as Legend of the Eight Samurai, Satomi Hakkenden would be its first video game adaptation.

Following his father's death, Zero Gundam goes on a journey to recover the Thunder Clan's Holy Skills and defeat his father's enemy, Vice Gundam.

locale.title: SD Gundam Gaiden : Knight Gundam Monogatari

game.name: Sd Gundam Gaiden - Knight Gundam Monogatari 2 - Hikari No Kishi

locale.title: Sd Gundam Gaiden - Knight Gundam Monogatari 2 - Hikari No Kishi
locale.synopsis: SD Gundam Gaiden: Knight Gundam Monogatari 2: Hikari no Kishi is the second installment in the Knight Gundam series. It takes place in a universe in which the Gundam characters are reimagined as knights, wizards, kings and other medieval type characters. This game is a direct sequel to the first game, so you ought to play through the first one first. It may seem unrelated at first, but the story converges with the first game's eventually.

locale.title: SD Gundam Gaiden : Knight Gundam Monogatari 2, Hikari no Knight

game.name: Sd Hero Soukessen - Taose! Aku No Gundan

locale.title: Sd Hero Soukessen - Taose! Aku No Gundan
locale.synopsis: One day, Emmy was taking care of her gashapon machine (those claw prize machines), when she and her machine were abducted by the evil Dark Brain. However, the gashapons of the legendary heroes Ultraman, Gundam, Shaider and Kamen Rider, were freed from the machine. Now the heroes have to rescue Emmy from Dark Brain. this is the same Emmy from the Great Battle and Super Robot Wars OG series.

Un jour, Emmy s'occupait de sa machine à gashapon (ces machines à griffes), quand elle et sa machine ont été enlevées par le maléfique Dark Brain. Cependant, les gazhapons des héros légendaires Ultraman, Gundam, Shaider et Kamen Rider, ont été libérés de la machine. Maintenant, les héros doivent sauver Emmy de Dark Brain.nnC'est le même Emmy de la série Great Battle and Super Robot Wars OG.

locale.title: SD Hero Soukessen : Taose! Aku no Gundan
Sd Keiji - Blader
locale.synopsis: SD Detective Blader was released in Japan in 1991 and never brought to Western shores, which was a great shame since it's a an imaginative, humorous and challenging RPG set in a future Tokyo. Fortunately, an excellent new fan translation makes the game accessible to a wider audience. Blader is a space detective and arrives on Earth in the Galaxy spaceship, which remains his base during the game. The battle system is turn-based, the encounter rate in dungeons is very high, and the game moves at a fast pace with allies joining and leaving the party at various intervals. SD Blader is very much like an early Dragon Quest RPG with nice sub stories involving each town, except that you use guns and science rather than swords and sorcery: and it's great fun to play.

Le détective SD Blader est sorti au Japon en 1991 et jamais porté sur les côtes occidentales, ce qui était une honte car c'est un jeu de rôle imaginatif, humoristique et stimulant dans un Tokyo futuriste. Heureusement, une excellente nouvelle traduction des fans rend le jeu accessible à un public plus large. Blader est un détective spatial et arrive sur Terre dans le vaisseau spatial Galaxy, qui reste sa base pendant le jeu. Le système de combat est basé sur le tour, le taux de rencontre dans les donjons est très élevé, et le jeu se déplace à un rythme rapide avec des alliés rejoignant et quittant la partie à différents intervalles. SD Blader est un peu comme un RPG de Dragon Quest au début avec de belles histoires sous-marines impliquant chaque ville, sauf que vous utilisez des fusils et de la science plutôt que des épées et de la sorcellerie: et c'est très amusant à jouer.

locale.title: Sea of Dreamland
locale.synopsis:
Sea of Dreamland is a side scroller set in the open ocean. Your character is a seahorse who must clear out all dangers before they overtake your character.
You control the ocean!

game.name: Secret Scout In The Temple Of Demise

locale.title: Secret Scout in the Temple of Demise
locale.synopsis:
You have become separated from your fellow soldiers. You thought the men approaching you were your rescue but they were the enemy. You must make your way through to return to your friends.
This is a side-scrolling platform game where you walk along, avoiding danger. When you encounter an enemy, your only attack is a kick so plan your strategy accordingly. Be careful with enemies that can shoot and when you are on dangerous ledges.

Vous avez été séparés de vos camarades soldats. Vous pensiez que les hommes qui s'approchaient de vous étaient là pour vous secourir, mais ce sont des ennemis. Vous devez aloors vous frayez un chemin pour retrouvez vos amis.nnIl s'agit d'un jeu de plateforme en side-scrolling où vous marchez en évitant le danger. Lorsque vous rencontrez un ennemi, votre seule attaque est un coup de pied alors planifiez votre stratégie en conséquence. Soyez prudent avec les ennemis qui peuvent tirer, surtout lorsque vous êtes sur des rebords dangereux.

locale.title: Secret Ties
locale.synopsis: Secret Ties is a planned video game adaptation of Master Thief Sugar, a manga created by Takao Saito, who also made Golgo 13. Game was finished but never released. music is good! it plays much like Ninja Gaidan. Very fast pace. You can climb walls, jump kick, punch, A lot of fun.

locale.title: Section-Z
locale.synopsis:
Alien Invaders approach the solar system from their interstellar battle platform, named Fortress Balangool. Under the command of the Master Control, named L-Brain, the Invaders defeat Earth's space forces. Only one hero, Captain Commando remains to defeat the alien armada by entering Balangool and fighting through the various sections until reaching Section-Z.
Section-Z is a side-scrolling shooter where the player must travel through the maze that is Balangool. Typically this consists of traveling through a scrolling corridor and reaching the end where a new direction must be chosen. Captain Commando's abilities are shooting directly left or directly right while moving around the screen. Power-ups can be collected by defeated enemies and include; improved lasers, a 3-way cannon and shield, these can be stored until needed. There are also SMS (Special Transmission Shell) power-ups, which require energy to use Energy units,are used to absorb enemy fire. Loss of all energy or running into an enemy or a wall causes death.
Certain sections of Balangool are blocked until a generator can be found and destroyed. There are four different boss creatures that must be defeated when encountered.

Section Z est un jeu d'action sur Nes dans lequel vous dirigez Capitaine Commando : le dernier rempart des forces terrestres contre une invasion d'aliens belliqueux. 4 boss vous attendent dans la station spaciale que constitue le vaisseau-mère alien.

locale.title: Seicross
locale.synopsis:
Two different tribes existed on planet Colura, the Petras and the Basrah. The Basrah were aggressors and eventually drove the Petra underground. However many Petra survivors were trapped on the surface of the planet. To that end, a rescue bike named the Gilgitt Petras was created. It must venture up to the surface and save as many Petras as possible.
Seicross is a side-scroller. Controlling the Gilgitt Petras, the player must race across the screen, collecting Petra survivors and fuel power-ups. The single weapon and ability available is the ability to fire straight ahead.

Seicross est un jeu de tir en vue de côté sur Nes. Vous incarnez un pétra, habitant des profondeurs, et partez à l'assaut de la surface pour sauver les autres pétras en détresse. Vous aurez pour cela votre moto et de nombreux power-up à récolter sur le chemin.

locale.title: Seikima 2 - Akuma No Gyakushuu
